```tsx
"use client";

import { useState } from "react";
import { useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { TrashIcon, CheckIcon, XMarkIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

interface TaskCardProps {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}

const availableColors = [
  "#FFDE59", "#4D96FF", "#FF6B9D", "#6BCB77", "#FF9F45", "#9B59B6",
];

export default function TaskCard({ task, availableTags, onUpdate, onDelete }: TaskCardProps) {
  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));

  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({
    id: task.id.toString(),
    data: { status: task.status },
    disabled: isEditing,
  });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  const handleSave = () => {
    if (!editTitle.trim()) return;
    onUpdate(task.id, {
      title: editTitle.trim(),
      description: editDescription.trim(),
      status: editStatus,
      tags: selectedTags,
    });
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    setEditTitle(task.title);
    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
    setEditStatus(task.status);
    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
    setTagInput("");
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
    if (e.key === "Enter" && !e.shiftKey) {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleSave();
    } else if (e.key === "Escape") {
      handleCancel();
    }
  };

  const handleAddTag = () => {
    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
      setTagInput("");
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
  };

  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
    return existing?.color || availableColors[Math.floor(Math.random() * availableColors.length)];
  };

  if (isEditing) {
    return (
      <div
        ref={setNodeRef}
        style={style}
        className="bg-white border-3 border-brutal-blue shadow-brutal p-4 relative z-10"
      >
        {/* Title Input */}
        <input
          type="text"
          value={editTitle}
          onChange={(e) => setEditTitle(e.target.value)}
          onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
          className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue font-semibold text-lg mb-3"
          placeholder="Task title..."
          autoFocus
        />

        {/* Description Textarea */}
        <textarea
          value={editDescription}
          onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
          className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm mb-3 resize-y min-h-[80px]"
          placeholder="Add description..."
          rows={3}
        />

        {/* Status Selector */}
        <div className="mb-3">
          <label className="block text-xs font-bold mb-2">STATUS</label>
          <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-2">
            {[
              { value: "not_started" as TaskStatus, label: "Not Started", color: "bg-brutal-pink" },
              { value: "in_progress" as TaskStatus, label: "In Progress", color: "bg-brutal-blue" },
              { value: "complete" as TaskStatus, label: "Complete", color: "bg-brutal-green" },
            ].map((s) => (
              <button
                key={s.value}
                type="button"
                onClick={() => setEditStatus(s.value)}
                className={`py-2 px-3 border-3 border-black font-semibold text-xs transition-all ${
                  editStatus === s.value
                    ? `${s.color} text-white shadow-brutal-sm`
                    : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
                }`}
              >
                {s.label}
              </button>
            ))}
          </div>
        </div>

        {/* Tags */}
        <div className="mb-4">
          <label className="block text-xs font-bold mb-2">TAGS</label>
          <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
            <input
              type="text"
              value={tagInput}
              onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
              onKeyDown={(e) => {
                if (e.key === "Enter") {
                  e.preventDefault();
                  handleAddTag();
                }
              }}
              className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm"
              placeholder="Add tag..."
            />
            <button
              type="button"
              onClick={handleAddTag}
              className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-blue text-white border-3 border-black font-semibold text-sm hover:bg-blue-600"
            >
              Add
            </button>
          </div>
          {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
              {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
                <span
                  key={tagName}
                  className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-full text-white flex items-center gap-1"
                  style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
                >
                  {tagName}
                  <button
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
                    className="hover:opacity-70"
                  >
                    <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                  </button>
                </span>
              ))}
            </div>
          )}
        </div>

        {/* Action Buttons */}
        <div className="flex gap-2 pt-2 border-t-3 border-black">
          <button
            type="button"
            onClick={() => onDelete(task.id)}
            className="px-3 py-2 bg-brutal-pink text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-pink-600 flex items-center gap-1"
          >
            <TrashIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
            Delete
          </button>
          <div className="flex-1" />
          <button
            type="button"
            onClick={handleCancel}
            className="px-4 py-2 bg-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-gray-100 flex items-center gap-1"
          >
            <XMarkIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
            Cancel
          </button>
          <button
            type="button"
            onClick={handleSave}
            disabled={!editTitle.trim()}
            className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-green text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-green-600 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-1"
          >
            <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
            Save
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div
      ref={setNodeRef}
      style={style}
      {...attributes}
      {...listeners}
      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
      className="bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal-sm p-4 cursor-move hover:shadow-brutal hover:-translate-y-[2px] hover:translate-x-[2px] transition-all active:translate-y-[4px] active:translate-x-[4px] active:shadow-none"
    >
      <h3 className="font-semibold text-lg mb-2">{task.title}</h3>
      {task.description && (
        <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mb-3 line-clamp-3">{task.description}</p>
      )}

      {task.tags.length > 0 && (
        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
            <span
              key={tag.id}
              className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-full text-white"
              style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
            >
              {tag.name}
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

```tsx
"use client";

import { useDroppable } from "@dnd-kit/core";
import { SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import TaskCard from "./TaskCard";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { PlusIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

interface TaskColumnProps {
  status: TaskStatus;
  label: string;
  color: string;
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onAddTask: () => void;
  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
}

export default function TaskColumn({
  status,
  label,
  color,
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  onAddTask,
  onUpdateTask,
  onDeleteTask,
}: TaskColumnProps) {
  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({
    id: status,
    data: { status },
  });

  const taskIds = tasks.map((t) => t.id.toString());

  return (
    <div className="flex flex-col h-full">
      {/* Header */}
      <div className={`${color} border-3 border-black p-4 flex items-center justify-between`}>
        <h2 className="font-bold text-lg">{label}</h2>
        <span className="bg-white border-3 border-black px-2 py-1 text-sm font-bold">
          {tasks.length}
        </span>
      </div>

      {/* Task List */}
      <div
        ref={setNodeRef}
        className="flex-1 bg-gray-50 border-3 border-t-0 border-black p-3 space-y-3 min-h-[400px] overflow-y-auto"
      >
        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
          {tasks.map((task) => (
            <TaskCard
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              availableTags={availableTags}
              onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
              onDelete={onDeleteTask}
            />
          ))}
        </SortableContext>

        {/* Add Task Button */}
        <button
          onClick={onAddTask}
          className="w-full py-3 border-3 border-dashed border-black bg-white hover:bg-brutal-yellow hover:border-solid transition-all font-semibold flex items-center justify-center gap-2 group"
        >
          <PlusIcon className="w-5 h-5" />
          <span>Add Task</span>
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

```

```tsx
"use client";

import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react";
import { useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { TrashIcon, CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

interface TaskCardProps {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}

const availableColors = [
  "#FFDE59", "#4D96FF", "#FF6B9D", "#6BCB77", "#FF9F45", "#9B59B6",
];

export default function TaskCard({ task, availableTags, onUpdate, onDelete }: TaskCardProps) {
  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
  const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({
    id: task.id.toString(),
    data: { status: task.status },
    disabled: isEditing,
  });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  const handleSave = () => {
    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
      setTitleError("Title is required");
      return;
    }
    setTitleError("");
    onUpdate(task.id, {
      title: editTitle.trim(),
      description: editDescription.trim(),
      status: editStatus,
      tags: selectedTags,
    });
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    setEditTitle(task.title);
    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
    setEditStatus(task.status);
    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
    setTagInput("");
    setTitleError("");
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
    if (e.key === "Enter" && !e.shiftKey) {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleSave();
    } else if (e.key === "Escape") {
      handleCancel();
    }
  };

  // Handle click outside to save (blur behavior)
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleClickOutside = (event: MouseEvent) => {
      if (containerRef.current && !containerRef.current.contains(event.target as Node)) {
        if (isEditing) {
          handleSave();
        }
      }
    };

    document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside);
    return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside);
  }, [isEditing, editTitle, editDescription, editStatus, selectedTags]);

  const handleAddTag = () => {
    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
      setTagInput("");
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
  };

  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
    return existing?.color || availableColors[Math.floor(Math.random() * availableColors.length)];
  };

  const handleDeleteClick = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(true);
  };

  const confirmDelete = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
    setIsEditing(false);
    onDelete(task.id);
  };

  const cancelDelete = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
  };

  if (isEditing) {
    return (
      <div
        ref={setNodeRef}
        style={style}
        className="bg-white border-3 border-brutal-blue shadow-brutal p-4 relative z-10"
      >
        {/* Delete Confirmation Dialog */}
        {showDeleteConfirm && (
          <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-white/95 z-20 flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4">
            <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="w-12 h-12 text-brutal-pink mb-3" />
            <h3 className="font-bold text-lg mb-2">Delete this task?</h3>
            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4 text-center">This action cannot be undone.</p>
            <div className="flex gap-3">
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={cancelDelete}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-gray-100"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={confirmDelete}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-pink text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-pink-600"
              >
                Delete
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        )}

        <div ref={containerRef}>
          {/* Title Input */}
          <div>
            <input
              type="text"
              value={editTitle}
              onChange={(e) => {
                setEditTitle(e.target.value);
                setTitleError("");
              }}
              onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
              className={`w-full px-3 py-2 border-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue font-semibold text-lg mb-1 ${
                titleError ? "border-red-500" : "border-black"
              }`}
              placeholder="Task title..."
              autoFocus
            />
            {titleError && (
              <p className="text-red-500 text-xs font-semibold mt-1 flex items-center gap-1">
                <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                {titleError}
              </p>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Description Textarea */}
          <textarea
            value={editDescription}
            onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
            className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm mb-3 resize-y min-h-[80px]"
            placeholder="Add description..."
            rows={3}
          />

          {/* Status Selector */}
          <div className="mb-3">
            <label className="block text-xs font-bold mb-2">STATUS</label>
            <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-2">
              {[
                { value: "not_started" as TaskStatus, label: "Not Started", color: "bg-brutal-pink" },
                { value: "in_progress" as TaskStatus, label: "In Progress", color: "bg-brutal-blue" },
                { value: "complete" as TaskStatus, label: "Complete", color: "bg-brutal-green" },
              ].map((s) => (
                <button
                  key={s.value}
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => setEditStatus(s.value)}
                  className={`py-2 px-3 border-3 border-black font-semibold text-xs transition-all ${
                    editStatus === s.value
                      ? `${s.color} text-white shadow-brutal-sm`
                      : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
                  }`}
                >
                  {s.label}
                </button>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>

          {/* Tags */}
          <div className="mb-4">
            <label className="block text-xs font-bold mb-2">TAGS</label>
            <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
              <input
                type="text"
                value={tagInput}
                onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
                onKeyDown={(e) => {
                  if (e.key === "Enter") {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    handleAddTag();
                  }
                }}
                className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm"
                placeholder="Add tag..."
              />
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleAddTag}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-blue text-white border-3 border-black font-semibold text-sm hover:bg-blue-600"
              >
                Add
              </button>
            </div>
            {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
              <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
                {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
                  <span
                    key={tagName}
                    className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-full text-white flex items-center gap-1"
                    style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
                  >
                    {tagName}
                    <button
                      type="button"
                      onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
                      className="hover:opacity-70"
                    >
                      <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                    </button>
                  </span>
                ))}
              </div>
            )}
          </div>

          {/* Action Buttons */}
          <div className="flex gap-2 pt-2 border-t-3 border-black">
            <button
              type="button"
              onClick={handleDeleteClick}
              className="px-3 py-2 bg-brutal-pink text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-pink-600 flex items-center gap-1"
            >
              <TrashIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
              Delete
            </button>
            <div className="flex-1" />
            <button
              type="button"
              onClick={handleCancel}
              className="px-4 py-2 bg-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-gray-100 flex items-center gap-1"
            >
              <XMarkIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
              Cancel
            </button>
            <button
              type="button"
              onClick={handleSave}
              disabled={!editTitle.trim()}
              className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-green text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-green-600 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-1"
            >
              <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
              Save
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div
      ref={setNodeRef}
      style={style}
      {...attributes}
      {...listeners}
      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
      className="bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal-sm p-4 cursor-move hover:shadow-brutal hover:-translate-y-[2px] hover:translate-x-[2px] transition-all active:translate-y-[4px] active:translate-x-[4px] active:shadow-none"
    >
      <h3 className="font-semibold text-lg mb-2">{task.title}</h3>
      {task.description && (
        <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mb-3 line-clamp-3">{task.description}</p>
      )}

      {task.tags.length > 0 && (
        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
            <span
              key={tag.id}
              className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-full text-white"
              style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
            >
              {tag.name}
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

```typescript
import { db } from "../lib/db";
import { users, tasks, tags, taskTags } from "../drizzle/schema";
import bcrypt from "bcryptjs";

async function seed() {
  console.log("üå± Starting seed...");

  // Create a test user
  const hashedPassword = await bcrypt.hash("password123", 10);
  const testUser = await db
    .insert(users)
    .values({
      email: "test@example.com",
      passwordHash: hashedPassword,
    })
    .returning();

  const userId = testUser[0].id;
  console.log(`‚úÖ Created test user: test@example.com (password: password123)`);

  // Create tags
  const tagColors = ["#FFDE59", "#4D96FF", "#FF6B9D", "#6BCB77", "#FF9F45", "#9B59B6"];
  const tagNames = ["Work", "Personal", "Urgent", "Bug", "Feature", "Design"];

  const createdTags = await db
    .insert(tags)
    .values(
      tagNames.map((name) => ({
        userId,
        name,
        color: tagColors[tagNames.indexOf(name)],
      }))
    )
    .returning();

  console.log(`‚úÖ Created ${createdTags.length} tags`);

  // Create sample tasks
  const sampleTasks = [
    { title: "Welcome to My Trello!", description: "This is your new task tracker. Try dragging this card!", status: "not_started" as const, tags: ["Personal"] },
    { title: "Learn the basics", description: "Click on any task to edit it inline. Try changing the status or adding tags.", status: "in_progress" as const, tags: ["Work"] },
    { title: "Drag and drop", description: "Drag tasks between columns to change their status. You can also reorder within a column.", status: "not_started" as const, tags: [] },
    { title: "Set up your workspace", description: "Add your own tasks and organize them with tags. Tags are auto-created when you type them!", status: "complete" as const, tags: ["Work", "Design"] },
    { title: "Try list view", description: "Toggle to list view to see all tasks in a table format with grouping options.", status: "not_started" as const, tags: [] },
    { title: "Keyboard shortcuts", description: "Press Enter to save, Escape to cancel. Click outside the card to save on blur.", status: "in_progress" as const, tags: ["Personal"] },
    { title: "Fix navigation bug", description: "The menu doesn't close on mobile devices", status: "not_started" as const, tags: ["Bug", "Urgent"] },
    { title: "Design new landing page", description: "Create wireframes for the new product launch page", status: "in_progress" as const, tags: ["Design", "Feature"] },
    { title: "Update documentation", description: "Add API documentation for the new endpoints", status: "not_started" as const, tags: ["Work", "Feature"] },
    { title: "Code review", description: "Review pull requests from the team", status: "complete" as const, tags: ["Work"] },
    { title: "Database optimization", description: "Optimize slow queries identified in production logs", status: "not_started" as const, tags: ["Urgent", "Bug"] },
    { title: "User feedback session", description: "Schedule and conduct user testing for the new feature", status: "not_started" as const, tags: ["Design", "Personal"] },
  ];

  let order = 0;
  const statusOrder: Record<string, number> = { not_started: 0, in_progress: 0, complete: 0 };

  for (const taskData of sampleTasks) {
    const createdTask = await db
      .insert(tasks)
      .values({
        userId,
        title: taskData.title,
        description: taskData.description,
        status: taskData.status,
        order: statusOrder[taskData.status]++,
      })
      .returning();

    // Add tag associations
    for (const tagName of taskData.tags) {
      const tag = createdTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
      if (tag) {
        await db.insert(taskTags).values({
          taskId: createdTask[0].id,
          tagId: tag.id,
        });
      }
    }
  }

  console.log(`‚úÖ Created ${sampleTasks.length} sample tasks`);
  console.log("\nüéâ Seed complete! You can now sign in with:");
  console.log("   Email: test@example.com");
  console.log("   Password: password123");
}

seed()
  .then(() => process.exit(0))
  .catch((error) => {
    console.error("Seed failed:", error);
    process.exit(1);
  });
```

```tsx
import { SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import TaskCard from "./TaskCard";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { PlusIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

interface TaskColumnProps {
  status: TaskStatus;
  label: string;
  color: string;
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onAddTask: () => void;
  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
}

export default function TaskColumn({
  status,
  label,
  color,
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  onAddTask,
  onUpdateTask,
  onDeleteTask,
}: TaskColumnProps) {
  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({
    id: status,
    data: { status },
  });

  const taskIds = tasks.map((t) => t.id.toString());

  return (
    <div className="flex flex-col h-full" role="region" aria-labelledby={`${status}-column-title`}>
      {/* Header */}
      <div className={`${color} border-3 border-black p-4 flex items-center justify-between`}>
        <h2 id={`${status}-column-title`} className="font-bold text-lg">{label}</h2>
        <span aria-label={`${tasks.length} tasks in ${label}`} className="bg-white border-3 border-black px-2 py-1 text-sm font-bold">
          {tasks.length}
        </span>
      </div>

      {/* Task List */}
      <div
        ref={setNodeRef}
        role="list"
        aria-label={`${label} tasks`}
        className="flex-1 bg-gray-50 border-3 border-t-0 border-black p-3 space-y-3 min-h-[400px] overflow-y-auto"
      >
        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
          {tasks.map((task) => (
            <TaskCard
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              availableTags={availableTags}
              onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
              onDelete={onDeleteTask}
            />
          ))}
        </SortableContext>

        {/* Add Task Button */}
        <button
          onClick={onAddTask}
          aria-label={`Add new task to ${label}`}
          className="w-full py-3 border-3 border-dashed border-black bg-white hover:bg-brutal-yellow hover:border-solid transition-all font-semibold flex items-center justify-center gap-2 group min-h-[48px]"
        >
          <PlusIcon className="w-5 h-5" aria-hidden="true" />
          <span>Add Task</span>
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

```

```
    41‚Üí- Create: Add new task via column button
```

```
   113‚Üí    if (listGrouping === "status") {
   114‚Üí      return STATUSES.map((status) => ({
   115‚Üí        key: status.value,
   116‚Üí        label: status.label,
   117‚Üí        tasks: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === status.value),
   118‚Üí      }));
   119‚Üí    } else if (listGrouping === "tags") {
   120‚Üí      const tagGroups = tags.map((tag) => ({
   121‚Üí        key: tag.id.toString(),
   122‚Üí        label: tag.name,
   123‚Üí        color: tag.color,
   124‚Üí        tasks: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.tags.some((tg) => tg.id === tag.id)),
   125‚Üí      }));
   126‚Üí      const untagged = {
   127‚Üí        key: "untagged",
   128‚Üí        label: "No Tags",
   129‚Üí        tasks: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.tags.length === 0),
   130‚Üí      };
   131‚Üí      return [...tagGroups, untagged].filter((g) => g.tasks.length > 0);
   132‚Üí    }
   133‚Üí    return [{ key: "all", label: "All Tasks", tasks: filteredTasks }];
   134‚Üí  };
   135‚Üí
   136‚Üí  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => {
   137‚Üí    const { active } = event;
   138‚Üí    setActiveId(parseInt(active.id as string));
   139‚Üí  };
   140‚Üí
   141‚Üí  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
   142‚Üí    const { active, over } = event;
   143‚Üí    setActiveId(null);
   144‚Üí
   145‚Üí    if (!over) return;
   146‚Üí
   147‚Üí    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
   148‚Üí    const overId = parseInt(over.id as string);
   149‚Üí
   150‚Üí    // Find the active task
   151‚Üí    const activeTask = tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId);
   152‚Üí    if (!activeTask) return;
   153‚Üí
   154‚Üí    // Find over task or column
   155‚Üí    const overTask = tasks.find((t) => t.id === overId);
   156‚Üí    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;
   157‚Üí
   158‚Üí    let newStatus = activeTask.status;
   159‚Üí    let newTasks = [...tasks];
   160‚Üí    let activeIndex = newTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === activeId);
   161‚Üí
   162‚Üí    if (overTask) {
   163‚Üí      // Dropping on another task
   164‚Üí      newStatus = overTask.status;
   165‚Üí      const overIndex = newTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === overId);
   166‚Üí
   167‚Üí      if (activeTask.status === newStatus) {
   168‚Üí        // Same column - reorder
   169‚Üí        newTasks = arrayMove(newTasks, activeIndex, overIndex);
   170‚Üí      } else {
   171‚Üí        // Different column - change status and move to position
   172‚Üí        newTasks[activeIndex] = { ...activeTask, status: newStatus };
   173‚Üí        newTasks.splice(overIndex, 0, newTasks.splice(activeIndex, 1)[0]);
   174‚Üí      }
   175‚Üí    } else if (overStatus) {
   176‚Üí      // Dropping on a column
   177‚Üí      newStatus = overStatus;
   178‚Üí      newTasks[activeIndex] = { ...activeTask, status: newStatus };
   179‚Üí    }
   180‚Üí
   181‚Üí    // Recalculate orders within each status
   182‚Üí    const updates: Array<{ id: number; status: TaskStatus; order: number }> = [];
   183‚Üí    STATUSES.forEach(({ value: status }) => {
   184‚Üí      newTasks
   185‚Üí        .filter((t) => t.status === status)
   186‚Üí        .forEach((task, index) => {
   187‚Üí          updates.push({ id: task.id, status, order: index });
   188‚Üí        });
   189‚Üí    });
   190‚Üí
   191‚Üí    // Optimistic update
   192‚Üí    setTasks(newTasks);
   193‚Üí
   194‚Üí    // Persist to server
   195‚Üí    try {
   196‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks/reorder", {
   197‚Üí        method: "POST",
   198‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   199‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ updates }),
   200‚Üí      });
   201‚Üí
   202‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   203‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to reorder");
   204‚Üí      }
   205‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   206‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to reorder tasks", {
   207‚Üí        action: {
   208‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   209‚Üí          onClick: () => {
   210‚Üí            // Re-attempt the reorder with current task state
   211‚Üí            handleDragEnd({ active: activeId ? { id: activeId.toString() } as any : null, over: null } as any);
   212‚Üí          },
   213‚Üí        },
   214‚Üí      });
   215‚Üí      fetchTasks(); // Revert
   216‚Üí    }
   217‚Üí  };
   218‚Üí
   219‚Üí  const handleCreateTask = async (data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => {
   220‚Üí    try {
   221‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
   222‚Üí        method: "POST",
   223‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   224‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(data),
   225‚Üí      });
   226‚Üí
   227‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   228‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to create task");
   229‚Üí      }
   230‚Üí
   231‚Üí      const newTask = await response.json();
   232‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => [...prev, newTask]);
   233‚Üí      setIsAddingTask(false);
   234‚Üí      toast.success("Task created");
   235‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   236‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to create task", {
   237‚Üí        action: {
   238‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   239‚Üí          onClick: () => handleCreateTask(data),
   240‚Üí        },
   241‚Üí      });
   242‚Üí    }
   243‚Üí  };
   244‚Üí
   245‚Üí  const handleUpdateTask = async (id: number, data: Partial<Task> | { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => {
   246‚Üí    try {
   247‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   248‚Üí        method: "PATCH",
   249‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   250‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(data),
   251‚Üí      });
   252‚Üí
   253‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   254‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to update task");
   255‚Üí      }
   256‚Üí
   257‚Üí      const updatedTask = await response.json();
   258‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.map((t) => (t.id === id ? updatedTask : t)));
   259‚Üí      toast.success("Task updated");
   260‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   261‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to update task", {
   262‚Üí        action: {
   263‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   264‚Üí          onClick: () => handleUpdateTask(id, data),
   265‚Üí        },
   266‚Üí      });
   267‚Üí    }
   268‚Üí  };
   269‚Üí
   270‚Üí  const handleDeleteTask = async (id: number) => {
   271‚Üí    try {
   272‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   273‚Üí        method: "DELETE",
   274‚Üí      });
   275‚Üí
   276‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   277‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to delete task");
   278‚Üí      }
   279‚Üí
   280‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.filter((t) => t.id !== id));
   281‚Üí      toast.success("Task deleted");
   282‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   283‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to delete task", {
   284‚Üí        action: {
   285‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   286‚Üí          onClick: () => handleDeleteTask(id),
   287‚Üí        },
   288‚Üí      });
   289‚Üí    }
   290‚Üí  };
   291‚Üí
   292‚Üí  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId) : null;
   293‚Üí
   294‚Üí  if (isLoading) {
   295‚Üí    return (
   296‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
   297‚Üí        <div className="text-2xl font-bold">Loading...</div>
   298‚Üí      </div>
   299‚Üí    );
   300‚Üí  }
   301‚Üí
   302‚Üí  return (
   303‚Üí    <div className="min-h-screen bg-brutal-white">
   304‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   305‚Üí      <header className="border-brutal border-b-3 border-black bg-white sticky top-0 z-10">
   306‚Üí        <div className="max-w-[1800px] mx-auto px-4 py-4">
   307‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center justify-between flex-wrap gap-4">
   308‚Üí            <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight">My Trello</h1>
   309‚Üí
   310‚Üí            <div className="flex items-center gap-3 flex-wrap">
   311‚Üí              {/* Search */}
   312‚Üí              <div className="relative">
   313‚Üí                <MagnifyingGlassIcon className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-5 h-5" />
   314‚Üí                <input
   315‚Üí                  type="text"
   316‚Üí                  placeholder="Search tasks..."
   317‚Üí                  value={searchQuery}
   318‚Üí                  onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
   319‚Üí                  className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm min-w-[200px]"
   320‚Üí                />
   321‚Üí              </div>
   322‚Üí
   323‚Üí              {/* Tag Filter */}
   324‚Üí              {filterTag ? (
   325‚Üí                <button
   326‚Üí                  onClick={() => setFilterTag(null)}
   327‚Üí                  className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black bg-brutal-pink text-white font-semibold text-sm hover:translate-x-[1px] hover:translate-y-[1px] hover:shadow-brutal-sm active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] active:shadow-none transition-all shadow-brutal-sm"
   328‚Üí                >
   329‚Üí                  <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   330‚Üí                  <span>Clear Filter</span>
   331‚Üí                  <XMarkIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   332‚Üí                </button>
   333‚Üí              ) : (
   334‚Üí                <div className="relative group">
   335‚Üí                  <button className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black bg-white shadow-brutal-sm font-semibold text-sm hover:translate-x-[1px] hover:translate-y-[1px] hover:shadow-none active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] transition-all">
   336‚Üí                    <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   337‚Üí                    <span>Filter</span>
   338‚Üí                  </button>
   339‚Üí                  <div className="absolute right-0 top-full mt-2 w-48 bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal hidden group-hover:block z-20">
   340‚Üí                    <div className="p-2">
   341‚Üí                      <div className="text-xs font-bold mb-2 text-gray-500">FILTER BY TAG</div>
   342‚Üí                      {tags.map((tag) => (
   343‚Üí                        <button
   344‚Üí                          key={tag.id}

   346‚Üí                          className="w-full text-left px-2 py-1 hover:bg-gray-100 flex items-center gap-2"
   347‚Üí                        >
   348‚Üí                          <span

   351‚Üí                          />
   352‚Üí                          <span className="text-sm">{tag.name}</span>
   353‚Üí                          <span className="text-xs text-gray-400 ml-auto">{tag.taskCount}</span>
   354‚Üí                        </button>
   355‚Üí                      ))}
   356‚Üí                      {tags.length === 0 && (
   357‚Üí                        <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">No tags yet</div>
   358‚Üí                      )}
   359‚Üí                    </div>
   360‚Üí                  </div>
   361‚Üí                </div>
   362‚Üí              )}
   363‚Üí
   364‚Üí              {/* View Toggle */}
   365‚Üí              <div className="flex border-3 border-black">
   366‚Üí                <button
   367‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("board")}
   368‚Üí                  className={cn(
   369‚Üí                    "p-2 font-semibold text-sm",
   370‚Üí                    view === "board" ? "bg-brutal-yellow" : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   371‚Üí                  )}
   372‚Üí                >
   373‚Üí                  <Squares2X2Icon className="w-5 h-5" />
   374‚Üí                </button>
   375‚Üí                <button
   376‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("list")}
   377‚Üí                  className={cn(
   378‚Üí                    "p-2 font-semibold text-sm border-l-3 border-black",
   379‚Üí                    view === "list" ? "bg-brutal-yellow" : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   380‚Üí                  )}
   381‚Üí                >
   382‚Üí                  <ListBulletIcon className="w-5 h-5" />
   383‚Üí                </button>
   384‚Üí              </div>
   385‚Üí
   386‚Üí              {/* Sign Out */}
   387‚Üí              <button
   388‚Üí                onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
   389‚Üí                className="flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 border-3 border-black bg-brutal-orange text-white font-semibold text-sm hover:translate-x-[1px] hover:translate-y-[1px] hover:shadow-brutal-sm active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] active:shadow-none transition-all shadow-brutal-sm"
   390‚Üí              >
   391‚Üí                <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   392‚Üí                <span>Sign Out</span>
   393‚Üí              </button>
   394‚Üí            </div>
   395‚Üí          </div>
   396‚Üí        </div>
   397‚Üí      </header>
   398‚Üí
   399‚Üí      {/* List View Grouping Options */}
   400‚Üí      {view === "list" && (
   401‚Üí        <div className="max-w-[1800px] mx-auto px-4 py-3 bg-white border-b-3 border-black">
   402‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
   403‚Üí            <span className="font-semibold text-sm">Group by:</span>
   404‚Üí            <div className="flex border-3 border-black">
   405‚Üí              {(["none", "status", "tags"] as const).map((option) => (
   406‚Üí                <button
   407‚Üí                  key={option}
   408‚Üí                  onClick={() => setListGrouping(option)}
   409‚Üí                  className={cn(
   410‚Üí                    "px-3 py-1 text-sm font-semibold capitalize",
   411‚Üí                    listGrouping === option ? "bg-brutal-blue text-white" : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100",
   412‚Üí                    option !== "none" && "border-l-3 border-black"
   413‚Üí                  )}
   414‚Üí                >
   415‚Üí                  {option}
   416‚Üí                </button>
   417‚Üí              ))}
   418‚Üí            </div>
   419‚Üí          </div>
   420‚Üí        </div>
   421‚Üí      )}
   422‚Üí
   423‚Üí      {/* Main Content */}
   424‚Üí      <main className="max-w-[1800px] mx-auto p-4">
   425‚Üí        {view === "board" ? (
   426‚Üí          <DndContext
   427‚Üí            sensors={sensors}
   428‚Üí            collisionDetection={closestCorners}
   429‚Üí            onDragStart={handleDragStart}
   430‚Üí            onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}
   431‚Üí          >
   432‚Üí            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
   433‚Üí              {STATUSES.map((status) => (
   434‚Üí                <TaskColumn
   435‚Üí                  key={status.value}
   436‚Üí                  status={status.value}
   437‚Üí                  label={status.label}
   438‚Üí                  color={status.color}
   439‚Üí                  tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
   440‚Üí                  availableTags={tags}
   441‚Üí                  onAddTask={() => {
   442‚Üí                    setAddingTaskStatus(status.value);
   443‚Üí                    setIsAddingTask(true);
   444‚Üí                  }}
   445‚Üí                  onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   446‚Üí                  onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   447‚Üí                />
   448‚Üí              ))}
   449‚Üí            </div>
   450‚Üí
   451‚Üí            <DragOverlay>
   452‚Üí              {activeTask ? (
   453‚Üí                <div className="w-72 opacity-90 rotate-3">
   454‚Üí                  <TaskCard
   455‚Üí                    task={activeTask}
   456‚Üí                    availableTags={tags}
   457‚Üí                    onUpdate={() => {}}
   458‚Üí                    onDelete={() => {}}
   459‚Üí                  />
   460‚Üí                </div>
   461‚Üí              ) : null}
   462‚Üí            </DragOverlay>
   463‚Üí          </DndContext>
   464‚Üí        ) : (
   465‚Üí          <ListView
   466‚Üí            groups={getGroupedTasks()}
   467‚Üí            availableTags={tags}
   468‚Üí            sortBy={listSortBy}
   469‚Üí            onSortChange={setListSortBy}
   470‚Üí            onAddTask={() => {
   471‚Üí              setAddingTaskStatus("not_started");
   472‚Üí              setIsAddingTask(true);
   473‚Üí            }}
   474‚Üí            onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   475‚Üí            onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   476‚Üí          />
   477‚Üí        )}
   478‚Üí      </main>
   479‚Üí
   480‚Üí      {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
   481‚Üí      {isAddingTask && (
   482‚Üí        <InlineTaskForm
   483‚Üí          defaultStatus={addingTaskStatus}
   484‚Üí          availableTags={tags}
   485‚Üí          onSave={(data) => {
   486‚Üí            handleCreateTask({ ...data, status: addingTaskStatus });
   487‚Üí            setIsAddingTask(false);
   488‚Üí          }}
   489‚Üí          onCancel={() => setIsAddingTask(false)}
   490‚Üí        />
   491‚Üí      )}
   492‚Üí    </div>
   493‚Üí  );
   494‚Üí}
   495‚Üí
   496‚Üí// ListView Component
   497‚Üífunction ListView({
   498‚Üí  groups,
   499‚Üí  availableTags,
   500‚Üí  sortBy,
   501‚Üí  onSortChange,
   502‚Üí  onAddTask,
   503‚Üí  onUpdateTask,
   504‚Üí  onDeleteTask,
   505‚Üí}: {
   506‚Üí  groups: Array<{
   507‚Üí    key: string;
   508‚Üí    label: string;
   509‚Üí    color?: string;
   510‚Üí    tasks: Task[];
   511‚Üí  }>;
   512‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   513‚Üí  sortBy: "order" | "title" | "date";
   514‚Üí  onSortChange: (sort: "order" | "title" | "date") => void;
   515‚Üí  onAddTask: () => void;
   516‚Üí  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   517‚Üí  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
   518‚Üí}) {
   519‚Üí  // Sort groups' tasks based on sortBy
   520‚Üí  const sortedGroups = groups.map((group) => ({
   521‚Üí    ...group,
   522‚Üí    tasks: [...group.tasks].sort((a, b) => {
   523‚Üí      if (sortBy === "title") {
   524‚Üí        return a.title.localeCompare(b.title);
   525‚Üí      } else if (sortBy === "date") {
   526‚Üí        return b.createdAt.getTime() - a.createdAt.getTime();
   527‚Üí      } else {
   528‚Üí        return a.order - b.order;
   529‚Üí      }
   530‚Üí    }),
   531‚Üí  }));
   532‚Üí
   533‚Üí  return (
   534‚Üí    <div className="space-y-6">
   535‚Üí      <div className="flex justify-between items-center flex-wrap gap-4">
   536‚Üí        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold">All Tasks</h2>
   537‚Üí        <div className="flex gap-3">
   538‚Üí          {/* Sort Options */}
   539‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   540‚Üí            <span className="text-sm font-bold">Sort by:</span>
   541‚Üí            <div className="flex border-3 border-black">
   542‚Üí              {[
   543‚Üí                { value: "order" as const, label: "Order" },
   544‚Üí                { value: "title" as const, label: "Title" },
   545‚Üí                { value: "date" as const, label: "Date" },
   546‚Üí              ].map((option, index) => (
   547‚Üí                <button
   548‚Üí                  key={option.value}
   549‚Üí                  onClick={() => onSortChange(option.value)}
   550‚Üí                  className={`px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold min-h-[44px] ${
   551‚Üí                    sortBy === option.value
   552‚Üí                      ? "bg-brutal-blue text-white"
   553‚Üí                      : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   554‚Üí                  } ${index > 0 ? "border-l-3 border-black" : ""}`}
   555‚Üí                  aria-label={`Sort by ${option.label}`}
   556‚Üí                  aria-pressed={sortBy === option.value}
   557‚Üí                >
   558‚Üí                  {option.label}
   559‚Üí                </button>
   560‚Üí              ))}
   561‚Üí            </div>
   562‚Üí          </div>
   563‚Üí          <button
   564‚Üí            onClick={onAddTask}
   565‚Üí            className="px-6 py-3 bg-brutal-green border-brutal border-black shadow-brutal text-white font-bold hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-brutal-sm active:translate-x-[4px] active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none transition-all"
   566‚Üí          >
   567‚Üí            + Add Task
   568‚Üí          </button>
   569‚Üí        </div>
   570‚Üí      </div>
   571‚Üí
   572‚Üí      {sortedGroups.map((group) => (
   573‚Üí        <div key={group.key} className="bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal">
   574‚Üí          <div className="px-4 py-3 border-b-3 border-black bg-gray-50 flex items-center gap-3">
   575‚Üí            {group.color && (
   576‚Üí              <span
   577‚Üí                className="w-4 h-4 rounded-full"
   578‚Üí                style={{ backgroundColor: group.color }}
   579‚Üí              />
   580‚Üí            )}
   581‚Üí            <h3 className="font-bold">{group.label}</h3>
   582‚Üí            <span className="text-sm text-gray-500">({group.tasks.length})</span>
   583‚Üí          </div>
   584‚Üí          <div className="divide-y-3 divide-black">
   585‚Üí            {group.tasks.map((task) => (
   586‚Üí              <ListViewTaskRow
   587‚Üí                key={task.id}
   588‚Üí                task={task}
   589‚Üí                availableTags={availableTags}
   590‚Üí                onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
   591‚Üí                onDelete={onDeleteTask}
   592‚Üí              />
   593‚Üí            ))}
   594‚Üí            {group.tasks.length === 0 && (
   595‚Üí              <div className="p-8 text-center text-gray-400">No tasks</div>
   596‚Üí            )}
   597‚Üí          </div>
   598‚Üí        </div>
   599‚Üí      ))}
   600‚Üí    </div>
   601‚Üí  );
   602‚Üí}
   603‚Üí
   604‚Üí// ListView Task Row with inline editing
   605‚Üífunction ListViewTaskRow({
   606‚Üí  task,
   607‚Üí  availableTags,
   608‚Üí  onUpdate,
   609‚Üí  onDelete,
   610‚Üí}: {
   611‚Üí  task: Task;
   612‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   613‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   614‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   615‚Üí}) {
   616‚Üí  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
   617‚Üí  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
   618‚Üí  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
   619‚Üí  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
   620‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   621‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
   622‚Üí  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
   623‚Üí  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
   624‚Üí  const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
   625‚Üí
   626‚Üí  const availableColors = [
   627‚Üí    "#FFDE59", "#4D96FF", "#FF6B9D", "#6BCB77", "#FF9F45", "#9B59B6",
   628‚Üí  ];
   629‚Üí
   630‚Üí  const handleSave = () => {
   631‚Üí    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
   632‚Üí      setTitleError("Title is required");
   633‚Üí      return;
   634‚Üí    }
   635‚Üí    setTitleError("");
   636‚Üí    onUpdate(task.id, {
   637‚Üí      title: editTitle.trim(),
   638‚Üí      description: editDescription.trim(),
   639‚Üí      status: editStatus,
   640‚Üí      tags: selectedTags,
   641‚Üí    });
   642‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   643‚Üí  };
   644‚Üí
   645‚Üí  const handleCancel = () => {
   646‚Üí    setEditTitle(task.title);
   647‚Üí    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
   648‚Üí    setEditStatus(task.status);
   649‚Üí    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
   650‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   651‚Üí    setTitleError("");
   652‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   653‚Üí  };
   654‚Üí
   655‚Üí  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
   656‚Üí    if (e.key === "Enter" && !e.shiftKey) {
   657‚Üí      e.preventDefault();
   658‚Üí      handleSave();
   659‚Üí    } else if (e.key === "Escape") {
   660‚Üí      handleCancel();
   661‚Üí    }
   662‚Üí  };
   663‚Üí
   664‚Üí  // Handle click outside to save (blur behavior)
   665‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   666‚Üí    const handleClickOutside = (event: MouseEvent) => {
   667‚Üí      if (containerRef.current && !containerRef.current.contains(event.target as Node)) {
   668‚Üí        if (isEditing) {
   669‚Üí          handleSave();
   670‚Üí        }
   671‚Üí      }
   672‚Üí    };
   673‚Üí
   674‚Üí    document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside);
   675‚Üí    return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside);
   676‚Üí  }, [isEditing, editTitle, editDescription, editStatus, selectedTags]);
   677‚Üí
   678‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   679‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   680‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   681‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   682‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   683‚Üí    }
   684‚Üí  };
   685‚Üí
   686‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
   687‚Üí    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
   688‚Üí  };
   689‚Üí
   690‚Üí  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
   691‚Üí    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
   692‚Üí    return existing?.color || availableColors[Math.floor(Math.random() * availableColors.length)];
   693‚Üí  };
   694‚Üí
   695‚Üí  const handleDeleteClick = () => {
   696‚Üí    setShowDeleteConfirm(true);
   697‚Üí  };
   698‚Üí
   699‚Üí  const confirmDelete = () => {
   700‚Üí    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
   701‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   702‚Üí    onDelete(task.id);
   703‚Üí  };
   704‚Üí
   705‚Üí  const cancelDelete = () => {
   706‚Üí    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
   707‚Üí  };
   708‚Üí
   709‚Üí  if (isEditing) {
   710‚Üí    return (
   711‚Üí      <div className="p-4 bg-brutal-blue/10 relative">
   712‚Üí        {/* Delete Confirmation Dialog */}
   713‚Üí        {showDeleteConfirm && (
   714‚Üí          <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-white/95 z-20 flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4">
   715‚Üí            <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="w-12 h-12 text-brutal-pink mb-3" />
   716‚Üí            <h3 className="font-bold text-lg mb-2">Delete this task?</h3>
   717‚Üí            <p className="text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4 text-center">This action cannot be undone.</p>
   718‚Üí            <div className="flex gap-3">
   719‚Üí              <button
   720‚Üí                type="button"
   721‚Üí                onClick={cancelDelete}
   722‚Üí                className="px-4 py-2 bg-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-gray-100"
   723‚Üí              >
   724‚Üí                Cancel
   725‚Üí              </button>
   726‚Üí              <button
   727‚Üí                type="button"
   728‚Üí                onClick={confirmDelete}
   729‚Üí                className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-pink text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-pink-600"
   730‚Üí              >
   731‚Üí                Delete
   732‚Üí              </button>
   733‚Üí            </div>
   734‚Üí          </div>
   735‚Üí        )}
   736‚Üí
   737‚Üí        <div ref={containerRef}>
   738‚Üí          <div>
   739‚Üí            <input
   740‚Üí              type="text"
   741‚Üí              value={editTitle}
   742‚Üí              onChange={(e) => {
   743‚Üí                setEditTitle(e.target.value);
   744‚Üí                setTitleError("");
   745‚Üí              }}
   746‚Üí              onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
   747‚Üí              className={`w-full px-3 py-2 border-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue font-semibold text-lg mb-1 ${
   748‚Üí                titleError ? "border-red-500" : "border-black"
   749‚Üí              }`}
   750‚Üí              placeholder="Task title..."
   751‚Üí              autoFocus
   752‚Üí            />
   753‚Üí            {titleError && (
   754‚Üí              <p className="text-red-500 text-xs font-semibold mt-1 flex items-center gap-1">
   755‚Üí                <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   756‚Üí                {titleError}
   757‚Üí              </p>
   758‚Üí            )}
   759‚Üí          </div>
   760‚Üí
   761‚Üí          <textarea
   762‚Üí            value={editDescription}
   763‚Üí            onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
   764‚Üí            className="w-full px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm mb-3 resize-y min-h-[60px]"
   765‚Üí            placeholder="Add description..."
   766‚Üí            rows={2}
   767‚Üí          />
   768‚Üí
   769‚Üí          <div className="mb-3">
   770‚Üí            <div className="grid grid-cols-3 gap-2">
   771‚Üí              {[
   772‚Üí                { value: "not_started" as TaskStatus, label: "Not Started", color: "bg-brutal-pink" },
   773‚Üí                { value: "in_progress" as TaskStatus, label: "In Progress", color: "bg-brutal-blue" },
   774‚Üí                { value: "complete" as TaskStatus, label: "Complete", color: "bg-brutal-green" },
   775‚Üí              ].map((s) => (
   776‚Üí                <button
   777‚Üí                  key={s.value}
   778‚Üí                  type="button"
   779‚Üí                  onClick={() => setEditStatus(s.value)}
   780‚Üí                  className={`py-2 px-3 border-3 border-black font-semibold text-xs transition-all ${
   781‚Üí                    editStatus === s.value
   782‚Üí                      ? `${s.color} text-white shadow-brutal-sm`
   783‚Üí                      : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   784‚Üí                  }`}
   785‚Üí                >
   786‚Üí                  {s.label}
   787‚Üí                </button>
   788‚Üí              ))}
   789‚Üí            </div>
   790‚Üí          </div>
   791‚Üí
   792‚Üí          <div className="mb-3">
   793‚Üí            <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
   794‚Üí              <input
   795‚Üí                type="text"
   796‚Üí                value={tagInput}
   797‚Üí                onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
   798‚Üí                onKeyDown={(e) => {
   799‚Üí                  if (e.key === "Enter") {
   800‚Üí                    e.preventDefault();
   801‚Üí                    handleAddTag();
   802‚Üí                  }
   803‚Üí                }}
   804‚Üí                className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm"
   805‚Üí                placeholder="Add tag..."
   806‚Üí              />
   807‚Üí              <button
   808‚Üí                type="button"
   809‚Üí                onClick={handleAddTag}
   810‚Üí                className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-blue text-white border-3 border-black font-semibold text-sm hover:bg-blue-600"
   811‚Üí              >
   812‚Üí                Add
   813‚Üí              </button>
   814‚Üí            </div>
   815‚Üí            {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
   816‚Üí              <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2">
   817‚Üí                {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
   818‚Üí                  <span
   819‚Üí                    key={tagName}
   820‚Üí                    className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-full text-white flex items-center gap-1"
   821‚Üí                    style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
   822‚Üí                  >
   823‚Üí                    {tagName}
   824‚Üí                    <button
   825‚Üí                      type="button"
   826‚Üí                      onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
   827‚Üí                      className="hover:opacity-70"
   828‚Üí                    >
   829‚Üí                      <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   830‚Üí                    </button>
   831‚Üí                  </span>
   832‚Üí                ))}
   833‚Üí              </div>
   834‚Üí            )}
   835‚Üí          </div>
   836‚Üí
   837‚Üí          <div className="flex gap-2">
   838‚Üí            <button
   839‚Üí              type="button"
   840‚Üí              onClick={handleDeleteClick}
   841‚Üí              className="px-3 py-2 bg-brutal-pink text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-pink-600"
   842‚Üí            >
   843‚Üí              Delete
   844‚Üí            </button>
   845‚Üí            <div className="flex-1" />
   846‚Üí            <button
   847‚Üí              type="button"
   848‚Üí              onClick={handleCancel}
   849‚Üí              className="px-4 py-2 bg-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-gray-100"
   850‚Üí            >
   851‚Üí              Cancel
   852‚Üí            </button>
   853‚Üí            <button
   854‚Üí              type="button"
   855‚Üí              onClick={handleSave}
   856‚Üí              disabled={!editTitle.trim()}
   857‚Üí              className="px-4 py-2 bg-brutal-green text-white border-3 border-black font-bold text-sm hover:bg-green-600 disabled:opacity-50"
   858‚Üí            >
   859‚Üí              Save
   860‚Üí            </button>
   861‚Üí          </div>
   862‚Üí        </div>
   863‚Üí      </div>
   864‚Üí    );
   865‚Üí  }
   866‚Üí
   867‚Üí  return (
   868‚Üí    <div
   869‚Üí      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
   870‚Üí      className="p-4 hover:bg-gray-50 cursor-pointer transition-colors"
   871‚Üí    >
   872‚Üí      <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-4">
   873‚Üí        <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
   874‚Üí          <h4 className="font-semibold text-lg truncate">{task.title}</h4>
   875‚Üí          {task.description && (
   876‚Üí            <p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1 line-clamp-2">
   877‚Üí              {task.description}
   878‚Üí            </p>
   879‚Üí          )}
   880‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-3 mt-2">
   881‚Üí            <StatusBadge status={task.status} />
   882‚Üí            <span className="text-xs text-gray-400">
   883‚Üí              {new Date(task.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
   884‚Üí            </span>
   885‚Üí          </div>
   886‚Üí        </div>
   887‚Üí        <div className="flex gap-1 flex-wrap justify-end">
   888‚Üí          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
   889‚Üí            <span
   890‚Üí              key={tag.id}
   891‚Üí              className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-semibold rounded-full text-white"
   892‚Üí              style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
   893‚Üí            >
   894‚Üí              {tag.name}
   895‚Üí            </span>
   896‚Üí          ))}
   897‚Üí        </div>
   898‚Üí      </div>
   899‚Üí    </div>
   900‚Üí  );
   901‚Üí}
   902‚Üí
   903‚Üí// Inline Task Form Component
   904‚Üífunction InlineTaskForm({
   905‚Üí  defaultStatus,
   906‚Üí  availableTags,
   907‚Üí  onSave,
   908‚Üí  onCancel,
   909‚Üí}: {
   910‚Üí  defaultStatus: TaskStatus;
   911‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   912‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   913‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   914‚Üí}) {
   915‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   916‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   917‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   918‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>([]);
   919‚Üí
   920‚Üí  const availableColors = [
   921‚Üí    "#FFDE59", "#4D96FF", "#FF6B9D", "#6BCB77", "#FF9F45", "#9B59B6",
   922‚Üí  ];
   923‚Üí
   924‚Üí  const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   925‚Üí    e.preventDefault();
   926‚Üí    if (!title.trim()) return;
   927‚Üí    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
   928‚Üí  };
   929‚Üí
   930‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   931‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   932‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   933‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   934‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   935‚Üí    }
   936‚Üí  };
   937‚Üí
   938‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
   939‚Üí    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
   940‚Üí  };
   941‚Üí
   942‚Üí  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
   943‚Üí    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
   944‚Üí    return existing?.color || availableColors[Math.floor(Math.random() * availableColors.length)];
   945‚Üí  };
   946‚Üí
   947‚Üí  return (
   948‚Üí    <div className="fixed inset-0 bg-black/50 flex items-center justify-center p-4 z-50">
   949‚Üí      <div className="bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal-lg w-full max-w-lg">
   950‚Üí        <div className="border-b-3 border-black p-4 flex items-center justify-between bg-brutal-yellow">
   951‚Üí          <h2 className="text-xl font-bold">New Task</h2>
   952‚Üí          <button
   953‚Üí            onClick={onCancel}
   954‚Üí            className="p-2 hover:bg-black hover:text-white transition-colors"
   955‚Üí          >
   956‚Üí            <XMarkIcon className="w-6 h-6" />
   957‚Üí          </button>
   958‚Üí        </div>
   959‚Üí
   960‚Üí        <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="p-6 space-y-6">
   961‚Üí          <div>
   962‚Üí            <label htmlFor="new-title" className="block text-sm font-bold mb-2">Title *</label>
   963‚Üí            <input
   964‚Üí              id="new-title"
   965‚Üí              type="text"
   966‚Üí              value={title}
   967‚Üí              onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   968‚Üí              className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-lg"
   969‚Üí              placeholder="What needs to be done?"
   970‚Üí              required
   971‚Üí              autoFocus
   972‚Üí            />
   973‚Üí          </div>
   974‚Üí
   975‚Üí          <div>
   976‚Üí            <label htmlFor="new-description" className="block text-sm font-bold mb-2">Description</label>
   977‚Üí            <textarea
   978‚Üí              id="new-description"
   979‚Üí              value={description}
   980‚Üí              onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   981‚Üí              className="w-full px-4 py-3 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue min-h-[120px] resize-y"
   982‚Üí              placeholder="Add more details..."
   983‚Üí              rows={4}
   984‚Üí            />
   985‚Üí          </div>
   986‚Üí
   987‚Üí          <div>
   988‚Üí            <label htmlFor="new-tags" className="block text-sm font-bold mb-2">Tags</label>
   989‚Üí            <div className="flex gap-2 mb-3">
   990‚Üí              <input
   991‚Üí                id="new-tags"
   992‚Üí                type="text"
   993‚Üí                value={tagInput}
   994‚Üí                onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
   995‚Üí                onKeyDown={(e) => {
   996‚Üí                  if (e.key === "Enter") {
```

# Cancel Ralph

To cancel the Ralph loop:

1. Check if `.claude/ralph-loop.local.md` exists using Bash: `test -f .claude/ralph-loop.local.md && echo "EXISTS" || echo "NOT_FOUND"`

2. **If NOT_FOUND**: Say "No active Ralph loop found."

3. **If EXISTS**:
   - Read `.claude/ralph-loop.local.md` to get the current iteration number from the `iteration:` field
   - Remove the file using Bash: `rm .claude/ralph-loop.local.md`
   - Report: "Cancelled Ralph loop (was at iteration N)" where N is the iteration value

```css
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

/* Import Inter font */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800;900&display=swap');

:root {
  --background: #0a0a0a;
  --foreground: #ededed;
  --card-bg: #141414;
  --card-hover: #1a1a1a;
  --border-color: #262626;
  --accent: #404040;
  --accent-hover: #525252;
}

body {
  color: var(--foreground);
  background: var(--background);
  font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

/* Custom scrollbar */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--background);
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: var(--accent);
  border-radius: 4px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: var(--accent-hover);
}

/* Smooth transitions */
* {
  transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  transition-duration: 150ms;
}

/* Focus styles */
*:focus-visible {
  outline: 2px solid #525252;
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

@layer utilities {
  .text-balance {
    text-wrap: balance;
  }

  /* Fade in animation */
  @keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(10px);
    }
    to {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }
  }

  .animate-fade-in {
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
  }

  /* Shimmer effect for loading */
  @keyframes shimmer {
    0% {
      background-position: -1000px 0;
    }
    100% {
      background-position: 1000px 0;
    }
  }

  .shimmer {
    animation: shimmer 2s infinite;
    background: linear-gradient(
      to right,
      var(--card-bg) 0%,
      var(--accent) 50%,
      var(--card-bg) 100%
    );
    background-size: 1000px 100%;
  }

  /* Pulse glow effect */
  @keyframes pulse-glow {
    0%, 100% {
      box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    }
    50% {
      box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    }
  }

  .pulse-glow {
    animation: pulse-glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
  }

  /* Subtle gradient background */
  .bg-gradient-subtle {
    background: radial-gradient(ellipse at top, #1a1a1a 0%, #0a0a0a 100%);
  }
}
```

```
   221‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
```
