   223‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   224‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(data),
   225‚Üí      });
   226‚Üí
   227‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   228‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to create task");
   229‚Üí      }
   230‚Üí
   231‚Üí      const newTask = await response.json();
   232‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => [...prev, newTask]);
   233‚Üí      setIsAddingTask(false);
   234‚Üí      toast.success("Task created");
   235‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   236‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to create task", {
   237‚Üí        action: {
   238‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   239‚Üí          onClick: () => handleCreateTask(data),
   240‚Üí        },
   241‚Üí      });
   242‚Üí    }
   243‚Üí  };
   244‚Üí
   245‚Üí  const handleUpdateTask = async (id: number, data: Partial<Task> | { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => {
   246‚Üí    try {
   247‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   248‚Üí        method: "PATCH",
   249‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   250‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(data),
   251‚Üí      });
   252‚Üí
   253‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   254‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to update task");
   255‚Üí      }
   256‚Üí
   257‚Üí      const updatedTask = await response.json();
   258‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.map((t) => (t.id === id ? updatedTask : t)));
   259‚Üí      toast.success("Task updated");
   260‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   261‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to update task", {
   262‚Üí        action: {
   263‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   264‚Üí          onClick: () => handleUpdateTask(id, data),
   265‚Üí        },
   266‚Üí      });
   267‚Üí    }
   268‚Üí  };
   269‚Üí
   270‚Üí  const handleDeleteTask = async (id: number) => {
   271‚Üí    try {
   272‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   273‚Üí        method: "DELETE",
   274‚Üí      });
   275‚Üí
   276‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   277‚Üí        throw new Error("Failed to delete task");
   278‚Üí      }
   279‚Üí
   280‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.filter((t) => t.id !== id));
   281‚Üí      toast.success("Task deleted");
   282‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   283‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to delete task", {
   284‚Üí        action: {
   285‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   286‚Üí          onClick: () => handleDeleteTask(id),
   287‚Üí        },
   288‚Üí      });
   289‚Üí    }
   290‚Üí  };
   291‚Üí
   292‚Üí  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId) : null;
   293‚Üí
   294‚Üí  if (isLoading) {
   295‚Üí    return (
   296‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center">
   297‚Üí        <div className="text-2xl font-bold">Loading...</div>
   298‚Üí      </div>
   299‚Üí    );
   300‚Üí  }
   301‚Üí
   302‚Üí  return (
   303‚Üí    <div className="min-h-screen bg-brutal-white">
   304‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   305‚Üí      <header className="border-brutal border-b-3 border-black bg-white sticky top-0 z-10">
   306‚Üí        <div className="max-w-[1800px] mx-auto px-4 py-4">
   307‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center justify-between flex-wrap gap-4">
   308‚Üí            <h1 className="text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight">My Trello</h1>
   309‚Üí
   310‚Üí            <div className="flex items-center gap-3 flex-wrap">
   311‚Üí              {/* Search */}
   312‚Üí              <div className="relative">
   313‚Üí                <MagnifyingGlassIcon className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-5 h-5" />
   314‚Üí                <input
   315‚Üí                  type="text"
   316‚Üí                  placeholder="Search tasks..."
   317‚Üí                  value={searchQuery}
   318‚Üí                  onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
   319‚Üí                  className="pl-10 pr-4 py-2 border-3 border-black focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-brutal-blue text-sm min-w-[200px]"
   320‚Üí                />
   321‚Üí              </div>
   322‚Üí
   323‚Üí              {/* Tag Filter */}
   324‚Üí              {filterTag ? (
   325‚Üí                <button
   326‚Üí                  onClick={() => setFilterTag(null)}
   327‚Üí                  className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black bg-brutal-pink text-white font-semibold text-sm hover:translate-x-[1px] hover:translate-y-[1px] hover:shadow-brutal-sm active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] active:shadow-none transition-all shadow-brutal-sm"
   328‚Üí                >
   329‚Üí                  <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   330‚Üí                  <span>Clear Filter</span>
   331‚Üí                  <XMarkIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   332‚Üí                </button>
   333‚Üí              ) : (
   334‚Üí                <div className="relative group">
   335‚Üí                  <button className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 border-3 border-black bg-white shadow-brutal-sm font-semibold text-sm hover:translate-x-[1px] hover:translate-y-[1px] hover:shadow-none active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] transition-all">
   336‚Üí                    <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   337‚Üí                    <span>Filter</span>
   338‚Üí                  </button>
   339‚Üí                  <div className="absolute right-0 top-full mt-2 w-48 bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal hidden group-hover:block z-20">
   340‚Üí                    <div className="p-2">
   341‚Üí                      <div className="text-xs font-bold mb-2 text-gray-500">FILTER BY TAG</div>
   342‚Üí                      {tags.map((tag) => (
   343‚Üí                        <button
   344‚Üí                          key={tag.id}
   345‚Üí                          onClick={() => setFilterTag(tag.id)}
   346‚Üí                          className="w-full text-left px-2 py-1 hover:bg-gray-100 flex items-center gap-2"
   347‚Üí                        >
   348‚Üí                          <span
   349‚Üí                            className="w-3 h-3 rounded-full"
   350‚Üí                            style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
   351‚Üí                          />
   352‚Üí                          <span className="text-sm">{tag.name}</span>
   353‚Üí                          <span className="text-xs text-gray-400 ml-auto">{tag.taskCount}</span>
   354‚Üí                        </button>
   355‚Üí                      ))}
   356‚Üí                      {tags.length === 0 && (
   357‚Üí                        <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">No tags yet</div>
   358‚Üí                      )}
   359‚Üí                    </div>
   360‚Üí                  </div>
   361‚Üí                </div>
   362‚Üí              )}
   363‚Üí
   364‚Üí              {/* View Toggle */}
   365‚Üí              <div className="flex border-3 border-black">
   366‚Üí                <button
   367‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("board")}
   368‚Üí                  className={cn(
   369‚Üí                    "p-2 font-semibold text-sm",
   370‚Üí                    view === "board" ? "bg-brutal-yellow" : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   371‚Üí                  )}
   372‚Üí                >
   373‚Üí                  <Squares2X2Icon className="w-5 h-5" />
   374‚Üí                </button>
   375‚Üí                <button
   376‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("list")}
   377‚Üí                  className={cn(
   378‚Üí                    "p-2 font-semibold text-sm border-l-3 border-black",
   379‚Üí                    view === "list" ? "bg-brutal-yellow" : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   380‚Üí                  )}
   381‚Üí                >
   382‚Üí                  <ListBulletIcon className="w-5 h-5" />
   383‚Üí                </button>
   384‚Üí              </div>
   385‚Üí
   386‚Üí              {/* Sign Out */}
   387‚Üí              <button
   388‚Üí                onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
   389‚Üí                className="flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 border-3 border-black bg-brutal-orange text-white font-semibold text-sm hover:translate-x-[1px] hover:translate-y-[1px] hover:shadow-brutal-sm active:translate-x-[2px] active:translate-y-[2px] active:shadow-none transition-all shadow-brutal-sm"
   390‚Üí              >
   391‚Üí                <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   392‚Üí                <span>Sign Out</span>
   393‚Üí              </button>
   394‚Üí            </div>
   395‚Üí          </div>
   396‚Üí        </div>
   397‚Üí      </header>
   398‚Üí
   399‚Üí      {/* List View Grouping Options */}
   400‚Üí      {view === "list" && (
   401‚Üí        <div className="max-w-[1800px] mx-auto px-4 py-3 bg-white border-b-3 border-black">
   402‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-4">
   403‚Üí            <span className="font-semibold text-sm">Group by:</span>
   404‚Üí            <div className="flex border-3 border-black">
   405‚Üí              {(["none", "status", "tags"] as const).map((option) => (
   406‚Üí                <button
   407‚Üí                  key={option}
   408‚Üí                  onClick={() => setListGrouping(option)}
   409‚Üí                  className={cn(
   410‚Üí                    "px-3 py-1 text-sm font-semibold capitalize",
   411‚Üí                    listGrouping === option ? "bg-brutal-blue text-white" : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100",
   412‚Üí                    option !== "none" && "border-l-3 border-black"
   413‚Üí                  )}
   414‚Üí                >
   415‚Üí                  {option}
   416‚Üí                </button>
   417‚Üí              ))}
   418‚Üí            </div>
   419‚Üí          </div>
   420‚Üí        </div>
   421‚Üí      )}
   422‚Üí
   423‚Üí      {/* Main Content */}
   424‚Üí      <main className="max-w-[1800px] mx-auto p-4">
   425‚Üí        {view === "board" ? (
   426‚Üí          <DndContext
   427‚Üí            sensors={sensors}
   428‚Üí            collisionDetection={closestCorners}
   429‚Üí            onDragStart={handleDragStart}
   430‚Üí            onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}
   431‚Üí          >
   432‚Üí            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
   433‚Üí              {STATUSES.map((status) => (
   434‚Üí                <TaskColumn
   435‚Üí                  key={status.value}
   436‚Üí                  status={status.value}
   437‚Üí                  label={status.label}
   438‚Üí                  color={status.color}
   439‚Üí                  tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
   440‚Üí                  availableTags={tags}
   441‚Üí                  onAddTask={() => {
   442‚Üí                    setAddingTaskStatus(status.value);
   443‚Üí                    setIsAddingTask(true);
   444‚Üí                  }}
   445‚Üí                  onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   446‚Üí                  onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   447‚Üí                />
   448‚Üí              ))}
   449‚Üí            </div>
   450‚Üí
   451‚Üí            <DragOverlay>
   452‚Üí              {activeTask ? (
   453‚Üí                <div className="w-72 opacity-90 rotate-3">
   454‚Üí                  <TaskCard
   455‚Üí                    task={activeTask}
   456‚Üí                    availableTags={tags}
   457‚Üí                    onUpdate={() => {}}
   458‚Üí                    onDelete={() => {}}
   459‚Üí                  />
   460‚Üí                </div>
   461‚Üí              ) : null}
   462‚Üí            </DragOverlay>
   463‚Üí          </DndContext>
   464‚Üí        ) : (
   465‚Üí          <ListView
   466‚Üí            groups={getGroupedTasks()}
   467‚Üí            availableTags={tags}
   468‚Üí            sortBy={listSortBy}
   469‚Üí            onSortChange={setListSortBy}
   470‚Üí            onAddTask={() => {
   471‚Üí              setAddingTaskStatus("not_started");
   472‚Üí              setIsAddingTask(true);
   473‚Üí            }}
   474‚Üí            onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   475‚Üí            onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   476‚Üí          />
   477‚Üí        )}
   478‚Üí      </main>
   479‚Üí
   480‚Üí      {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
   481‚Üí      {isAddingTask && (
   482‚Üí        <InlineTaskForm
   483‚Üí          defaultStatus={addingTaskStatus}
   484‚Üí          availableTags={tags}
   485‚Üí          onSave={(data) => {
   486‚Üí            handleCreateTask({ ...data, status: addingTaskStatus });
   487‚Üí            setIsAddingTask(false);
   488‚Üí          }}
   489‚Üí          onCancel={() => setIsAddingTask(false)}
   490‚Üí        />
   491‚Üí      )}
   492‚Üí    </div>
   493‚Üí  );
   494‚Üí}
   495‚Üí
   496‚Üí// ListView Component
   497‚Üífunction ListView({
   498‚Üí  groups,
   499‚Üí  availableTags,
   500‚Üí  sortBy,
   501‚Üí  onSortChange,
   502‚Üí  onAddTask,
   503‚Üí  onUpdateTask,
   504‚Üí  onDeleteTask,
   505‚Üí}: {
   506‚Üí  groups: Array<{
   507‚Üí    key: string;
   508‚Üí    label: string;
   509‚Üí    color?: string;
   510‚Üí    tasks: Task[];
   511‚Üí  }>;
   512‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   513‚Üí  sortBy: "order" | "title" | "date";
   514‚Üí  onSortChange: (sort: "order" | "title" | "date") => void;
   515‚Üí  onAddTask: () => void;
   516‚Üí  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   517‚Üí  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
   518‚Üí}) {
   519‚Üí  // Sort groups' tasks based on sortBy
   520‚Üí  const sortedGroups = groups.map((group) => ({
   521‚Üí    ...group,
   522‚Üí    tasks: [...group.tasks].sort((a, b) => {
   523‚Üí      if (sortBy === "title") {
   524‚Üí        return a.title.localeCompare(b.title);
   525‚Üí      } else if (sortBy === "date") {
   526‚Üí        return b.createdAt.getTime() - a.createdAt.getTime();
   527‚Üí      } else {
   528‚Üí        return a.order - b.order;
   529‚Üí      }
   530‚Üí    }),
   531‚Üí  }));
   532‚Üí
   533‚Üí  return (
   534‚Üí    <div className="space-y-6">
   535‚Üí      <div className="flex justify-between items-center flex-wrap gap-4">
   536‚Üí        <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold">All Tasks</h2>
   537‚Üí        <div className="flex gap-3">
   538‚Üí          {/* Sort Options */}
   539‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   540‚Üí            <span className="text-sm font-bold">Sort by:</span>
   541‚Üí            <div className="flex border-3 border-black">
   542‚Üí              {[
   543‚Üí                { value: "order" as const, label: "Order" },
   544‚Üí                { value: "title" as const, label: "Title" },
   545‚Üí                { value: "date" as const, label: "Date" },
   546‚Üí              ].map((option, index) => (
   547‚Üí                <button
   548‚Üí                  key={option.value}
   549‚Üí                  onClick={() => onSortChange(option.value)}
   550‚Üí                  className={`px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold min-h-[44px] ${
   551‚Üí                    sortBy === option.value
   552‚Üí                      ? "bg-brutal-blue text-white"
   553‚Üí                      : "bg-white hover:bg-gray-100"
   554‚Üí                  } ${index > 0 ? "border-l-3 border-black" : ""}`}
   555‚Üí                  aria-label={`Sort by ${option.label}`}
   556‚Üí                  aria-pressed={sortBy === option.value}
   557‚Üí                >
   558‚Üí                  {option.label}
   559‚Üí                </button>
   560‚Üí              ))}
   561‚Üí            </div>
   562‚Üí          </div>
   563‚Üí          <button
   564‚Üí            onClick={onAddTask}
   565‚Üí            className="px-6 py-3 bg-brutal-green border-brutal border-black shadow-brutal text-white font-bold hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-brutal-sm active:translate-x-[4px] active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none transition-all"
   566‚Üí          >
   567‚Üí            + Add Task
   568‚Üí          </button>
   569‚Üí        </div>
   570‚Üí      </div>
   571‚Üí
   572‚Üí      {sortedGroups.map((group) => (
   573‚Üí        <div key={group.key} className="bg-white border-3 border-black shadow-brutal">
   574‚Üí          <div className="px-4 py-3 border-b-3 border-black bg-gray-50 flex items-center gap-3">
   575‚Üí            {group.color && (
   576‚Üí              <span
   577‚Üí                className="w-4 h-4 rounded-full"
   578‚Üí                style={{ backgroundColor: group.color }}
   579‚Üí              />
   580‚Üí            )}
   581‚Üí            <h3 className="font-bold">{group.label}</h3>
   582‚Üí            <span className="text-sm text-gray-500">({group.tasks.length})</span>
   583‚Üí          </div>
   584‚Üí          <div className="divide-y-3 divide-black">
   585‚Üí            {group.tasks.map((task) => (
   586‚Üí              <ListViewTaskRow
   587‚Üí                key={task.id}
   588‚Üí                task={task}
   589‚Üí                availableTags={availableTags}
   590‚Üí                onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
   591‚Üí                onDelete={onDeleteTask}
   592‚Üí              />
   593‚Üí            ))}
   594‚Üí            {group.tasks.length === 0 && (
   595‚Üí              <div className="p-8 text-center text-gray-400">No tasks</div>
   596‚Üí            )}
   597‚Üí          </div>
   598‚Üí        </div>
   599‚Üí      ))}
   600‚Üí    </div>
   601‚Üí  );
   602‚Üí}
   603‚Üí
   604‚Üí// ListView Task Row with inline editing
   605‚Üífunction ListViewTaskRow({
   606‚Üí  task,
   607‚Üí  availableTags,
   608‚Üí  onUpdate,
   609‚Üí  onDelete,
   610‚Üí}: {
   611‚Üí  task: Task;
   612‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   613‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   614‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   615‚Üí}) {
   616‚Üí  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
   617‚Üí  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
   618‚Üí  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
   619‚Üí  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
   620‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   621‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
   622‚Üí  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
   623‚Üí  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
   624‚Üí  const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
   625‚Üí
   626‚Üí  const availableColors = [
   627‚Üí    "#FFDE59", "#4D96FF", "#FF6B9D", "#6BCB77", "#FF9F45", "#9B59B6",
   628‚Üí  ];
   629‚Üí
   630‚Üí  const handleSave = () => {
   631‚Üí    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
   632‚Üí      setTitleError("Title is required");
   633‚Üí      return;
   634‚Üí    }
   635‚Üí    setTitleError("");
   636‚Üí    onUpdate(task.id, {
   637‚Üí      title: editTitle.trim(),
   638‚Üí      description: editDescription.trim(),
   639‚Üí      status: editStatus,
   640‚Üí      tags: selectedTags,
   641‚Üí    });
   642‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   643‚Üí  };
   644‚Üí
   645‚Üí  const handleCancel = () => {
   646‚Üí    setEditTitle(task.title);
   647‚Üí    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
   648‚Üí    setEditStatus(task.status);
   649‚Üí    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
   650‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   651‚Üí    setTitleError("");
   652‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   653‚Üí  };
   654‚Üí
   655‚Üí  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
   656‚Üí    if (e.key === "Enter" && !e.shiftKey) {
   657‚Üí      e.preventDefault();
   658‚Üí      handleSave();
   659‚Üí    } else if (e.key === "Escape") {
   660‚Üí      handleCancel();
   661‚Üí    }
   662‚Üí  };
   663‚Üí
   664‚Üí  // Handle click outside to save (blur behavior)

  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([]);
  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>>([]);
  const [view, setView] = useState<"board" | "list">("board");
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("");
  const [filterTag, setFilterTag] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [addingToColumn, setAddingToColumn] = useState<TaskStatus | null>(null);
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
  const [listSortBy, setListSortBy] = useState<"order" | "title" | "date">("order");

  const sensors = useSensors(
    useSensor(PointerSensor, {
      activationConstraint: {
        distance: 8,
      },
    })
  );

  // Fetch data
  const fetchTasks = useCallback(async () => {
    try {
      const params = new URLSearchParams();
      if (filterTag) params.append("tagId", filterTag.toString());

      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks?${params}`);
      if (response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        setTasks(data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Failed to load tasks", {
        action: {
          label: "Retry",
          onClick: () => fetchTasks(),
        },
      });
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  }, [filterTag]);

  const fetchTags = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tags");
      if (response.ok) {
        const data = await response.json();
        setTags(data);
      }
    } catch (error) {
      console.error("Failed to load tags");
    }
  };

  useEffect(() => {
    fetchTasks();
    fetchTags();
  }, [filterTag]);

  // Filter tasks by search
  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter((task) =>
    task.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
    (task.description && task.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()))
  );

  // Group tasks by status for board view
  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {
    not_started: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === "not_started"),
    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === "in_progress"),
    complete: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === "complete"),
  };

  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => {
    const { active } = event;
    setActiveId(parseInt(active.id as string));
  };

  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
    const { active, over } = event;
    setActiveId(null);

    if (!over) return;

    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
    const overId = parseInt(over.id as string);

    // Find the active task
    const activeTask = tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId);
    if (!activeTask) return;

    // Find over task or column
    const overTask = tasks.find((t) => t.id === overId);
    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;

    let newStatus = activeTask.status;
    let newTasks = [...tasks];
    let activeIndex = newTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === activeId);

    if (overTask) {
      newStatus = overTask.status;
      const overIndex = newTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === overId);

      if (activeTask.status === newStatus) {
        newTasks = arrayMove(newTasks, activeIndex, overIndex);
      } else {
        newTasks[activeIndex] = { ...activeTask, status: newStatus };
        newTasks.splice(overIndex, 0, newTasks.splice(activeIndex, 1)[0]);
      }
    } else if (overStatus) {
      newStatus = overStatus;
      newTasks[activeIndex] = { ...activeTask, status: newStatus };
    }

    // Recalculate orders
    const updates: Array<{ id: number; status: TaskStatus; order: number }> = [];
    STATUSES.forEach(({ value: status }) => {
      newTasks
        .filter((t) => t.status === status)
        .forEach((task, index) => {
          updates.push({ id: task.id, status, order: index });
        });
    });

    setTasks(newTasks);

    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks/reorder", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ updates }),
      });

      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to reorder");
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Failed to reorder tasks", {
        action: { label: "Retry", onClick: () => fetchTasks() },
      });
      fetchTasks();
    }
  };

  const handleCreateTask = async (status: TaskStatus, data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...data, status }),
      });

      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create task");

      const newTask = await response.json();
      setTasks((prev) => [...prev, newTask]);
      toast.success("Task created");
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Failed to create task", {
        action: {
          label: "Retry",
          onClick: () => handleCreateTask(status, data),
        },
      });
    }
  };

  const handleUpdateTask = async (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
        method: "PATCH",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify(data),
      });

      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to update task");

      const updatedTask = await response.json();
      setTasks((prev) => prev.map((t) => (t.id === id ? updatedTask : t)));
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Failed to update task", {
        action: {
          label: "Retry",
          onClick: () => handleUpdateTask(id, data),
        },
      });
    }
  };

  const handleDeleteTask = async (id: number) => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
        method: "DELETE",
      });

      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to delete task");

      setTasks((prev) => prev.filter((t) => t.id !== id));
      toast.success("Task deleted");
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Failed to delete task", {
        action: {
          label: "Retry",
          onClick: () => handleDeleteTask(id),
        },
      });
    }
  };

  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId) : null;

  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen bg-background flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="flex flex-col items-center gap-4">
          <div className="w-10 h-10 border-2 border-accent border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
          <p className="text-foreground/70 font-medium">Loading...</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-subtle">
      {/* Header */}
      <header className="sticky top-0 z-40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-b border-border">
        <div className="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto px-6 py-4">
          <div className="flex items-center justify-between gap-4">
            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-foreground tracking-tight">My Tasks</h1>

            <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
              {/* Search */}
              <div className="relative group">
                <MagnifyingGlassIcon className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-4 h-4 text-foreground/40 group-focus-within:text-foreground/70 transition-colors" />
                <input
                  type="text"
                  placeholder="Search..."
                  value={searchQuery}
                  onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                  className="w-48 pl-9 pr-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent transition-all"
                />
              </div>

              {/* Tag Filter */}
              {filterTag ? (
                <button
                  onClick={() => setFilterTag(null)}
                  className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-foreground rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
                >
                  <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
                  <span>Clear</span>
                  <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                </button>
              ) : (
                <div className="relative">
                  <button className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all">
                    <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
                    <span>Filter</span>
                  </button>
                  <div className="absolute right-0 top-full mt-2 w-48 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg shadow-medium hidden group-hover:block">
                    <div className="p-2">
                      <div className="text-xs font-medium text-foreground/50 mb-2 px-2">FILTER BY TAG</div>
                      {tags.map((tag) => (
                        <button
                          key={tag.id}
                          onClick={() => setFilterTag(tag.id)}
                          className="w-full text-left px-2 py-1.5 rounded-md hover:bg-accent transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
                        >
                          <span className="w-2 h-2 rounded-full" style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }} />
                          <span className="text-sm text-foreground">{tag.name}</span>
                          <span className="text-xs text-foreground/40 ml-auto">{tag.taskCount}</span>
                        </button>
                      ))}
                      {tags.length === 0 && (
                        <div className="text-sm text-foreground/40 px-2 py-2">No tags yet</div>
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                </div>
              )}

              {/* View Toggle */}
              <div className="flex bg-card border border-border rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
                <button
                  onClick={() => setView("board")}
                  className={cn(
                    "p-2 text-foreground/70 hover:text-foreground transition-all",
                    view === "board" && "bg-accent text-foreground"
                  )}
                >
                  <Squares2X2Icon className="w-4 h-4" />
                </button>
                <button
                  onClick={() => setView("list")}
                  className={cn(
                    "p-2 text-foreground/70 hover:text-foreground transition-all border-l border-border",
                    view === "list" && "bg-accent text-foreground"
                  )}
                >
                  <ListBulletIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
                </button>
              </div>

              {/* Sign Out */}
              <button
                onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
                className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
              >
                <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
                <span className="hidden sm:inline">Sign Out</span>
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </header>

      {/* Main Content */}
      <main className="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto p-6">
        {view === "board" ? (
          <DndContext
            sensors={sensors}
            collisionDetection={closestCorners}
            onDragStart={handleDragStart}
            onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}
          >
            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
              {STATUSES.map((status) => (
                <BoardColumn
                  key={status.value}
                  status={status.value}
                  label={status.label}
                  tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
                  availableTags={tags}
                  isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
                  onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
                  onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
                  onCreateTask={(data) => {
                    handleCreateTask(status.value, data);
                    setAddingToColumn(null);
                  }}
                  onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
                  onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
                />
              ))}
            </div>

            <DragOverlay>
              {activeTask ? (
                <div className="w-72 opacity-80 rotate-2 shadow-glow-lg">
                  <TaskCard
                    task={activeTask}
                    availableTags={tags}
                    onUpdate={() => {}}
                    onDelete={() => {}}
                  />
                </div>
              ) : null}
            </DragOverlay>
          </DndContext>
        ) : (
          <ListView
            tasks={filteredTasks}
            availableTags={tags}
            sortBy={listSortBy}
            onSortChange={setListSortBy}
            onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
            onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
          />
        )}
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}

// Board Column Component
function BoardColumn({
  status,
  label,
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  isAdding,
  onAddStart,
  onAddCancel,
  onCreateTask,
  onUpdateTask,
  onDeleteTask,
}: {
  status: TaskStatus;
  label: string;
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  isAdding: boolean;
  onAddStart: () => void;
  onAddCancel: () => void;
  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({
    id: status,
    data: { status },
  });

  const taskIds = tasks.map((t) => t.id.toString());

  return (
    <div
      ref={setNodeRef}
      className="flex flex-col h-full bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium animate-fade-in"
    >
      {/* Header */}
      <div className="px-4 py-3 border-b border-border flex items-center justify-between">
        <h3 className="font-semibold text-foreground">{label}</h3>
        <span className="text-xs font-medium px-2 py-0.5 bg-accent rounded-full text-foreground/70">
          {tasks.length}
        </span>
      </div>

      {/* Task List */}
      <div className="flex-1 p-3 space-y-3 min-h-[200px]">
        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
          {tasks.map((task) => (
            <SortableTaskCard
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              availableTags={availableTags}
              onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
              onDelete={onDeleteTask}
            />
          ))}
        </SortableContext>

        {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
        {isAdding ? (
          <InlineTaskForm
            availableTags={availableTags}
            onSave={onCreateTask}
            onCancel={onAddCancel}
          />
        ) : (
          <button
            onClick={onAddStart}
            className="w-full py-3 border border-dashed border-border rounded-xl text-sm font-medium text-foreground/50 hover:text-foreground hover:border-accent/50 hover:bg-accent/10 transition-all flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
          >
            <PlusIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
            <span>Add task</span>
          </button>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
import { useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import { SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";

function SortableTaskCard({
  task,
  availableTags,
  onUpdate,
  onDelete,
}: {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({
    id: task.id.toString(),
    data: { status: task.status },
  });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
      <TaskCard
        task={task}
        availableTags={availableTags}
        onUpdate={onUpdate}
        onDelete={onDelete}
        dragAttributes={attributes}
        dragListeners={listeners}
      />
    </div>
  );
}

// Inline Task Form for Board Column
function InlineTaskForm({
  availableTags,
  onSave,
  onCancel,
}: {
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
}) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>([]);
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    await onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
    setTitle("");
    setDescription("");
    setTagInput("");
    setSelectedTags([]);
    setIsSubmitting(false);
  };

  const handleAddTag = () => {
    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
      setTagInput("");
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
  };

  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
  };

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-3 shadow-subtle animate-scale-in">
      <input
        type="text"
        value={title}
        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Task title..."
        className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent mb-2"
        autoFocus
      />

      <textarea
        value={description}
        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Description (optional)..."
        rows={2}
        className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent resize-none mb-2"
      />

      {/* Tag Input */}
      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
        <input
          type="text"
          value={tagInput}
          onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
          onKeyDown={(e) => {
            if (e.key === "Enter") {
              e.preventDefault();
              handleAddTag();
            }
          }}
          placeholder="Add tag..."
          className="flex-1 px-3 py-1.5 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-xs text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-accent"
        />
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={handleAddTag}
          className="px-2 py-1.5 bg-accent text-foreground rounded-lg text-xs font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
        >
          Add
        </button>
      </div>

      {/* Selected Tags */}
      {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5 mb-3">
          {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
            <span
              key={tagName}
              className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
              style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
            >
              {tagName}
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
                className="hover:opacity-70"
              >
                <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
              </button>
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}

      {/* Actions */}
      <div className="flex gap-2">
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={onCancel}
          className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
        >
          Cancel
        </button>
        <button
          type="submit"
          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
          className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-1"
        >
          {isSubmitting ? (
            <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
          ) : (
            <>
              <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
              Add
            </>
          )}
        </button>
      </div>
    </form>
  );
}

// ListView Component
function ListView({
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  sortBy,
  onSortChange,
  onUpdateTask,
  onDeleteTask,
}: {
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  sortBy: "order" | "title" | "date";
  onSortChange: (sort: "order" | "title" | "date") => void;
  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const [addingTask, setAddingTask] = useState(false);

  const sortedTasks = [...tasks].sort((a, b) => {
    if (sortBy === "title") return a.title.localeCompare(b.title);
    if (sortBy === "date") return b.createdAt.getTime() - a.createdAt.getTime();
    return a.order - b.order;
  });

  return (
    <div className="animate-fade-in">
      {/* Toolbar */}
      <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-start sm:items-center gap-4 mb-6">
        <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-foreground">All Tasks</h2>
        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
          {/* Sort */}
          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
            <span className="text-sm text-foreground/50">Sort:</span>
            <div className="flex bg-card border border-border rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
              {[
                { value: "order" as const, label: "Order" },
                { value: "title" as const, label: "Title" },
                { value: "date" as const, label: "Date" },
              ].map((option, index) => (
                <button
                  key={option.value}
                  onClick={() => onSortChange(option.value)}
                  className={cn(
                    "px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium transition-all",
                    sortBy === option.value ? "bg-accent text-foreground" : "text-foreground/60 hover:text-foreground hover:bg-accent/50",
                    index > 0 && "border-l border-border"
                  )}
                >
                  {option.label}
                </button>
              ))}
            </div>
          </div>
          <button
            onClick={() => setAddingTask(!addingTask)}
            className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2"
          >
            <PlusIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
            Add Task
          </button>
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
      {addingTask && (
        <div className="mb-6">
          <InlineTaskFormFull
            availableTags={availableTags}
            onSave={(data) => {
              onUpdateTask(0, { ...data, status: "not_started" });
              setAddingTask(false);
            }}
            onCancel={() => setAddingTask(false)}
          />
        </div>
      )}

      {/* Task List */}
      <div className="bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium overflow-hidden">
        {sortedTasks.length === 0 ? (
          <div className="p-12 text-center">
            <p className="text-foreground/40">No tasks yet. Create your first task to get started!</p>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="divide-y divide-border">
            {sortedTasks.map((task) => (
              <ListViewTaskRow
                key={task.id}
                task={task}
                availableTags={availableTags}
                onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
                onDelete={onDeleteTask}
              />
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Inline Task Form (Full for ListView)
function InlineTaskFormFull({
  availableTags,
  onSave,
  onCancel,
}: {
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
}) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>([]);
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    await onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
    setTitle("");
    setDescription("");
    setTagInput("");
    setSelectedTags([]);
    setIsSubmitting(false);
  };

  const handleAddTag = () => {
    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
      setTagInput("");
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
  };

  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
  };

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-4 shadow-subtle animate-scale-in">
      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
        <div>
          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-1">Title *</label>
          <input
            type="text"
            value={title}
            onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
            placeholder="What needs to be done?"
            className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
            autoFocus
          />
        </div>
        <div>
          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-1">Tags</label>
          <div className="flex gap-2">
            <input
              type="text"
              value={tagInput}
              onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
              onKeyDown={(e) => {
                if (e.key === "Enter") {
                  e.preventDefault();
                  handleAddTag();
                }
              }}
              placeholder="Add tag..."
              className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
            />
            <button
              type="button"
              onClick={handleAddTag}
              className="px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
            >
              Add
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div className="mb-4">
        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-1">Description</label>
        <textarea
          value={description}
          onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="Add more details..."
          rows={2}
          className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent resize-none"
        />
      </div>

      {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
          {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
            <span
              key={tagName}
              className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
              style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
            >
              {tagName}
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
                className="hover:opacity-70"
              >
                <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
              </button>
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}

      <div className="flex gap-3">
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={onCancel}
          className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
        >
          Cancel
        </button>
        <button
          type="submit"
          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
          className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-2"
        >
          {isSubmitting ? (
            <>
              <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
              Creating...
            </>
          ) : (
            <>
              <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
              Create Task
            </>
          )}
        </button>
      </div>
    </form>
  );
}

// ListView Task Row with inline editing
function ListViewTaskRow({
  task,
  availableTags,
  onUpdate,
  onDelete,
}: {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  const handleSave = async () => {
    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
      setTitleError("Title is required");
      return;
    }
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    setTitleError("");
    await onUpdate(task.id, {
      title: editTitle.trim(),
      description: editDescription.trim(),
      status: editStatus,
      tags: selectedTags,
    });
    setIsEditing(false);
    setIsSubmitting(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    setEditTitle(task.title);
    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
    setEditStatus(task.status);
    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
    setTagInput("");
    setTitleError("");
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const handleDeleteClick = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(true);
  };

  const confirmDelete = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
    setIsEditing(false);
    onDelete(task.id);
  };

  const handleAddTag = () => {
    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
      setTagInput("");
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
  };

  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
  };

  if (isEditing) {
    return (
      <div className="p-4 bg-accent/10 border-l-2 border-accent animate-slide-down">
        {showDeleteConfirm ? (
          <div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-8">
            <p className="text-foreground/70 mb-4">Delete this task?</p>
            <div className="flex gap-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(false)}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={confirmDelete}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all"
              >
                Delete
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div className="space-y-3">
            <div>
              <input
                type="text"
                value={editTitle}
                onChange={(e) => {
                  setEditTitle(e.target.value);
                  setTitleError("");
                }}
                className={`w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium ${
                  titleError ? "border-red-500" : "border-border"
                } focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent`}
                placeholder="Task title..."
                autoFocus
              />
              {titleError && (
                <p className="text-red-400 text-xs mt-1">{titleError}</p>
              )}
            </div>

            <textarea
              value={editDescription}
              onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm resize-none"
              placeholder="Description..."
              rows={2}
            />

            <div>
              <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  value={tagInput}
                  onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
                  onKeyDown={(e) => {
                    if (e.key === "Enter") {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      handleAddTag();
                    }
                  }}
                  className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
                  placeholder="Add tag..."
                />
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={handleAddTag}
                  className="px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover"
                >
                  Add
                </button>
              </div>
              {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
                <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5">
                  {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
                    <span
                      key={tagName}
                      className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
                      style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
                    >
                      {tagName}
                      <button
                        type="button"
                        onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
                        className="hover:opacity-70"
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                      </button>
                    </span>
                  ))}
                </div>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="flex gap-2">
              <select
                value={editStatus}
                onChange={(e) => setEditStatus(e.target.value as TaskStatus)}
                className="px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
              >
                {STATUSES.map((s) => (
                  <option key={s.value} value={s.value}>{s.label}</option>
                ))}
              </select>
            </div>

            <div className="flex gap-2 pt-2 border-t border-border">
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleDeleteClick}
                className="px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-red-600/10 hover:text-red-500 hover:border-red-500/30 transition-all"
              >
                Delete
              </button>
              <div className="flex-1" />
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleCancel}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleSave}
                disabled={!editTitle.trim() || isSubmitting}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-2"
              >
                {isSubmitting ? (
                  <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
                ) : (
                  <>
                    <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
                    Save
                  </>
                )}
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div
      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
      className="p-4 hover:bg-accent/5 cursor-pointer transition-all group animate-fade-in"
    >
      <div className="flex items-start justify-between gap-4">
        <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
          <h4 className="font-semibold text-foreground group-hover:text-accent-hover transition-colors">{task.title}</h4>
          {task.description && (
            <p className="text-foreground/50 text-sm mt-1 line-clamp-2">
              {task.description}
            </p>
          )}
          <div className="flex items-center gap-3 mt-2">
            <StatusBadge status={task.status} />
            <span className="text-xs text-foreground/30">
              {new Date(task.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}
            </span>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div className="flex gap-1 flex-wrap justify-end">
          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
            <span
              key={tag.id}
              className="px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
              style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
            >
              {tag.name}
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

function StatusBadge({ status }: { status: TaskStatus }) {
  const styles = {
    not_started: "bg-status-not-started",
    in_progress: "bg-status-in-progress",
    complete: "bg-status-complete",
  };

  const labels = {
    not_started: "To Do",
    in_progress: "In Progress",
    complete: "Done",
  };

  return (
    <span className={`${styles[status]} px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium text-white rounded-full`}>
      {labels[status]}
    </span>
  );
}
