   207‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   208‚Üí        method: "PATCH",
   209‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   210‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(data),
   211‚Üí      });
   212‚Üí
   213‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to update task");
   214‚Üí
   215‚Üí      const updatedTask = await response.json();
   216‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.map((t) => (t.id === id ? updatedTask : t)));
   217‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   218‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to update task", {
   219‚Üí        action: {
   220‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   221‚Üí          onClick: () => handleUpdateTask(id, data),
   222‚Üí        },
   223‚Üí      });
   224‚Üí    }
   225‚Üí  };
   226‚Üí
   227‚Üí  const handleDeleteTask = async (id: number) => {
   228‚Üí    try {
   229‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   230‚Üí        method: "DELETE",
   231‚Üí      });
   232‚Üí
   233‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to delete task");
   234‚Üí
   235‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.filter((t) => t.id !== id));
   236‚Üí      toast.success("Task deleted");
   237‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   238‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to delete task", {
   239‚Üí        action: {
   240‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   241‚Üí          onClick: () => handleDeleteTask(id),
   242‚Üí        },
   243‚Üí      });
   244‚Üí    }
   245‚Üí  };
   246‚Üí
   247‚Üí  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId) : null;
   248‚Üí
   249‚Üí  if (isLoading) {
   250‚Üí    return (
   251‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen bg-background flex items-center justify-center">
   252‚Üí        <div className="flex flex-col items-center gap-4">
   253‚Üí          <div className="w-10 h-10 border-2 border-accent border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
   254‚Üí          <p className="text-foreground/70 font-medium">Loading...</p>
   255‚Üí        </div>
   256‚Üí      </div>
   257‚Üí    );
   258‚Üí  }
   259‚Üí
   260‚Üí  return (
   261‚Üí    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-subtle">
   262‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   263‚Üí      <header className="sticky top-0 z-40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-b border-border">
   264‚Üí        <div className="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto px-6 py-4">
   265‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center justify-between gap-4">
   266‚Üí            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-foreground tracking-tight">My Tasks</h1>
   267‚Üí
   268‚Üí            <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
   269‚Üí              {/* Search */}
   270‚Üí              <div className="relative group">
   271‚Üí                <MagnifyingGlassIcon className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-4 h-4 text-foreground/40 group-focus-within:text-foreground/70 transition-colors" />
   272‚Üí                <input
   273‚Üí                  type="text"
   274‚Üí                  placeholder="Search..."
   275‚Üí                  value={searchQuery}
   276‚Üí                  onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
   277‚Üí                  className="w-48 pl-9 pr-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent transition-all"
   278‚Üí                />
   279‚Üí              </div>
   280‚Üí
   281‚Üí              {/* Tag Filter */}
   282‚Üí              {filterTag ? (
   283‚Üí                <button
   284‚Üí                  onClick={() => setFilterTag(null)}
   285‚Üí                  className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-foreground rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
   286‚Üí                >
   287‚Üí                  <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   288‚Üí                  <span>Clear</span>
   289‚Üí                  <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   290‚Üí                </button>
   291‚Üí              ) : (
   292‚Üí                <div className="relative">
   293‚Üí                  <button className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all">
   294‚Üí                    <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   295‚Üí                    <span>Filter</span>
   296‚Üí                  </button>
   297‚Üí                  <div className="absolute right-0 top-full mt-2 w-48 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg shadow-medium hidden group-hover:block">
   298‚Üí                    <div className="p-2">
   299‚Üí                      <div className="text-xs font-medium text-foreground/50 mb-2 px-2">FILTER BY TAG</div>
   300‚Üí                      {tags.map((tag) => (
   301‚Üí                        <button
   302‚Üí                          key={tag.id}
   303‚Üí                          onClick={() => setFilterTag(tag.id)}
   304‚Üí                          className="w-full text-left px-2 py-1.5 rounded-md hover:bg-accent transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
   305‚Üí                        >
   306‚Üí                          <span className="w-2 h-2 rounded-full" style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }} />
   307‚Üí                          <span className="text-sm text-foreground">{tag.name}</span>
   308‚Üí                          <span className="text-xs text-foreground/40 ml-auto">{tag.taskCount}</span>
   309‚Üí                        </button>
   310‚Üí                      ))}
   311‚Üí                      {tags.length === 0 && (
   312‚Üí                        <div className="text-sm text-foreground/40 px-2 py-2">No tags yet</div>
   313‚Üí                      )}
   314‚Üí                    </div>
   315‚Üí                  </div>
   316‚Üí                </div>
   317‚Üí              )}
   318‚Üí
   319‚Üí              {/* View Toggle */}
   320‚Üí              <div className="flex bg-card border border-border rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
   321‚Üí                <button
   322‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("board")}
   323‚Üí                  className={cn(
   324‚Üí                    "p-2 text-foreground/70 hover:text-foreground transition-all",
   325‚Üí                    view === "board" && "bg-accent text-foreground"
   326‚Üí                  )}
   327‚Üí                >
   328‚Üí                  <Squares2X2Icon className="w-4 h-4" />
   329‚Üí                </button>
   330‚Üí                <button
   331‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("list")}
   332‚Üí                  className={cn(
   333‚Üí                    "p-2 text-foreground/70 hover:text-foreground transition-all border-l border-border",
   334‚Üí                    view === "list" && "bg-accent text-foreground"
   335‚Üí                  )}
   336‚Üí                >
   337‚Üí                  <ListBulletIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   338‚Üí                </button>
   339‚Üí              </div>
   340‚Üí
   341‚Üí              {/* Sign Out */}
   342‚Üí              <button
   343‚Üí                onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
   344‚Üí                className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
   345‚Üí              >
   346‚Üí                <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   347‚Üí                <span className="hidden sm:inline">Sign Out</span>
   348‚Üí              </button>
   349‚Üí            </div>
   350‚Üí          </div>
   351‚Üí        </div>
   352‚Üí      </header>
   353‚Üí
   354‚Üí      {/* Main Content */}
   355‚Üí      <main className="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto p-6">
   356‚Üí        {view === "board" ? (
   357‚Üí          <DndContext
   358‚Üí            sensors={sensors}
   359‚Üí            collisionDetection={closestCorners}
   360‚Üí            onDragStart={handleDragStart}
   361‚Üí            onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}
   362‚Üí          >
   363‚Üí            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
   364‚Üí              {STATUSES.map((status) => (
   365‚Üí                <BoardColumn
   366‚Üí                  key={status.value}
   367‚Üí                  status={status.value}
   368‚Üí                  label={status.label}
   369‚Üí                  tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
   370‚Üí                  availableTags={tags}
   371‚Üí                  isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
   372‚Üí                  onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
   373‚Üí                  onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
   374‚Üí                  onCreateTask={(data) => {
   375‚Üí                    handleCreateTask(status.value, data);
   376‚Üí                    setAddingToColumn(null);
   377‚Üí                  }}
   378‚Üí                  onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   379‚Üí                  onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   380‚Üí                />
   381‚Üí              ))}
   382‚Üí            </div>
   383‚Üí
   384‚Üí            <DragOverlay>
   385‚Üí              {activeTask ? (
   386‚Üí                <div className="w-72 opacity-80 rotate-2 shadow-glow-lg">
   387‚Üí                  <TaskCard
   388‚Üí                    task={activeTask}
   389‚Üí                    availableTags={tags}
   390‚Üí                    onUpdate={() => {}}
   391‚Üí                    onDelete={() => {}}
   392‚Üí                  />
   393‚Üí                </div>
   394‚Üí              ) : null}
   395‚Üí            </DragOverlay>
   396‚Üí          </DndContext>
   397‚Üí        ) : (
   398‚Üí          <ListView
   399‚Üí            tasks={filteredTasks}
   400‚Üí            availableTags={tags}
   401‚Üí            sortBy={listSortBy}
   402‚Üí            onSortChange={setListSortBy}
   403‚Üí            onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   404‚Üí            onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   405‚Üí          />
   406‚Üí        )}
   407‚Üí      </main>
   408‚Üí    </div>
   409‚Üí  );
   410‚Üí}
   411‚Üí
   412‚Üí// Board Column Component
   413‚Üífunction BoardColumn({
   414‚Üí  status,
   415‚Üí  label,
   416‚Üí  tasks,
   417‚Üí  availableTags,
   418‚Üí  isAdding,
   419‚Üí  onAddStart,
   420‚Üí  onAddCancel,
   421‚Üí  onCreateTask,
   422‚Üí  onUpdateTask,
   423‚Üí  onDeleteTask,
   424‚Üí}: {
   425‚Üí  status: TaskStatus;
   426‚Üí  label: string;
   427‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   428‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   429‚Üí  isAdding: boolean;
   430‚Üí  onAddStart: () => void;
   431‚Üí  onAddCancel: () => void;
   432‚Üí  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   433‚Üí  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   434‚Üí  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
   435‚Üí}) {
   436‚Üí  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({
   437‚Üí    id: status,
   438‚Üí    data: { status },
   439‚Üí  });
   440‚Üí
   441‚Üí  const taskIds = tasks.map((t) => t.id.toString());
   442‚Üí
   443‚Üí  return (
   444‚Üí    <div
   445‚Üí      ref={setNodeRef}
   446‚Üí      className="flex flex-col h-full bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium animate-fade-in"
   447‚Üí    >
   448‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   449‚Üí      <div className="px-4 py-3 border-b border-border flex items-center justify-between">
   450‚Üí        <h3 className="font-semibold text-foreground">{label}</h3>
   451‚Üí        <span className="text-xs font-medium px-2 py-0.5 bg-accent rounded-full text-foreground/70">
   452‚Üí          {tasks.length}
   453‚Üí        </span>
   454‚Üí      </div>
   455‚Üí
   456‚Üí      {/* Task List */}
   457‚Üí      <div className="flex-1 p-3 space-y-3 min-h-[200px]">
   458‚Üí        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
   459‚Üí          {tasks.map((task) => (
   460‚Üí            <SortableTaskCard
   461‚Üí              key={task.id}
   462‚Üí              task={task}
   463‚Üí              availableTags={availableTags}
   464‚Üí              onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
   465‚Üí              onDelete={onDeleteTask}
   466‚Üí            />
   467‚Üí          ))}
   468‚Üí        </SortableContext>
   469‚Üí
   470‚Üí        {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
   471‚Üí        {isAdding ? (
   472‚Üí          <InlineTaskForm
   473‚Üí            availableTags={availableTags}
   474‚Üí            onSave={onCreateTask}
   475‚Üí            onCancel={onAddCancel}
   476‚Üí          />
   477‚Üí        ) : (
   478‚Üí          <button
   479‚Üí            onClick={onAddStart}
   480‚Üí            className="w-full py-3 border border-dashed border-border rounded-xl text-sm font-medium text-foreground/50 hover:text-foreground hover:border-accent/50 hover:bg-accent/10 transition-all flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
   481‚Üí          >
   482‚Üí            <PlusIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   483‚Üí            <span>Add task</span>
   484‚Üí          </button>
   485‚Üí        )}
   486‚Üí      </div>
   487‚Üí    </div>
   488‚Üí  );
   489‚Üí}
   490‚Üí
   491‚Üí// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
   492‚Üíimport { useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
   493‚Üíimport { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
   494‚Üíimport { SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
   495‚Üí
   496‚Üífunction SortableTaskCard({
   497‚Üí  task,
   498‚Üí  availableTags,
   499‚Üí  onUpdate,
   500‚Üí  onDelete,
   501‚Üí}: {
   502‚Üí  task: Task;
   503‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   504‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   505‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   506‚Üí}) {
   507‚Üí  const {
   508‚Üí    attributes,
   509‚Üí    listeners,
   510‚Üí    setNodeRef,
   511‚Üí    transform,
   512‚Üí    transition,
   513‚Üí    isDragging,
   514‚Üí  } = useSortable({
   515‚Üí    id: task.id.toString(),
   516‚Üí    data: { status: task.status },
   517‚Üí  });
   518‚Üí
   519‚Üí  const style = {
   520‚Üí    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
   521‚Üí    transition,
   522‚Üí    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
   523‚Üí  };
   524‚Üí
   525‚Üí  return (
   526‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
   527‚Üí      <TaskCard
   528‚Üí        task={task}
   529‚Üí        availableTags={availableTags}
   530‚Üí        onUpdate={onUpdate}
   531‚Üí        onDelete={onDelete}
   532‚Üí        dragAttributes={attributes}
   533‚Üí        dragListeners={listeners}
   534‚Üí      />
   535‚Üí    </div>
   536‚Üí  );
   537‚Üí}
   538‚Üí
   539‚Üí// Inline Task Form for Board Column
   540‚Üífunction InlineTaskForm({
   541‚Üí  availableTags,
   542‚Üí  onSave,
   543‚Üí  onCancel,
   544‚Üí}: {
   545‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   546‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   547‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   548‚Üí}) {
   549‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   550‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   551‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   552‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>([]);
   553‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   554‚Üí
   555‚Üí  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   556‚Üí    e.preventDefault();
   557‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   558‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   559‚Üí    await onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
   560‚Üí    setTitle("");
   561‚Üí    setDescription("");
   562‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   563‚Üí    setSelectedTags([]);
   564‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(false);
   565‚Üí  };
   566‚Üí
   567‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   568‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   569‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   570‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   571‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   572‚Üí    }
   573‚Üí  };
   574‚Üí
   575‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
   576‚Üí    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
   577‚Üí  };
   578‚Üí
   579‚Üí  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
   580‚Üí    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
   581‚Üí    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
   582‚Üí  };
   583‚Üí
   584‚Üí  return (
   585‚Üí    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-3 shadow-subtle animate-scale-in">
   586‚Üí      <input
   587‚Üí        type="text"
   588‚Üí        value={title}
   589‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   590‚Üí        placeholder="Task title..."
   591‚Üí        className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent mb-2"
   592‚Üí        autoFocus
   593‚Üí      />
   594‚Üí
   595‚Üí      <textarea
   596‚Üí        value={description}
   597‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   598‚Üí        placeholder="Description (optional)..."
   599‚Üí        rows={2}
   600‚Üí        className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent resize-none mb-2"
   601‚Üí      />
   602‚Üí
   603‚Üí      {/* Tag Input */}
   604‚Üí      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
   605‚Üí        <input
   606‚Üí          type="text"
   607‚Üí          value={tagInput}
   608‚Üí          onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
   609‚Üí          onKeyDown={(e) => {
   610‚Üí            if (e.key === "Enter") {
   611‚Üí              e.preventDefault();
   612‚Üí              handleAddTag();
   613‚Üí            }
   614‚Üí          }}
   615‚Üí          placeholder="Add tag..."
   616‚Üí          className="flex-1 px-3 py-1.5 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-xs text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-accent"
   617‚Üí        />
   618‚Üí        <button
   619‚Üí          type="button"
   620‚Üí          onClick={handleAddTag}
   621‚Üí          className="px-2 py-1.5 bg-accent text-foreground rounded-lg text-xs font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
   622‚Üí        >
   623‚Üí          Add
   624‚Üí        </button>
   625‚Üí      </div>
   626‚Üí
   627‚Üí      {/* Selected Tags */}
   628‚Üí      {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
   629‚Üí        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5 mb-3">
   630‚Üí          {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
   631‚Üí            <span
   632‚Üí              key={tagName}
   633‚Üí              className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
   634‚Üí              style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
   635‚Üí            >
   636‚Üí              {tagName}
   637‚Üí              <button
   638‚Üí                type="button"
   639‚Üí                onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
   640‚Üí                className="hover:opacity-70"
   641‚Üí              >
   642‚Üí                <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   643‚Üí              </button>
   644‚Üí            </span>
   645‚Üí          ))}
   646‚Üí        </div>
   647‚Üí      )}
   648‚Üí
   649‚Üí      {/* Actions */}
   650‚Üí      <div className="flex gap-2">
   651‚Üí        <button
   652‚Üí          type="button"
   653‚Üí          onClick={onCancel}
   654‚Üí          className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
   655‚Üí        >
   656‚Üí          Cancel
   657‚Üí        </button>
   658‚Üí        <button
   659‚Üí          type="submit"
   660‚Üí          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
   661‚Üí          className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-1"
   662‚Üí        >
   663‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? (
   664‚Üí            <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
   665‚Üí          ) : (
   666‚Üí            <>
   667‚Üí              <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   668‚Üí              Add
   669‚Üí            </>
   670‚Üí          )}
   671‚Üí        </button>
   672‚Üí      </div>
   673‚Üí    </form>
   674‚Üí  );
   675‚Üí}
   676‚Üí
   677‚Üí// ListView Component
   678‚Üífunction ListView({
   679‚Üí  tasks,
   680‚Üí  availableTags,
   681‚Üí  sortBy,
   682‚Üí  onSortChange,
   683‚Üí  onUpdateTask,
   684‚Üí  onDeleteTask,
   685‚Üí}: {
   686‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   687‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   688‚Üí  sortBy: "order" | "title" | "date";
   689‚Üí  onSortChange: (sort: "order" | "title" | "date") => void;
   690‚Üí  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   691‚Üí  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
   692‚Üí}) {
   693‚Üí  const [addingTask, setAddingTask] = useState(false);
   694‚Üí
   695‚Üí  const sortedTasks = [...tasks].sort((a, b) => {
   696‚Üí    if (sortBy === "title") return a.title.localeCompare(b.title);
   697‚Üí    if (sortBy === "date") return b.createdAt.getTime() - a.createdAt.getTime();
   698‚Üí    return a.order - b.order;
   699‚Üí  });
   700‚Üí
   701‚Üí  return (
   702‚Üí    <div className="animate-fade-in">
   703‚Üí      {/* Toolbar */}
   704‚Üí      <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-start sm:items-center gap-4 mb-6">
   705‚Üí        <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-foreground">All Tasks</h2>
   706‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
   707‚Üí          {/* Sort */}
   708‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   709‚Üí            <span className="text-sm text-foreground/50">Sort:</span>
   710‚Üí            <div className="flex bg-card border border-border rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
   711‚Üí              {[
   712‚Üí                { value: "order" as const, label: "Order" },
   713‚Üí                { value: "title" as const, label: "Title" },
   714‚Üí                { value: "date" as const, label: "Date" },
   715‚Üí              ].map((option, index) => (
   716‚Üí                <button
   717‚Üí                  key={option.value}
   718‚Üí                  onClick={() => onSortChange(option.value)}
   719‚Üí                  className={cn(
   720‚Üí                    "px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium transition-all",
   721‚Üí                    sortBy === option.value ? "bg-accent text-foreground" : "text-foreground/60 hover:text-foreground hover:bg-accent/50",
   722‚Üí                    index > 0 && "border-l border-border"
   723‚Üí                  )}
   724‚Üí                >
   725‚Üí                  {option.label}
   726‚Üí                </button>
   727‚Üí              ))}
   728‚Üí            </div>
   729‚Üí          </div>
   730‚Üí          <button
   731‚Üí            onClick={() => setAddingTask(!addingTask)}
   732‚Üí            className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2"
   733‚Üí          >
   734‚Üí            <PlusIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   735‚Üí            Add Task
   736‚Üí          </button>
   737‚Üí        </div>
   738‚Üí      </div>
   739‚Üí
   740‚Üí      {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
   741‚Üí      {addingTask && (
   742‚Üí        <div className="mb-6">
   743‚Üí          <InlineTaskFormFull
   744‚Üí            availableTags={availableTags}
   745‚Üí            onSave={(data) => {
   746‚Üí              onUpdateTask(0, { ...data, status: "not_started" });
   747‚Üí              setAddingTask(false);
   748‚Üí            }}
   749‚Üí            onCancel={() => setAddingTask(false)}
   750‚Üí          />
   751‚Üí        </div>
   752‚Üí      )}
   753‚Üí
   754‚Üí      {/* Task List */}
   755‚Üí      <div className="bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium overflow-hidden">
   756‚Üí        {sortedTasks.length === 0 ? (
   757‚Üí          <div className="p-12 text-center">
   758‚Üí            <p className="text-foreground/40">No tasks yet. Create your first task to get started!</p>
   759‚Üí          </div>
   760‚Üí        ) : (
   761‚Üí          <div className="divide-y divide-border">
   762‚Üí            {sortedTasks.map((task) => (
   763‚Üí              <ListViewTaskRow
   764‚Üí                key={task.id}
   765‚Üí                task={task}
   766‚Üí                availableTags={availableTags}
   767‚Üí                onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
   768‚Üí                onDelete={onDeleteTask}
   769‚Üí              />
   770‚Üí            ))}
   771‚Üí          </div>
   772‚Üí        )}
   773‚Üí      </div>
   774‚Üí    </div>
   775‚Üí  );
   776‚Üí}
   777‚Üí
   778‚Üí// Inline Task Form (Full for ListView)
   779‚Üífunction InlineTaskFormFull({
   780‚Üí  availableTags,
   781‚Üí  onSave,
   782‚Üí  onCancel,
   783‚Üí}: {
   784‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   785‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   786‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   787‚Üí}) {
   788‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   789‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   790‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   791‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>([]);
   792‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   793‚Üí
   794‚Üí  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   795‚Üí    e.preventDefault();
   796‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   797‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   798‚Üí    await onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
   799‚Üí    setTitle("");
   800‚Üí    setDescription("");
   801‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   802‚Üí    setSelectedTags([]);
   803‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(false);
   804‚Üí  };
   805‚Üí
   806‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   807‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   808‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   809‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   810‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   811‚Üí    }
   812‚Üí  };
   813‚Üí
   814‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
   815‚Üí    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
   816‚Üí  };
   817‚Üí
   818‚Üí  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
   819‚Üí    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
   820‚Üí    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
   821‚Üí  };
   822‚Üí
   823‚Üí  return (
   824‚Üí    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-4 shadow-subtle animate-scale-in">
   825‚Üí      <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4 mb-4">
   826‚Üí        <div>
   827‚Üí          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-1">Title *</label>
   828‚Üí          <input
   829‚Üí            type="text"
   830‚Üí            value={title}
   831‚Üí            onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   832‚Üí            placeholder="What needs to be done?"
   833‚Üí            className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
   834‚Üí            autoFocus
   835‚Üí          />
   836‚Üí        </div>
   837‚Üí        <div>
   838‚Üí          <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-1">Tags</label>
   839‚Üí          <div className="flex gap-2">
   840‚Üí            <input
   841‚Üí              type="text"
   842‚Üí              value={tagInput}
   843‚Üí              onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
   844‚Üí              onKeyDown={(e) => {
   845‚Üí                if (e.key === "Enter") {
   846‚Üí                  e.preventDefault();
   847‚Üí                  handleAddTag();
   848‚Üí                }
   849‚Üí              }}
   850‚Üí              placeholder="Add tag..."
   851‚Üí              className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
   852‚Üí            />
   853‚Üí            <button
   854‚Üí              type="button"
   855‚Üí              onClick={handleAddTag}
   856‚Üí              className="px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
   857‚Üí            >
   858‚Üí              Add
   859‚Üí            </button>
   860‚Üí          </div>
   861‚Üí        </div>
   862‚Üí      </div>
   863‚Üí
   864‚Üí      <div className="mb-4">
   865‚Üí        <label className="block text-sm font-medium text-foreground mb-1">Description</label>
   866‚Üí        <textarea
   867‚Üí          value={description}
   868‚Üí          onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   869‚Üí          placeholder="Add more details..."
   870‚Üí          rows={2}
   871‚Üí          className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent resize-none"
   872‚Üí        />
   873‚Üí      </div>
   874‚Üí
   875‚Üí      {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
   876‚Üí        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-4">
   877‚Üí          {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
   878‚Üí            <span
   879‚Üí              key={tagName}
   880‚Üí              className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
   881‚Üí              style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
   882‚Üí            >
   883‚Üí              {tagName}
   884‚Üí              <button
   885‚Üí                type="button"
   886‚Üí                onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
   887‚Üí                className="hover:opacity-70"
   888‚Üí              >
   889‚Üí                <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   890‚Üí              </button>
   891‚Üí            </span>
   892‚Üí          ))}
   893‚Üí        </div>
   894‚Üí      )}
   895‚Üí
   896‚Üí      <div className="flex gap-3">
   897‚Üí        <button
   898‚Üí          type="button"
   899‚Üí          onClick={onCancel}
   900‚Üí          className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
   901‚Üí        >
   902‚Üí          Cancel
   903‚Üí        </button>
   904‚Üí        <button
   905‚Üí          type="submit"
   906‚Üí          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
   907‚Üí          className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-2"
   908‚Üí        >
   909‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? (
   910‚Üí            <>
   911‚Üí              <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
   912‚Üí              Creating...
   913‚Üí            </>
   914‚Üí          ) : (
   915‚Üí            <>
   916‚Üí              <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   917‚Üí              Create Task
   918‚Üí            </>
   919‚Üí          )}
   920‚Üí        </button>
   921‚Üí      </div>
   922‚Üí    </form>
   923‚Üí  );
   924‚Üí}
   925‚Üí
   926‚Üí// ListView Task Row with inline editing
   927‚Üífunction ListViewTaskRow({
   928‚Üí  task,
   929‚Üí  availableTags,
   930‚Üí  onUpdate,
   931‚Üí  onDelete,
   932‚Üí}: {
   933‚Üí  task: Task;
   934‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   935‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   936‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   937‚Üí}) {
   938‚Üí  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
   939‚Üí  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
   940‚Üí  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
   941‚Üí  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
   942‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   943‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
   944‚Üí  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
   945‚Üí  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
   946‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   947‚Üí
   948‚Üí  const handleSave = async () => {
   949‚Üí    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
   950‚Üí      setTitleError("Title is required");
   951‚Üí      return;
   952‚Üí    }
   953‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   954‚Üí    setTitleError("");
   955‚Üí    await onUpdate(task.id, {
   956‚Üí      title: editTitle.trim(),
   957‚Üí      description: editDescription.trim(),
   958‚Üí      status: editStatus,
   959‚Üí      tags: selectedTags,
   960‚Üí    });
   961‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   962‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(false);
   963‚Üí  };
   964‚Üí
   965‚Üí  const handleCancel = () => {
   966‚Üí    setEditTitle(task.title);
   967‚Üí    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
   968‚Üí    setEditStatus(task.status);
   969‚Üí    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
   970‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   971‚Üí    setTitleError("");
   972‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   973‚Üí  };
   974‚Üí
   975‚Üí  const handleDeleteClick = () => {
   976‚Üí    setShowDeleteConfirm(true);
   977‚Üí  };
   978‚Üí
   979‚Üí  const confirmDelete = () => {
   980‚Üí    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
   981‚Üí    setIsEditing(false);
   982‚Üí    onDelete(task.id);
   983‚Üí  };
   984‚Üí
   985‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   986‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   987‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   988‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   989‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   990‚Üí    }
   991‚Üí  };
   992‚Üí
   993‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
   994‚Üí    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
   995‚Üí  };
   996‚Üí
   997‚Üí  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
   998‚Üí    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
   999‚Üí    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
  1000‚Üí  };
  1001‚Üí
  1002‚Üí  if (isEditing) {
  1003‚Üí    return (
  1004‚Üí      <div className="p-4 bg-accent/10 border-l-2 border-accent animate-slide-down">
  1005‚Üí        {showDeleteConfirm ? (
  1006‚Üí          <div className="flex flex-col items-center justify-center py-8">
  1007‚Üí            <p className="text-foreground/70 mb-4">Delete this task?</p>
  1008‚Üí            <div className="flex gap-3">
  1009‚Üí              <button
  1010‚Üí                onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(false)}
  1011‚Üí                className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
  1012‚Üí              >
  1013‚Üí                Cancel
  1014‚Üí              </button>
  1015‚Üí              <button
  1016‚Üí                onClick={confirmDelete}
  1017‚Üí                className="px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all"
  1018‚Üí              >
  1019‚Üí                Delete
  1020‚Üí              </button>
  1021‚Üí            </div>
  1022‚Üí          </div>
  1023‚Üí        ) : (
  1024‚Üí          <div className="space-y-3">
  1025‚Üí            <div>
  1026‚Üí              <input
  1027‚Üí                type="text"
  1028‚Üí                value={editTitle}
  1029‚Üí                onChange={(e) => {
  1030‚Üí                  setEditTitle(e.target.value);
  1031‚Üí                  setTitleError("");
  1032‚Üí                }}
  1033‚Üí                className={`w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium ${
  1034‚Üí                  titleError ? "border-red-500" : "border-border"
  1035‚Üí                } focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent`}
  1036‚Üí                placeholder="Task title..."
  1037‚Üí                autoFocus
  1038‚Üí              />
  1039‚Üí              {titleError && (
  1040‚Üí                <p className="text-red-400 text-xs mt-1">{titleError}</p>
  1041‚Üí              )}
  1042‚Üí            </div>
  1043‚Üí
  1044‚Üí            <textarea
  1045‚Üí              value={editDescription}
  1046‚Üí              onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
  1047‚Üí              className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm resize-none"
  1048‚Üí              placeholder="Description..."
  1049‚Üí              rows={2}
  1050‚Üí            />
  1051‚Üí
  1052‚Üí            <div>
  1053‚Üí              <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
  1054‚Üí                <input
  1055‚Üí                  type="text"
  1056‚Üí                  value={tagInput}
  1057‚Üí                  onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
  1058‚Üí                  onKeyDown={(e) => {
  1059‚Üí                    if (e.key === "Enter") {
  1060‚Üí                      e.preventDefault();
  1061‚Üí                      handleAddTag();
  1062‚Üí                    }
  1063‚Üí                  }}
  1064‚Üí                  className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
  1065‚Üí                  placeholder="Add tag..."
  1066‚Üí                />
  1067‚Üí                <button
  1068‚Üí                  type="button"
  1069‚Üí                  onClick={handleAddTag}
  1070‚Üí                  className="px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover"
  1071‚Üí                >
  1072‚Üí                  Add
  1073‚Üí                </button>
  1074‚Üí              </div>
  1075‚Üí              {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
  1076‚Üí                <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5">
  1077‚Üí                  {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
  1078‚Üí                    <span
  1079‚Üí                      key={tagName}
  1080‚Üí                      className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
  1081‚Üí                      style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
  1082‚Üí                    >
  1083‚Üí                      {tagName}
  1084‚Üí                      <button
  1085‚Üí                        type="button"
  1086‚Üí                        onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
  1087‚Üí                        className="hover:opacity-70"
  1088‚Üí                      >

"use client";

import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from "react";
import { useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { TrashIcon, CheckIcon, XMarkIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

interface TaskCardProps {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
  dragAttributes?: any;
  dragListeners?: any;
}

const TAG_COLORS = [
  "#6366f1", "#8b5cf6", "#ec4899", "#f43f5e", "#f97316", "#eab308", "#22c55e", "#14b8a6",
];

const STATUSES = [
  { value: "not_started" as TaskStatus, label: "To Do" },
  { value: "in_progress" as TaskStatus, label: "In Progress" },
  { value: "complete" as TaskStatus, label: "Done" },
];

export default function TaskCard({ task, availableTags, onUpdate, onDelete, dragAttributes, dragListeners }: TaskCardProps) {
  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
  const containerRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);

  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({
    id: task.id.toString(),
    data: { status: task.status },
    disabled: isEditing,
  });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  const handleSave = async () => {
    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
      setTitleError("Title is required");
      return;
    }
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    setTitleError("");
    await onUpdate(task.id, {
      title: editTitle.trim(),
      description: editDescription.trim(),
      status: editStatus,
      tags: selectedTags,
    });
    setIsEditing(false);
    setIsSubmitting(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    setEditTitle(task.title);
    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
    setEditStatus(task.status);
    setSelectedTags(task.tags.map((t) => t.name));
    setTagInput("");
    setTitleError("");
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
    if (e.key === "Enter" && !e.shiftKey) {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleSave();
    } else if (e.key === "Escape") {
      handleCancel();
    }
  };

  // Handle click outside to save
  useEffect(() => {
    const handleClickOutside = (event: MouseEvent) => {
      if (containerRef.current && !containerRef.current.contains(event.target as Node)) {
        if (isEditing) {
          handleSave();
        }
      }
    };

    document.addEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside);
    return () => document.removeEventListener("mousedown", handleClickOutside);
  }, [isEditing]);

  const handleAddTag = () => {
    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
      setTagInput("");
    }
  };

  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
  };

  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
  };

  const handleDeleteClick = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(true);
  };

  const confirmDelete = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
    setIsEditing(false);
    onDelete(task.id);
  };

  if (isEditing) {
    return (
      <div
        ref={setNodeRef}
        style={style}
        className="bg-card border border-accent rounded-xl shadow-glow p-4 relative"
      >
        {showDeleteConfirm ? (
          <div className="absolute inset-0 bg-card/95 z-10 flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-4 rounded-xl">
            <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="w-10 h-10 text-red-500 mb-3" />
            <h3 className="font-bold text-foreground mb-2">Delete this task?</h3>
            <p className="text-sm text-foreground/60 mb-4 text-center">This action cannot be undone.</p>
            <div className="flex gap-3">
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(false)}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
              >
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={confirmDelete}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700 text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all"
              >
                Delete
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <div ref={containerRef}>
            <div>
              <input
                type="text"
                value={editTitle}
                onChange={(e) => {
                  setEditTitle(e.target.value);
                  setTitleError("");
                }}
                onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
                className={`w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border rounded-lg font-semibold ${
                  titleError ? "border-red-500" : "border-border"
                } focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent text-foreground mb-2`}
                placeholder="Task title..."
                autoFocus
              />
              {titleError && (
                <p className="text-red-400 text-xs font-medium flex items-center gap-1">
                  <ExclamationTriangleIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                  {titleError}
                </p>
              )}
            </div>

            <textarea
              value={editDescription}
              onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
              className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground resize-y min-h-[80px] mb-3"
              placeholder="Add description..."
              rows={3}
            />

            <div className="mb-3">
              <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-2">
                {STATUSES.map((s) => (
                  <button
                    key={s.value}
                    type="button"
                    onClick={() => setEditStatus(s.value)}
                    className={`px-3 py-1.5 border rounded-lg text-xs font-medium transition-all ${
                      editStatus === s.value
                        ? "bg-accent text-white border-accent"
                        : "bg-background border-border hover:bg-accent/50 hover:text-accent-hover"
                    }`}
                  >
                    {s.label}
                  </button>
                ))}
              </div>
            </div>

            <div className="mb-3">
              <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
                <input
                  type="text"
                  value={tagInput}
                  onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
                  onKeyDown={(e) => {
                    if (e.key === "Enter") {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      handleAddTag();
                    }
                  }}
                  className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent"
                  placeholder="Add tag..."
                />
                <button
                  type="button"
                  onClick={handleAddTag}
                  className="px-3 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-foreground rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all"
                >
                  Add
                </button>
              </div>
              {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
                <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5">
                  {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
                    <span
                      key={tagName}
                      className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
                      style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
                    >
                      {tagName}
                      <button
                        type="button"
                        onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
                        className="hover:opacity-70"
                      >
                        <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
                      </button>
                    </span>
                  ))}
                </div>
              )}
            </div>

            <div className="flex gap-2">
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleDeleteClick}
                className="px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-red-600/10 hover:text-red-500 hover:border-red-500/30 transition-all"
              >
                <TrashIcon className="w-4 h-4 inline mr-1" />
                Delete
              </button>
              <div className="flex-1" />
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleCancel}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
              >
                <XMarkIcon className="w-4 h-4 inline mr-1" />
                Cancel
              </button>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleSave}
                disabled={!editTitle.trim() || isSubmitting}
                className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-1"
              >
                {isSubmitting ? (
                  <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
                ) : (
                  <>
                    <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
                    Save
                  </>
                )}
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div
      ref={setNodeRef}
      style={style}
      {...(dragAttributes || {})}
      {...(dragListeners || {})}
      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
      className="bg-card border border-border rounded-xl shadow-subtle p-4 cursor-move hover:shadow-glow hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all active:scale-95"
    >
      <h3 className="font-semibold text-foreground mb-2">{task.title}</h3>
      {task.description && (
        <p className="text-foreground/50 text-sm mb-3 line-clamp-3">{task.description}</p>
      )}

      {task.tags.length > 0 && (
        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5">
          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
            <span
              key={tag.id}
              className="px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
              style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }}
            >
              {tag.name}
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

    34‚Üí  { value: "complete", label: "Done" },
    35‚Üí];
    36‚Üí
    37‚Üíconst TAG_COLORS = [
    38‚Üí  "#6366f1", "#8b5cf6", "#ec4899", "#f43f5e", "#f97316", "#eab308", "#22c55e", "#14b8a6",
    39‚Üí];
    40‚Üí
    41‚Üíexport default function Board() {
    42‚Üí  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([]);
    43‚Üí  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>>([]);
    44‚Üí  const [view, setView] = useState<"board" | "list">("board");
    45‚Üí  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("");
    46‚Üí  const [filterTag, setFilterTag] = useState<number | null>(null);
    47‚Üí  const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState<number | null>(null);
    48‚Üí  const [addingToColumn, setAddingToColumn] = useState<TaskStatus | null>(null);
    49‚Üí  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
    50‚Üí  const [listSortBy, setListSortBy] = useState<"order" | "title" | "date">("order");
    51‚Üí
    52‚Üí  const sensors = useSensors(
    53‚Üí    useSensor(PointerSensor, {
    54‚Üí      activationConstraint: {
    55‚Üí        distance: 8,
    56‚Üí      },
    57‚Üí    })
    58‚Üí  );
    59‚Üí
    60‚Üí  // Fetch data
    61‚Üí  const fetchTasks = useCallback(async () => {
    62‚Üí    try {
    63‚Üí      const params = new URLSearchParams();
    64‚Üí      if (filterTag) params.append("tagId", filterTag.toString());
    65‚Üí
    66‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks?${params}`);
    67‚Üí      if (response.ok) {
    68‚Üí        const data = await response.json();
    69‚Üí        setTasks(data);
    70‚Üí      }
    71‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    72‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to load tasks", {
    73‚Üí        action: {
    74‚Üí          label: "Retry",
    75‚Üí          onClick: () => fetchTasks(),
    76‚Üí        },
    77‚Üí      });
    78‚Üí    } finally {
    79‚Üí      setIsLoading(false);
    80‚Üí    }
    81‚Üí  }, [filterTag]);
    82‚Üí
    83‚Üí  const fetchTags = async () => {
    84‚Üí    try {
    85‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tags");
    86‚Üí      if (response.ok) {
    87‚Üí        const data = await response.json();
    88‚Üí        setTags(data);
    89‚Üí      }
    90‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    91‚Üí      console.error("Failed to load tags");
    92‚Üí    }
    93‚Üí  };
    94‚Üí
    95‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
    96‚Üí    fetchTasks();
    97‚Üí    fetchTags();
    98‚Üí  }, [filterTag]);
    99‚Üí
   100‚Üí  // Filter tasks by search
   101‚Üí  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter((task) =>
   102‚Üí    task.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
   103‚Üí    (task.description && task.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()))
   104‚Üí  );
   105‚Üí
   106‚Üí  // Group tasks by status for board view
   107‚Üí  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {
   108‚Üí    not_started: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === "not_started"),
   109‚Üí    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === "in_progress"),
   110‚Üí    complete: filteredTasks.filter((t) => t.status === "complete"),
   111‚Üí  };
   112‚Üí
   113‚Üí  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => {
   114‚Üí    const { active } = event;
   115‚Üí    setActiveId(parseInt(active.id as string));
   116‚Üí  };
   117‚Üí
   118‚Üí  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
   119‚Üí    const { active, over } = event;
   120‚Üí    setActiveId(null);
   121‚Üí
   122‚Üí    if (!over) return;
   123‚Üí
   124‚Üí    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
   125‚Üí    const overId = parseInt(over.id as string);
   126‚Üí
   127‚Üí    // Find the active task
   128‚Üí    const activeTask = tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId);
   129‚Üí    if (!activeTask) return;
   130‚Üí
   131‚Üí    // Find over task or column
   132‚Üí    const overTask = tasks.find((t) => t.id === overId);
   133‚Üí    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;
   134‚Üí
   135‚Üí    let newStatus = activeTask.status;
   136‚Üí    let newTasks = [...tasks];
   137‚Üí    let activeIndex = newTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === activeId);
   138‚Üí
   139‚Üí    if (overTask) {
   140‚Üí      newStatus = overTask.status;
   141‚Üí      const overIndex = newTasks.findIndex((t) => t.id === overId);
   142‚Üí
   143‚Üí      if (activeTask.status === newStatus) {
   144‚Üí        newTasks = arrayMove(newTasks, activeIndex, overIndex);
   145‚Üí      } else {
   146‚Üí        newTasks[activeIndex] = { ...activeTask, status: newStatus };
   147‚Üí        newTasks.splice(overIndex, 0, newTasks.splice(activeIndex, 1)[0]);
   148‚Üí      }
   149‚Üí    } else if (overStatus) {
   150‚Üí      newStatus = overStatus;
   151‚Üí      newTasks[activeIndex] = { ...activeTask, status: newStatus };
   152‚Üí    }
   153‚Üí
   154‚Üí    // Recalculate orders
   155‚Üí    const updates: Array<{ id: number; status: TaskStatus; order: number }> = [];
   156‚Üí    STATUSES.forEach(({ value: status }) => {
   157‚Üí      newTasks
   158‚Üí        .filter((t) => t.status === status)
   159‚Üí        .forEach((task, index) => {
   160‚Üí          updates.push({ id: task.id, status, order: index });
   161‚Üí        });
   162‚Üí    });
   163‚Üí
   164‚Üí    setTasks(newTasks);
   165‚Üí
   166‚Üí    try {
   167‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks/reorder", {
   168‚Üí        method: "POST",
   169‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   170‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ updates }),
   171‚Üí      });
   172‚Üí
   173‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to reorder");
   174‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   175‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to reorder tasks", {
   176‚Üí        action: { label: "Retry", onClick: () => fetchTasks() },
   177‚Üí      });
   178‚Üí      fetchTasks();
   179‚Üí    }
   180‚Üí  };
   181‚Üí
   182‚Üí  const handleCreateTask = async (status: TaskStatus, data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => {
   183‚Üí    try {
   184‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
   185‚Üí        method: "POST",
   186‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   187‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ ...data, status }),
   188‚Üí      });
   189‚Üí
   190‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create task");
   191‚Üí
   192‚Üí      const newTask = await response.json();
   193‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => [...prev, newTask]);
   194‚Üí      toast.success("Task created");
   195‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   196‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to create task", {
   197‚Üí        action: {
   198‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   199‚Üí          onClick: () => handleCreateTask(status, data),
   200‚Üí        },
   201‚Üí      });
   202‚Üí    }
   203‚Üí  };
   204‚Üí
   205‚Üí  const handleUpdateTask = async (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => {
   206‚Üí    try {
   207‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   208‚Üí        method: "PATCH",
   209‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   210‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(data),
   211‚Üí      });
   212‚Üí
   213‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to update task");
   214‚Üí
   215‚Üí      const updatedTask = await response.json();
   216‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.map((t) => (t.id === id ? updatedTask : t)));
   217‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   218‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to update task", {
   219‚Üí        action: {
   220‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   221‚Üí          onClick: () => handleUpdateTask(id, data),
   222‚Üí        },
   223‚Üí      });
   224‚Üí    }
   225‚Üí  };
   226‚Üí
   227‚Üí  const handleDeleteTask = async (id: number) => {
   228‚Üí    try {
   229‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   230‚Üí        method: "DELETE",
   231‚Üí      });
   232‚Üí
   233‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to delete task");
   234‚Üí
   235‚Üí      setTasks((prev) => prev.filter((t) => t.id !== id));
   236‚Üí      toast.success("Task deleted");
   237‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   238‚Üí      toast.error("Failed to delete task", {
   239‚Üí        action: {
   240‚Üí          label: "Retry",
   241‚Üí          onClick: () => handleDeleteTask(id),
   242‚Üí        },
   243‚Üí      });
   244‚Üí    }
   245‚Üí  };
   246‚Üí
   247‚Üí  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find((t) => t.id === activeId) : null;
   248‚Üí
   249‚Üí  if (isLoading) {
   250‚Üí    return (
   251‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen bg-background flex items-center justify-center">
   252‚Üí        <div className="flex flex-col items-center gap-4">
   253‚Üí          <div className="w-10 h-10 border-2 border-accent border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
   254‚Üí          <p className="text-foreground/70 font-medium">Loading...</p>
   255‚Üí        </div>
   256‚Üí      </div>
   257‚Üí    );
   258‚Üí  }
   259‚Üí
   260‚Üí  return (
   261‚Üí    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-subtle">
   262‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   263‚Üí      <header className="sticky top-0 z-40 bg-background/80 backdrop-blur-lg border-b border-border">
   264‚Üí        <div className="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto px-6 py-4">
   265‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center justify-between gap-4">
   266‚Üí            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-foreground tracking-tight">My Tasks</h1>
   267‚Üí
   268‚Üí            <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
   269‚Üí              {/* Search */}
   270‚Üí              <div className="relative group">
   271‚Üí                <MagnifyingGlassIcon className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 w-4 h-4 text-foreground/40 group-focus-within:text-foreground/70 transition-colors" />
   272‚Üí                <input
   273‚Üí                  type="text"
   274‚Üí                  placeholder="Search..."
   275‚Üí                  value={searchQuery}
   276‚Üí                  onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
   277‚Üí                  className="w-48 pl-9 pr-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent transition-all"
   278‚Üí                />
   279‚Üí              </div>
   280‚Üí
   281‚Üí              {/* Tag Filter */}
   282‚Üí              {filterTag ? (
   283‚Üí                <button
   284‚Üí                  onClick={() => setFilterTag(null)}
   285‚Üí                  className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-accent text-foreground rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
   286‚Üí                >
   287‚Üí                  <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   288‚Üí                  <span>Clear</span>
   289‚Üí                  <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   290‚Üí                </button>
   291‚Üí              ) : (
   292‚Üí                <div className="relative">
   293‚Üí                  <button className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all">
   294‚Üí                    <TagIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   295‚Üí                    <span>Filter</span>
   296‚Üí                  </button>
   297‚Üí                  <div className="absolute right-0 top-full mt-2 w-48 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg shadow-medium hidden group-hover:block">
   298‚Üí                    <div className="p-2">
   299‚Üí                      <div className="text-xs font-medium text-foreground/50 mb-2 px-2">FILTER BY TAG</div>
   300‚Üí                      {tags.map((tag) => (
   301‚Üí                        <button
   302‚Üí                          key={tag.id}
   303‚Üí                          onClick={() => setFilterTag(tag.id)}
   304‚Üí                          className="w-full text-left px-2 py-1.5 rounded-md hover:bg-accent transition-colors flex items-center gap-2"
   305‚Üí                        >
   306‚Üí                          <span className="w-2 h-2 rounded-full" style={{ backgroundColor: tag.color }} />
   307‚Üí                          <span className="text-sm text-foreground">{tag.name}</span>
   308‚Üí                          <span className="text-xs text-foreground/40 ml-auto">{tag.taskCount}</span>
   309‚Üí                        </button>
   310‚Üí                      ))}
   311‚Üí                      {tags.length === 0 && (
   312‚Üí                        <div className="text-sm text-foreground/40 px-2 py-2">No tags yet</div>
   313‚Üí                      )}
   314‚Üí                    </div>
   315‚Üí                  </div>
   316‚Üí                </div>
   317‚Üí              )}
   318‚Üí
   319‚Üí              {/* View Toggle */}
   320‚Üí              <div className="flex bg-card border border-border rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
   321‚Üí                <button
   322‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("board")}
   323‚Üí                  className={cn(
   324‚Üí                    "p-2 text-foreground/70 hover:text-foreground transition-all",
   325‚Üí                    view === "board" && "bg-accent text-foreground"
   326‚Üí                  )}
   327‚Üí                >
   328‚Üí                  <Squares2X2Icon className="w-4 h-4" />
   329‚Üí                </button>
   330‚Üí                <button
   331‚Üí                  onClick={() => setView("list")}
   332‚Üí                  className={cn(
   333‚Üí                    "p-2 text-foreground/70 hover:text-foreground transition-all border-l border-border",
   334‚Üí                    view === "list" && "bg-accent text-foreground"
   335‚Üí                  )}
   336‚Üí                >
   337‚Üí                  <ListBulletIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   338‚Üí                </button>
   339‚Üí              </div>
   340‚Üí
   341‚Üí              {/* Sign Out */}
   342‚Üí              <button
   343‚Üí                onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
   344‚Üí                className="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-2 bg-card border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
   345‚Üí              >
   346‚Üí                <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   347‚Üí                <span className="hidden sm:inline">Sign Out</span>
   348‚Üí              </button>
   349‚Üí            </div>
   350‚Üí          </div>
   351‚Üí        </div>
   352‚Üí      </header>
   353‚Üí
   354‚Üí      {/* Main Content */}
   355‚Üí      <main className="max-w-[1600px] mx-auto p-6">
   356‚Üí        {view === "board" ? (
   357‚Üí          <DndContext
   358‚Üí            sensors={sensors}
   359‚Üí            collisionDetection={closestCorners}
   360‚Üí            onDragStart={handleDragStart}
   361‚Üí            onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}
   362‚Üí          >
   363‚Üí            <div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6">
   364‚Üí              {STATUSES.map((status) => (
   365‚Üí                <BoardColumn
   366‚Üí                  key={status.value}
   367‚Üí                  status={status.value}
   368‚Üí                  label={status.label}
   369‚Üí                  tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
   370‚Üí                  availableTags={tags}
   371‚Üí                  isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
   372‚Üí                  onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
   373‚Üí                  onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
   374‚Üí                  onCreateTask={(data) => {
   375‚Üí                    handleCreateTask(status.value, data);
   376‚Üí                    setAddingToColumn(null);
   377‚Üí                  }}
   378‚Üí                  onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   379‚Üí                  onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   380‚Üí                />
   381‚Üí              ))}
   382‚Üí            </div>
   383‚Üí
   384‚Üí            <DragOverlay>
   385‚Üí              {activeTask ? (
   386‚Üí                <div className="w-72 opacity-80 rotate-2 shadow-glow-lg">
   387‚Üí                  <TaskCard
   388‚Üí                    task={activeTask}
   389‚Üí                    availableTags={tags}
   390‚Üí                    onUpdate={() => {}}
   391‚Üí                    onDelete={() => {}}
   392‚Üí                  />
   393‚Üí                </div>
   394‚Üí              ) : null}
   395‚Üí            </DragOverlay>
   396‚Üí          </DndContext>
   397‚Üí        ) : (
   398‚Üí          <ListView
   399‚Üí            tasks={filteredTasks}
   400‚Üí            availableTags={tags}
   401‚Üí            sortBy={listSortBy}
   402‚Üí            onSortChange={setListSortBy}
   403‚Üí            onUpdateTask={handleUpdateTask}
   404‚Üí            onDeleteTask={handleDeleteTask}
   405‚Üí          />
   406‚Üí        )}
   407‚Üí      </main>
   408‚Üí    </div>
   409‚Üí  );
   410‚Üí}
   411‚Üí
   412‚Üí// Board Column Component
   413‚Üífunction BoardColumn({
   414‚Üí  status,
   415‚Üí  label,
   416‚Üí  tasks,
   417‚Üí  availableTags,
   418‚Üí  isAdding,
   419‚Üí  onAddStart,
   420‚Üí  onAddCancel,
   421‚Üí  onCreateTask,
   422‚Üí  onUpdateTask,
   423‚Üí  onDeleteTask,
   424‚Üí}: {
   425‚Üí  status: TaskStatus;
   426‚Üí  label: string;
   427‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   428‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   429‚Üí  isAdding: boolean;
   430‚Üí  onAddStart: () => void;
   431‚Üí  onAddCancel: () => void;
   432‚Üí  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   433‚Üí  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   434‚Üí  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
   435‚Üí}) {
   436‚Üí  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({
   437‚Üí    id: status,
   438‚Üí    data: { status },
   439‚Üí  });
   440‚Üí
   441‚Üí  const taskIds = tasks.map((t) => t.id.toString());
   442‚Üí
   443‚Üí  return (
   444‚Üí    <div
   445‚Üí      ref={setNodeRef}
   446‚Üí      className="flex flex-col h-full bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium animate-fade-in"
   447‚Üí    >
   448‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   449‚Üí      <div className="px-4 py-3 border-b border-border flex items-center justify-between">
   450‚Üí        <h3 className="font-semibold text-foreground">{label}</h3>
   451‚Üí        <span className="text-xs font-medium px-2 py-0.5 bg-accent rounded-full text-foreground/70">
   452‚Üí          {tasks.length}
   453‚Üí        </span>
   454‚Üí      </div>
   455‚Üí
   456‚Üí      {/* Task List */}
   457‚Üí      <div className="flex-1 p-3 space-y-3 min-h-[200px]">
   458‚Üí        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
   459‚Üí          {tasks.map((task) => (
   460‚Üí            <SortableTaskCard
   461‚Üí              key={task.id}
   462‚Üí              task={task}
   463‚Üí              availableTags={availableTags}
   464‚Üí              onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
   465‚Üí              onDelete={onDeleteTask}
   466‚Üí            />
   467‚Üí          ))}
   468‚Üí        </SortableContext>
   469‚Üí
   470‚Üí        {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
   471‚Üí        {isAdding ? (
   472‚Üí          <InlineTaskForm
   473‚Üí            availableTags={availableTags}
   474‚Üí            onSave={onCreateTask}
   475‚Üí            onCancel={onAddCancel}
   476‚Üí          />
   477‚Üí        ) : (
   478‚Üí          <button
   479‚Üí            onClick={onAddStart}
   480‚Üí            className="w-full py-3 border border-dashed border-border rounded-xl text-sm font-medium text-foreground/50 hover:text-foreground hover:border-accent/50 hover:bg-accent/10 transition-all flex items-center justify-center gap-2"
   481‚Üí          >
   482‚Üí            <PlusIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   483‚Üí            <span>Add task</span>
   484‚Üí          </button>
   485‚Üí        )}
   486‚Üí      </div>
   487‚Üí    </div>
   488‚Üí  );
   489‚Üí}

   491‚Üí// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
   492‚Üíimport { useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
   493‚Üíimport { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
   494‚Üíimport { SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
   495‚Üí
   496‚Üífunction SortableTaskCard({
   497‚Üí  task,
   498‚Üí  availableTags,
   499‚Üí  onUpdate,
   500‚Üí  onDelete,
   501‚Üí}: {
   502‚Üí  task: Task;
   503‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   504‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   505‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   506‚Üí}) {
   507‚Üí  const {
   508‚Üí    attributes,
   509‚Üí    listeners,
   510‚Üí    setNodeRef,
   511‚Üí    transform,
   512‚Üí    transition,
   513‚Üí    isDragging,
   514‚Üí  } = useSortable({
   515‚Üí    id: task.id.toString(),
   516‚Üí    data: { status: task.status },
   517‚Üí  });
   518‚Üí
   519‚Üí  const style = {
   520‚Üí    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
   521‚Üí    transition,
   522‚Üí    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
   523‚Üí  };
   524‚Üí
   525‚Üí  return (
   526‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
   527‚Üí      <TaskCard
   528‚Üí        task={task}
   529‚Üí        availableTags={availableTags}
   530‚Üí        onUpdate={onUpdate}
   531‚Üí        onDelete={onDelete}
   532‚Üí        dragAttributes={attributes}
   533‚Üí        dragListeners={listeners}
   534‚Üí      />
   535‚Üí    </div>
   536‚Üí  );
   537‚Üí}
   538‚Üí
   539‚Üí// Inline Task Form for Board Column
   540‚Üífunction InlineTaskForm({
   541‚Üí  availableTags,
   542‚Üí  onSave,
   543‚Üí  onCancel,
   544‚Üí}: {
   545‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   546‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   547‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   548‚Üí}) {
   549‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   550‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   551‚Üí  const [tagInput, setTagInput] = useState("");
   552‚Üí  const [selectedTags, setSelectedTags] = useState<string[]>([]);
   553‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   554‚Üí
   555‚Üí  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   556‚Üí    e.preventDefault();
   557‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   558‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   559‚Üí    await onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
   560‚Üí    setTitle("");
   561‚Üí    setDescription("");
   562‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   563‚Üí    setSelectedTags([]);
   564‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(false);
   565‚Üí  };
   566‚Üí
   567‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   568‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   569‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   570‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   571‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   572‚Üí    }
   573‚Üí  };
   574‚Üí
   575‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {
   576‚Üí    setSelectedTags(selectedTags.filter((t) => t !== tagName));
   577‚Üí  };
   578‚Üí
   579‚Üí  const getTagColor = (tagName: string) => {
   580‚Üí    const existing = availableTags.find((t) => t.name === tagName);
   581‚Üí    return existing?.color || TAG_COLORS[Math.floor(Math.random() * TAG_COLORS.length)];
   582‚Üí  };
   583‚Üí
   584‚Üí  return (
   585‚Üí    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="bg-card border border-border rounded-xl p-3 shadow-subtle animate-scale-in">
   586‚Üí      <input
   587‚Üí        type="text"
   588‚Üí        value={title}
   589‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   590‚Üí        placeholder="Task title..."
   591‚Üí        className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent mb-2"
   592‚Üí        autoFocus
   593‚Üí      />
   594‚Üí
   595‚Üí      <textarea
   596‚Üí        value={description}
   597‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   598‚Üí        placeholder="Description (optional)..."
   599‚Üí        rows={2}
   600‚Üí        className="w-full px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:border-transparent resize-none mb-2"
   601‚Üí      />
   602‚Üí
   603‚Üí      {/* Tag Input */}
   604‚Üí      <div className="flex gap-2 mb-2">
   605‚Üí        <input
   606‚Üí          type="text"
   607‚Üí          value={tagInput}
   608‚Üí          onChange={(e) => setTagInput(e.target.value)}
   609‚Üí          onKeyDown={(e) => {
   610‚Üí            if (e.key === "Enter") {
   611‚Üí              e.preventDefault();
   612‚Üí              handleAddTag();
   613‚Üí            }
   614‚Üí          }}
   615‚Üí          placeholder="Add tag..."
   616‚Üí          className="flex-1 px-3 py-1.5 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-xs text-foreground placeholder-foreground/40 focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-accent"
   617‚Üí        />
   618‚Üí        <button
   619‚Üí          type="button"
   620‚Üí          onClick={handleAddTag}
   621‚Üí          className="px-2 py-1.5 bg-accent text-foreground rounded-lg text-xs font-medium hover:bg-accent-hover transition-all"
   622‚Üí        >
   623‚Üí          Add
   624‚Üí        </button>
   625‚Üí      </div>
   626‚Üí
   627‚Üí      {/* Selected Tags */}
   628‚Üí      {selectedTags.length > 0 && (
   629‚Üí        <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1.5 mb-3">
   630‚Üí          {selectedTags.map((tagName) => (
   631‚Üí            <span
   632‚Üí              key={tagName}
   633‚Üí              className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium rounded-full text-white"
   634‚Üí              style={{ backgroundColor: getTagColor(tagName) }}
   635‚Üí            >
   636‚Üí              {tagName}
   637‚Üí              <button
   638‚Üí                type="button"
   639‚Üí                onClick={() => handleRemoveTag(tagName)}
   640‚Üí                className="hover:opacity-70"
   641‚Üí              >
   642‚Üí                <XMarkIcon className="w-3 h-3" />
   643‚Üí              </button>
   644‚Üí            </span>
   645‚Üí          ))}
   646‚Üí        </div>
   647‚Üí      )}
   648‚Üí
   649‚Üí      {/* Actions */}
   650‚Üí      <div className="flex gap-2">
   651‚Üí        <button
   652‚Üí          type="button"
   653‚Üí          onClick={onCancel}
   654‚Üí          className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-sm font-medium hover:bg-accent transition-all"
   655‚Üí        >
   656‚Üí          Cancel
   657‚Üí        </button>
   658‚Üí        <button
   659‚Üí          type="submit"
   660‚Üí          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
   661‚Üí          className="flex-1 px-3 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center justify-center gap-1"
   662‚Üí        >
   663‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? (
   664‚Üí            <div className="w-4 h-4 border-2 border-white/30 border-t-transparent rounded-full animate-spin" />
   665‚Üí          ) : (
   666‚Üí            <>
   667‚Üí              <CheckIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   668‚Üí              Add
   669‚Üí            </>
   670‚Üí          )}
   671‚Üí        </button>
   672‚Üí      </div>
   673‚Üí    </form>
   674‚Üí  );
   675‚Üí}
