   677‚Üí// ListView Component
   678‚Üífunction ListView({
   679‚Üí  tasks,
   680‚Üí  availableTags,
   681‚Üí  sortBy,
   682‚Üí  onSortChange,
   683‚Üí  onUpdateTask,
   684‚Üí  onDeleteTask,
   685‚Üí}: {
   686‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   687‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   688‚Üí  sortBy: "order" | "title" | "date";
   689‚Üí  onSortChange: (sort: "order" | "title" | "date") => void;
   690‚Üí  onUpdateTask: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   691‚Üí  onDeleteTask: (id: number) => void;
   692‚Üí}) {
   693‚Üí  const [addingTask, setAddingTask] = useState(false);
   694‚Üí
   695‚Üí  const sortedTasks = [...tasks].sort((a, b) => {
   696‚Üí    if (sortBy === "title") return a.title.localeCompare(b.title);
   697‚Üí    if (sortBy === "date") return b.createdAt.getTime() - a.createdAt.getTime();
   698‚Üí    return a.order - b.order;
   699‚Üí  });
   700‚Üí
   701‚Üí  return (
   702‚Üí    <div className="animate-fade-in">
   703‚Üí      {/* Toolbar */}
   704‚Üí      <div className="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-between items-start sm:items-center gap-4 mb-6">
   705‚Üí        <h2 className="text-xl font-bold text-foreground">All Tasks</h2>
   706‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center gap-3">
   707‚Üí          {/* Sort */}
   708‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
   709‚Üí            <span className="text-sm text-foreground/50">Sort:</span>
   710‚Üí            <div className="flex bg-card border border-border rounded-lg overflow-hidden">
   711‚Üí              {[
   712‚Üí                { value: "order" as const, label: "Order" },
   713‚Üí                { value: "title" as const, label: "Title" },
   714‚Üí                { value: "date" as const, label: "Date" },
   715‚Üí              ].map((option, index) => (
   716‚Üí                <button
   717‚Üí                  key={option.value}
   718‚Üí                  onClick={() => onSortChange(option.value)}
   719‚Üí                  className={cn(
   720‚Üí                    "px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium transition-all",
   721‚Üí                    sortBy === option.value ? "bg-accent text-foreground" : "text-foreground/60 hover:text-foreground hover:bg-accent/50",
   722‚Üí                    index > 0 && "border-l border-border"
   723‚Üí                  )}
   724‚Üí                >
   725‚Üí                  {option.label}
   726‚Üí                </button>
   727‚Üí              ))}
   728‚Üí            </div>
   729‚Üí          </div>
   730‚Üí          <button
   731‚Üí            onClick={() => setAddingTask(!addingTask)}
   732‚Üí            className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all flex items-center gap-2"
   733‚Üí          >
   734‚Üí            <PlusIcon className="w-4 h-4" />
   735‚Üí            Add Task
   736‚Üí          </button>
   737‚Üí        </div>
   738‚Üí      </div>
   739‚Üí
   740‚Üí      {/* Inline Add Task Form */}
   741‚Üí      {addingTask && (
   742‚Üí        <div className="mb-6">
   743‚Üí          <InlineTaskFormFull
   744‚Üí            availableTags={availableTags}
   745‚Üí            onSave={(data) => {
   746‚Üí              onUpdateTask(0, { ...data, status: "not_started" });
   747‚Üí              setAddingTask(false);
   748‚Üí            }}
   749‚Üí            onCancel={() => setAddingTask(false)}
   750‚Üí          />
   751‚Üí        </div>
   752‚Üí      )}
   753‚Üí
   754‚Üí      {/* Task List */}
   755‚Üí      <div className="bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium overflow-hidden">
   756‚Üí        {sortedTasks.length === 0 ? (
   757‚Üí          <div className="p-12 text-center">
   758‚Üí            <p className="text-foreground/40">No tasks yet. Create your first task to get started!</p>
   759‚Üí          </div>
   760‚Üí        ) : (
   761‚Üí          <div className="divide-y divide-border">
   762‚Üí            {sortedTasks.map((task) => (
   763‚Üí              <ListViewTaskRow
   764‚Üí                key={task.id}
   765‚Üí                task={task}
   766‚Üí                availableTags={availableTags}
   767‚Üí                onUpdate={onUpdateTask}
   768‚Üí                onDelete={onDeleteTask}
   769‚Üí              />
   770‚Üí            ))}
   771‚Üí          </div>
   772‚Üí        )}
   773‚Üí      </div>
   774‚Üí    </div>
   775‚Üí  );
   776‚Üí}
   777‚Üí

   789‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");

   795‚Üí    e.preventDefault();
   796‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   797‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   798‚Üí    await onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: selectedTags });
   799‚Üí    setTitle("");
   800‚Üí    setDescription("");
   801‚Üí    setTagInput("");
   802‚Üí    setSelectedTags([]);
   803‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(false);
   804‚Üí  };
   805‚Üí
   806‚Üí  const handleAddTag = () => {
   807‚Üí    const trimmed = tagInput.trim().toLowerCase();
   808‚Üí    if (trimmed && !selectedTags.includes(trimmed)) {
   809‚Üí      setSelectedTags([...selectedTags, trimmed]);
   810‚Üí      setTagInput("");
   811‚Üí    }

   813‚Üí
   814‚Üí  const handleRemoveTag = (tagName: string) => {

   823‚Üí  return (

   896‚Üí      <div className="flex gap-3">
   897‚Üí        <button

   901‚Üí        >
   902‚Üí          Cancel
   903‚Üí        </button>
   904‚Üí        <button

   907‚Üí          className="px-4 py-2 bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-all disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed flex items-center gap-2"
   908‚Üí        >
   909‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? (

   914‚Üí          ) : (

   920‚Üí        </button>
   921‚Üí      </div>
   922‚Üí    </form>

   955‚Üí    await onUpdate(task.id, {

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800;900&display=swap');

  background: var(--background);
  font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, "Segoe UI", Roboto, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

/* Custom scrollbar */
::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: var(--background);
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: var(--accent);
  border-radius: 4px;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: var(--accent-hover);
}

/* Smooth transitions */
* {
  transition-property: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke, opacity, box-shadow, transform, filter, backdrop-filter;
  transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  transition-duration: 150ms;
}

/* Focus styles */
*:focus-visible {
  outline: 2px solid #525252;
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

@layer utilities {
  .text-balance {
    text-wrap: balance;
  }

  /* Fade in animation */
  @keyframes fadeIn {
    from {
      opacity: 0;
      transform: translateY(10px);
    }
    to {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: translateY(0);
    }
  }

  .animate-fade-in {
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out;
  }

  /* Shimmer effect for loading */
  @keyframes shimmer {
    0% {
      background-position: -1000px 0;
    }
    100% {
      background-position: 1000px 0;
    }
  }

  .shimmer {
    animation: shimmer 2s infinite;
    background: linear-gradient(
      to right,
      var(--card-bg) 0%,
      var(--accent) 50%,
      var(--card-bg) 100%
    );
    background-size: 1000px 100%;
  }

  /* Pulse glow effect */
  @keyframes pulse-glow {
    0%, 100% {
      box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
    }
    50% {
      box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
    }
  }

  .pulse-glow {
    animation: pulse-glow 2s ease-in-out infinite;
  }

  /* Subtle gradient background */
  .bg-gradient-subtle {
    background: radial-gradient(ellipse at top, #1a1a1a 0%, #0a0a0a 100%);
  }

  /* Enhanced micro-interactions */
  @keyframes shake {
    0%, 100% { transform: translateX(0); }
    10%, 30%, 50%, 70%, 90% { transform: translateX(-2px); }
    20%, 40%, 60%, 80% { transform: translateX(2px); }
  }

  .animate-shake {
    animation: shake 0.4s ease-in-out;
  }

  @keyframes bounce-subtle {
    0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0); }
    50% { transform: translateY(-4px); }
  }

  .animate-bounce-subtle {
    animation: bounce-subtle 0.6s ease-in-out;
  }

  @keyframes pulse-ring {
    0% { transform: scale(0.8); opacity: 0.8; }
    100% { transform: scale(1.3); opacity: 0; }
  }

  .pulse-ring::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    inset: -4px;
    border-radius: inherit;
    border: 2px solid currentColor;
    animation: pulse-ring 1.5s ease-out infinite;
  }

  @keyframes slide-in-right {
    from {
      transform: translateX(20px);
      opacity: 0;
    }
    to {
      transform: translateX(0);
      opacity: 1;
    }
  }

  .animate-slide-in-right {
    animation: slide-in-right 0.3s ease-out;
  }

  /* Ripple effect */
  .ripple {
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .ripple::after {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    background-image: radial-gradient(circle, #fff 10%, transparent 10.01%);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-position: 50%;
    transform: scale(10, 10);
    opacity: 0;
    transition: transform 0.5s, opacity 0.5s;
  }

  .ripple:active::after {
    transform: scale(0, 0);
    opacity: 0.3;
    transition: 0s;
  }

  /* Magnetic button hover effect */
  .magnetic-hover {
    transition: transform 0.2s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94);
  }

  .magnetic-hover:hover {
    transform: scale(1.02);
  }

  /* Stagger animation for list items */
  .stagger-in > * {
    animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease-out backwards;
  }

  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(1) { animation-delay: 0.05s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(2) { animation-delay: 0.1s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(3) { animation-delay: 0.15s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(4) { animation-delay: 0.2s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(5) { animation-delay: 0.25s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(6) { animation-delay: 0.3s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(7) { animation-delay: 0.35s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(8) { animation-delay: 0.4s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(9) { animation-delay: 0.45s; }
  .stagger-in > *:nth-child(10) { animation-delay: 0.5s; }
}

"use client";

import { useState } from "react";
import { signIn } from "next-auth/react";
import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
import Link from "next/link";
import { toast } from "sonner";

export default function SignInPage() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [password, setPassword] = useState("");
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const result = await signIn("credentials", {
        email,
        password,
        redirect: false,
      });

      if (result?.error) {
        toast.error("Invalid email or password");
      } else {
        toast.success("Signed in successfully");
        router.push("/");
        router.refresh();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Something went wrong");
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-background flex items-center justify-center p-4">
      <div className="w-full max-w-md animate-fade-in">
        <div className="bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium p-8 mb-6">
          <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-2 text-foreground">My Tasks</h1>
          <p className="text-lg text-foreground/60 mb-8">Sign in to manage your tasks</p>

          <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="space-y-6">
            <div>
              <label htmlFor="email" className="block text-sm font-medium mb-2 text-foreground">
                Email
              </label>
              <input
                id="email"
                type="email"
                value={email}
                onChange={(e) => setEmail(e.target.value)}
                className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-lg text-foreground focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent transition-all"
                placeholder="you@example.com"
                required
              />
            </div>

            <div>
              <label htmlFor="password" className="block text-sm font-medium mb-2 text-foreground">
                Password
              </label>
              <input
                id="password"
                type="password"
                value={password}
                onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)}
                className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-lg text-foreground focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent transition-all"
                placeholder="‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢"
                required
                minLength={6}
              />
            </div>

            <button
              type="submit"
              disabled={isLoading}
              className="w-full bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white font-bold text-lg py-3 rounded-lg disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all hover:shadow-glow hover:-translate-y-0.5 active:translate-y-0"
            >
              {isLoading ? "Signing in..." : "Sign In"}
            </button>
          </form>
        </div>

        <div className="text-center">
          <p className="text-foreground/60">
            Don&apos;t have an account?{" "}
            <Link
              href="/auth/signup"
              className="font-medium text-foreground hover:text-accent-hover underline underline-offset-4 transition-colors"
            >
              Sign up
            </Link>
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

"use client";

import { useState } from "react";
import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
import Link from "next/link";
import { toast } from "sonner";

export default function SignUpPage() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [password, setPassword] = useState("");
  const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState("");
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();

    if (password !== confirmPassword) {
      toast.error("Passwords do not match");
      return;
    }

    if (password.length < 6) {
      toast.error("Password must be at least 6 characters");
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const response = await fetch("/api/auth/signup", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ email, password }),
      });

      const data = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        toast.error(data.error || "Something went wrong");
        return;
      }

      toast.success("Account created! Please sign in");
      router.push("/auth/signin");
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Something went wrong");
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-background flex items-center justify-center p-4">
      <div className="w-full max-w-md animate-fade-in">
        <div className="bg-card border border-border rounded-2xl shadow-medium p-8 mb-6">
          <h1 className="text-4xl font-bold mb-2 text-foreground">My Tasks</h1>
          <p className="text-lg text-foreground/60 mb-8">Create a new account</p>

          <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="space-y-6">
            <div>
              <label htmlFor="email" className="block text-sm font-medium mb-2 text-foreground">
                Email
              </label>
              <input
                id="email"
                type="email"
                value={email}
                onChange={(e) => setEmail(e.target.value)}
                className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-lg text-foreground focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent transition-all"
                placeholder="you@example.com"
                required
              />
            </div>

            <div>
              <label htmlFor="password" className="block text-sm font-medium mb-2 text-foreground">
                Password
              </label>
              <input
                id="password"
                type="password"
                value={password}
                onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)}
                className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-lg text-foreground focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent transition-all"
                placeholder="‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢"
                required
                minLength={6}
              />
            </div>

            <div>
              <label htmlFor="confirmPassword" className="block text-sm font-medium mb-2 text-foreground">
                Confirm Password
              </label>
              <input
                id="confirmPassword"
                type="password"
                value={confirmPassword}
                onChange={(e) => setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)}
                className="w-full px-4 py-3 bg-background border border-border rounded-lg text-lg text-foreground focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent transition-all"
                placeholder="‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢"
                required
                minLength={6}
              />
            </div>

            <button
              type="submit"
              disabled={isLoading}
              className="w-full bg-accent hover:bg-accent-hover text-white font-bold text-lg py-3 rounded-lg disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-all hover:shadow-glow hover:-translate-y-0.5 active:translate-y-0"
            >
              {isLoading ? "Creating account..." : "Sign Up"}
            </button>
          </form>
        </div>

        <div className="text-center">
          <p className="text-foreground/60">
            Already have an account?{" "}
            <Link
              href="/auth/signin"
              className="font-medium text-foreground hover:text-accent-hover underline underline-offset-4 transition-colors"
            >
              Sign in
            </Link>
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

## Summary of Changes

### 1. Theme Overhaul - Shades of Grey/Black
- Updated `app/globals.css` with new CSS custom properties:
  - `--background: #0a0a0a` (near black)
  - `--foreground: #ededed` (light grey for text)
  - `--card-bg: #141414` (dark grey cards)
  - `--border-color: #262626` (medium grey borders)
  - `--accent: #404040` (grey accent color)
- Updated `tailwind.config.ts` to use CSS variables

### 2. Better Fonts
- Added **Inter font** from Google Fonts via `@import` at the top of globals.css
- Configured font weights: 400, 500, 600, 700, 800, 900
- Applied as primary font family with fallbacks

### 3. Inline Task Creation
- Removed modal-based task creation
- Added `InlineTaskForm` component for board columns
- Added `InlineTaskFormFull` component for list view
- Click "Add task" button creates an inline form within the column

### 4. Gorgeous Micro-interactions
- Hover effects: scale transforms, shadow glow, translate Y
- Smooth transitions with cubic-bezier easing
- Button press animations (`active:scale-95`, `active:translate-y-0`)
- Rotating plus icon on hover (`hover:rotate-90`)
- Tag hover scale effects
- Form input focus ring animations
- Search input expands on focus (`focus:w-56`)
- Ripple effect class for buttons
- Stagger animations for lists

### 5. Updated Auth Pages
- Updated sign-in and signup pages with new grey/black theme
- Added fade-in animations
- Consistent styling with main app

const { chromium } = require('./node_modules/playwright');

(async () => {
  const browser = await chromium.launch();
  const page = await browser.newPage();
  
  // Check font loading on signin page
  await page.goto('http://localhost:3000/auth/signin');
  
  const fontInfo = await page.evaluate(() => {
    // Check if Inter font is loaded
    const fonts = Array.from(document.fonts);
    const interFont = fonts.find(f => f.family.includes('Inter'));
    
    // Get body styles
    const bodyStyle = window.getComputedStyle(document.body);
    
    // Check headings
    const h1 = document.querySelector('h1');
    const h1Style = h1 ? window.getComputedStyle(h1) : null;
    
    // Check labels
    const labels = document.querySelectorAll('label');
    const labelStyle = labels.length > 0 ? window.getComputedStyle(labels[0]) : null;
    
    return {
      fontsLoaded: fonts.map(f => ({ family: f.family, loaded: f.status === 'loaded' })),
      interFontLoaded: interFont ? interFont.status === 'loaded' : false,
      bodyColor: bodyStyle.color,
      bodyBg: bodyStyle.backgroundColor,
      bodyFontFamily: bodyStyle.fontFamily,
      h1Color: h1Style ? h1Style.color : null,
      h1FontFamily: h1Style ? h1Style.fontFamily : null,
      labelColor: labelStyle ? labelStyle.color : null,
      contrastRatio: h1Style ? {
        h1: getContrastRatio(h1Style.color, bodyStyle.backgroundColor)
      } : null
    };
    
    function getContrastRatio(fg, bg) {
      // Simple check - just return the colors
      return { fg, bg };
    }
  });
  
  console.log('Font verification:', JSON.stringify(fontInfo, null, 2));
  
  await browser.close();
})();
EOF

const { chromium } = require('./node_modules/playwright');

(async () => {
  const browser = await chromium.launch();
  const page = await browser.newPage();
  
  console.log('Loading sign in page...');
  await page.goto('http://localhost:3000/auth/signin', { waitUntil: 'networkidle' });
  
  // Wait for fonts to load
  await page.waitForTimeout(2000);
  
  // Take screenshot
  await page.screenshot({ path: 'final-signin.png', fullPage: false });
  console.log('Screenshot saved to final-signin.png');
  
  // Get detailed computed styles
  const details = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const getEl = (sel) => document.querySelector(sel);
    
    const h1 = getEl('h1');
    const p = getEl('p');
    const label = getEl('label');
    const input = getEl('input[type="email"]');
    const body = document.body;
    
    const computed = (el) => {
      if (!el) return null;
      const s = window.getComputedStyle(el);
      return {
        display: s.display,
        color: s.color,
        backgroundColor: s.backgroundColor,
        fontFamily: s.fontFamily,
        fontSize: s.fontSize,
        fontWeight: s.fontWeight,
        opacity: s.opacity,
        visibility: s.visibility
      };
    };
    
    // Check if elements are actually visible
    const isVisible = (el) => {
      if (!el) return false;
      const rect = el.getBoundingClientRect();
      return rect.width > 0 && rect.height > 0;
    };
    
    return {
      h1: { ...computed(h1), visible: isVisible(h1), text: h1?.textContent },
      p: { ...computed(p), visible: isVisible(p), text: p?.textContent },
      label: { ...computed(label), visible: isVisible(label), text: label?.textContent },
      input: { ...computed(input), visible: isVisible(input), placeholder: input?.placeholder },
      body: { ...computed(body), text: body?.textContent?.substring(0, 100) },
      cssVars: {
        foreground: getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--foreground'),
        background: getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--background'),
        cardBg: getComputedStyle(document.documentElement).getPropertyValue('--card-bg')
      }
    };
  });
  
  console.log('=== DETAILED FONT VISIBILITY CHECK ===');
  console.log(JSON.stringify(details, null, 2));
  
  await browser.close();
})();
EOF

const { chromium } = require('./node_modules/playwright');

(async () => {
  const browser = await chromium.launch();
  const page = await browser.newPage();
  
  // Sign in
  console.log('Signing in...');
  await page.goto('http://localhost:3000/auth/signin');
  await page.fill('input[type="email"]', 'testuser2@example.com');
  await page.fill('input[type="password"]', 'password123');
  await page.click('button[type="submit"]');
  await page.waitForTimeout(3000);
  
  console.log('Current URL:', page.url());
  
  // Screenshot before clicking Add task
  await page.screenshot({ path: 'check-board.png' });
  console.log('Board screenshot saved');
  
  // Find and click Add task button
  const boardInfo = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const addButtons = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button'))
      .filter(b => b.textContent && b.textContent.includes('Add task'));
    
    return {
      addTaskButtonsCount: addButtons.length,
      buttonTexts: addButtons.map(b => b.textContent.trim())
    };
  });
  
  console.log('Board info:', JSON.stringify(boardInfo, null, 2));
  
  // Click the first Add task button
  await page.evaluate(() => {
    const addButtons = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button'))
      .filter(b => b.textContent && b.textContent.includes('Add task'));
    if (addButtons.length > 0) {
      addButtons[0].click();
    }
  });
  
  await page.waitForTimeout(1000);
  
  // Check for inline form
  const inlineInfo = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const titleInput = document.querySelector('input[placeholder*="Task title"]');
    const descArea = document.querySelector('textarea');
    const addTagBtn = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('button')).find(b => b.textContent === 'Add');
    
    return {
      inlineFormVisible: !!titleInput,
      titleInputPlaceholder: titleInput?.placeholder,
      descPlaceholder: descArea?.placeholder,
      hasAddButton: !!addTagBtn
    };
  });
  
  console.log('Inline form info:', JSON.stringify(inlineInfo, null, 2));
  
  // Screenshot after clicking Add task
  await page.screenshot({ path: 'check-inline.png' });
  console.log('Inline form screenshot saved');
  
  await browser.close();
})();

import { useState } from "react";
import { signIn } from "next-auth/react";
import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
import Link from "next/link";
import { toast } from "sonner";

export default function SignInPage() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [password, setPassword] = useState("");
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const result = await signIn("credentials", {
        email,
        password,
        redirect: false,
      });

      if (result?.error) {
        toast.error("Invalid email or password");
      } else {
        toast.success("Signed in successfully");
        router.push("/");
        router.refresh();
      }
    } catch (error) {
      toast.error("Something went wrong");
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  };

    <div style={{ minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#000000', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', padding: '16px' }}>

          <h1 style={{ fontSize: '36px', fontWeight: 700, color: '#ffffff', marginBottom: '8px', fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif' }}>
            My Tasks
          </h1>
          <p style={{ fontSize: '18px', color: '#a3a3a3', marginBottom: '32px', fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif' }}>
            Sign in to manage your tasks
          </p>

          <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '24px' }}>
            <div>
              <label htmlFor="email" style={{ display: 'block', fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: 500, marginBottom: '8px', color: '#e5e5e5', fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif' }}>
                Email
              </label>
              <input
                id="email"
                type="email"
                value={email}
                onChange={(e) => setEmail(e.target.value)}
                style={{
                  width: '100%',
                  padding: '12px 16px',
                  backgroundColor: '#000000',
                  border: '1px solid #262626',
                  borderRadius: '8px',
                  fontSize: '18px',
                  color: '#e5e5e5',
                  fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif',
                  outline: 'none',
                  transition: 'all 0.2s'
                }}
                placeholder="you@example.com"
                required
                onFocus={(e) => e.target.style.borderColor = '#404040'}
                onBlur={(e) => e.target.style.borderColor = '#262626'}
              />
            </div>

            <div>
              <label htmlFor="password" style={{ display: 'block', fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: 500, marginBottom: '8px', color: '#e5e5e5', fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif' }}>
                Password
              </label>
              <input
                id="password"
                type="password"
                value={password}
                onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)}
                style={{
                  width: '100%',
                  padding: '12px 16px',
                  backgroundColor: '#000000',
                  border: '1px solid #262626',
                  borderRadius: '8px',
                  fontSize: '18px',
                  color: '#e5e5e5',
                  fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif',
                  outline: 'none',
                  transition: 'all 0.2s'
                }}
                placeholder="‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢‚Ä¢"
                required
                minLength={6}
                onFocus={(e) => e.target.style.borderColor = '#404040'}
                onBlur={(e) => e.target.style.borderColor = '#262626'}
              />
            </div>

            <button
              type="submit"
              disabled={isLoading}
              style={{
                width: '100%',
                backgroundColor: '#404040',
                color: '#ffffff',
                fontWeight: 700,
                fontSize: '18px',
                padding: '12px',
                borderRadius: '8px',
                border: 'none',
                cursor: isLoading ? 'not-allowed' : 'pointer',
                opacity: isLoading ? 0.5 : 1,
                transition: 'all 0.2s',
                fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif',
                transform: 'translateY(0)'
              }}
              onMouseEnter={(e) => {
                if (!isLoading) {
                  e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = '#525252';
                  e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(-2px)';
                  e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = '0 4px 12px rgba(255,255,255,0.1)';
                }
              }}
              onMouseLeave={(e) => {
                e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = '#404040';
                e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                e.currentTarget.style.boxShadow = 'none';
              }}
              onMouseDown={(e) => {
                e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';

            >
              Sign up

          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

import { useEffect, useState, useCallback } from "react";
import {

  useSensors,
  closestCorners,
  useDroppable,
} from "@dnd-kit/core";
import { arrayMove, SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import TaskCard from "./TaskCard";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { fetchWithRetry } from "@/lib/utils";
import { signOut } from "next-auth/react";
import { toast } from "sonner";
import {
  Squares2X2Icon,
  ListBulletIcon,
  MagnifyingGlassIcon,
  ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon,
  PlusIcon,
} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

const STATUSES: { value: TaskStatus; label: string }[] = [
  { value: "not_started", label: "To Do" },
  { value: "in_progress", label: "In Progress" },
  { value: "complete", label: "Done" },
];

const TAG_COLORS = [
  "#6366f1", "#8b5cf6", "#ec4899", "#f43f5e", "#f97316", "#eab308", "#22c55e", "#14b8a6",
];

// Inline styles object

  },

  },

  },

  taskCount: { fontSize: '12px', padding: '4px 8px', backgroundColor: '#404040', borderRadius: '12px', color: '#e5e5e5' },

  addTaskButton: {
    width: '100%',
    padding: '12px',
    border: '1px dashed #262626',

    backgroundColor: 'transparent',

  },

  inlineForm: {
    padding: '12px',

    width: '100%',

    color: '#e5e5e5',

    resize: 'vertical' as const,
    minHeight: '60px',
    fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif'
  },
  formActions: { display: 'flex', gap: '8px' },
  primaryButton: {
    flex: 1,
    padding: '8px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#404040',
    color: '#ffffff',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    fontWeight: 500,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    transition: 'all 0.2s'
  },
  primaryButtonHover: { backgroundColor: '#525252' },
  secondaryButton: {
    padding: '8px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#0a0a0a',
    color: '#e5e5e5',
    border: '1px solid #262626',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    transition: 'all 0.2s'
  },
  loading: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: '#000000' },
  spinner: { width: '40px', height: '40px', border: '2px solid #404040', borderTopColor: 'transparent', borderRadius: '50%', animation: 'spin 1s linear infinite' }
};

export default function Board() {
  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([]);
  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>>([]);
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("");
  const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [addingToColumn, setAddingToColumn] = useState<TaskStatus | null>(null);
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);

  const sensors = useSensors(
    useSensor(PointerSensor, { activationConstraint: { distance: 8 } })
  );

  const fetchTasks = useCallback(async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks");
      if (response.ok) setTasks(await response.json());
    } catch {
      toast.error("Failed to load tasks");
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  }, []);

  const fetchTags = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tags");
      if (response.ok) setTags(await response.json());
    } catch {}
  };

  useEffect(() => { fetchTasks(); fetchTags(); }, [fetchTasks]);

  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(t =>
    t.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
    (t.description && t.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()))
  );

  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {
    not_started: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "not_started"),
    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "in_progress"),
    complete: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "complete"),
  };

  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => setActiveId(parseInt(event.active.id as string));
  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
    setActiveId(null);
    const { active, over } = event;
    if (!over) return;

    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
    const activeTask = tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId);
    if (!activeTask) return;

    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;
    const newStatus = overStatus || activeTask.status;

    const updatedTasks = tasks.map(t => t.id === activeId ? { ...t, status: newStatus } : t);
    setTasks(updatedTasks);

    try {
      await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${activeId}`, {
        method: "PATCH",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...activeTask, status: newStatus, title: activeTask.title, description: activeTask.description || "", tags: activeTask.tags.map(t => t.name) }),
      });
    } catch {
      toast.error("Failed to move task");
      fetchTasks();
    }
  };

  const handleCreateTask = async (status: TaskStatus, data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...data, status }),
      });
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create");
      const newTask = await response.json();
      setTasks(prev => [...prev, newTask]);
      toast.success("Task created");
      setAddingToColumn(null);
    } catch {
      toast.error("Failed to create task");
    }
  };

  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId) : null;

  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      <div style={styles.loading}>
        <div style={styles.spinner} />
        <p style={{ color: '#e5e5e5', marginLeft: '16px' }}>Loading...</p>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div style={styles.page}>
      <header style={styles.header}>
        <div style={styles.headerContent}>
          <h1 style={styles.title}>My Tasks</h1>
          <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '12px', alignItems: 'center' }}>
            <div style={styles.searchBox}>
              <MagnifyingGlassIcon style={styles.searchIcon} />
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search..."
                value={searchQuery}
                onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                style={styles.searchInput}
              />
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
              style={styles.button}
              onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.buttonHover)}
              onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#0a0a0a', transform: 'translateY(0)' })}
            >
              <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
              Sign Out
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </header>

      <main style={styles.main}>
        <DndContext sensors={sensors} collisionDetection={closestCorners} onDragStart={handleDragStart} onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}>
          <div style={styles.boardGrid}>
            {STATUSES.map((status) => (
              <Column
                key={status.value}
                status={status.value}
                label={status.label}
                tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
                availableTags={tags}
                isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
                onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
                onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
                onCreateTask={(data) => handleCreateTask(status.value, data)}
              />
            ))}
          </div>

          <DragOverlay>
            {activeTask && (
              <div style={{ opacity: 0.8, transform: 'rotate(2deg)', width: '288px' }}>
                <TaskCard task={activeTask} availableTags={tags} onUpdate={() => {}} onDelete={() => {}} />
              </div>
            )}
          </DragOverlay>
        </DndContext>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}

// Column Component with Inline Task Creation
function Column({
  status,
  label,
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  isAdding,
  onAddStart,
  onAddCancel,
  onCreateTask,
}: {
  status: TaskStatus;
  label: string;
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  isAdding: boolean;
  onAddStart: () => void;
  onAddCancel: () => void;
  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
}) {
  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({ id: status, data: { status } });
  const taskIds = tasks.map(t => t.id.toString());

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={styles.column}>
      <div style={styles.columnHeader}>
        <span style={styles.columnTitle}>{label}</span>
        <span style={styles.taskCount}>{tasks.length}</span>
      </div>

      <div style={styles.columnContent}>
        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
          {tasks.map(task => (
            <SortableTaskCard
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              availableTags={availableTags}
              onUpdate={async (id, data) => {
                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
                  method: "PATCH",
                  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
                  body: JSON.stringify(data),
                });
              }}
              onDelete={async (id) => {
                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" });
                window.location.reload();
              }}
            />
          ))}
        </SortableContext>

        {isAdding ? (
          <InlineTaskForm availableTags={availableTags} onSave={onCreateTask} onCancel={onAddCancel} />
        ) : (
          <button
            onClick={onAddStart}
            style={styles.addTaskButton}
            onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.addTaskButtonHover)}
            onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#262626', color: '#737373', backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
          >
            <PlusIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
            Add task
          </button>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Inline Task Form Component
function InlineTaskForm({
  availableTags,
  onSave,
  onCancel,
}: {
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
}) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();
    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: [] });
  };

  return (
    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={styles.inlineForm}>
      <input
        type="text"
        value={title}
        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Task title..."
        style={styles.input}
        autoFocus
      />
      <textarea
        value={description}
        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Description (optional)..."
        style={styles.textarea}
        rows={2}
      />
      <div style={styles.formActions}>
        <button type="button" onClick={onCancel} style={styles.secondaryButton}>Cancel</button>
        <button
          type="submit"
          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
          style={{ ...styles.primaryButton, opacity: !title.trim() || isSubmitting ? 0.5 : 1 }}
          onMouseEnter={(e) => !isSubmitting && title.trim() && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.primaryButtonHover)}
          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.primaryButton)}
        >
          {isSubmitting ? "Adding..." : "Add"}
        </button>
      </div>
    </form>
  );
}

// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
function SortableTaskCard({
  task,
  availableTags,
  onUpdate,
  onDelete,
}: {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({ id: task.id.toString(), data: { status: task.status } });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
      <TaskCard task={task} availableTags={availableTags} onUpdate={onUpdate} onDelete={onDelete} dragAttributes={attributes} dragListeners={listeners} />
    </div>
  );
}

   213‚Üí

   215‚Üí    t.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||

   217‚Üí  );
   218‚Üí
   219‚Üí  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {

   221‚Üí    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "in_progress"),
   222‚Üí    complete: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "complete"),
   223‚Üí  };
   224‚Üí
   225‚Üí  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => setActiveId(parseInt(event.active.id as string));

   234‚Üí

   236‚Üí    const newStatus = overStatus || activeTask.status;
   237‚Üí
   238‚Üí    const updatedTasks = tasks.map(t => t.id === activeId ? { ...t, status: newStatus } : t);
   239‚Üí    setTasks(updatedTasks);

   246‚Üí      });

   260‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create");

   267‚Üí    }
   268‚Üí  };
   269‚Üí
   270‚Üí  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId) : null;
   271‚Üí
   272‚Üí  if (isLoading) {

   279‚Üí  }
   280‚Üí
   281‚Üí  return (
   282‚Üí    <div style={styles.page}>
   283‚Üí      <header style={styles.header}>

   286‚Üí          <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '12px', alignItems: 'center' }}>

   297‚Üí            <button

   301‚Üí              onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#0a0a0a', transform: 'translateY(0)' })}

   304‚Üí              Sign Out

   309‚Üí
   310‚Üí      <main style={styles.main}>

   332‚Üí              </div>

   334‚Üí          </DragOverlay>

   341‚Üí// Column Component with Inline Task Creation
   342‚Üífunction Column({
   343‚Üí  status,
   344‚Üí  label,
   345‚Üí  tasks,
   346‚Üí  availableTags,
   347‚Üí  isAdding,
   348‚Üí  onAddStart,
   349‚Üí  onAddCancel,
   350‚Üí  onCreateTask,
   351‚Üí}: {
   352‚Üí  status: TaskStatus;
   353‚Üí  label: string;
   354‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   355‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   356‚Üí  isAdding: boolean;
   357‚Üí  onAddStart: () => void;
   358‚Üí  onAddCancel: () => void;
   359‚Üí  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   360‚Üí}) {
   361‚Üí  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({ id: status, data: { status } });
   362‚Üí  const taskIds = tasks.map(t => t.id.toString());
   363‚Üí
   364‚Üí  return (
   365‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={styles.column}>
   366‚Üí      <div style={styles.columnHeader}>
   367‚Üí        <span style={styles.columnTitle}>{label}</span>
   368‚Üí        <span style={styles.taskCount}>{tasks.length}</span>
   369‚Üí      </div>
   370‚Üí
   371‚Üí      <div style={styles.columnContent}>
   372‚Üí        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
   373‚Üí          {tasks.map(task => (
   374‚Üí            <SortableTaskCard
   375‚Üí              key={task.id}
   376‚Üí              task={task}
   377‚Üí              availableTags={availableTags}
   378‚Üí              onUpdate={async (id, data) => {
   379‚Üí                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   380‚Üí                  method: "PATCH",
   381‚Üí                  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   382‚Üí                  body: JSON.stringify(data),
   383‚Üí                });
   384‚Üí              }}
   385‚Üí              onDelete={async (id) => {
   386‚Üí                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" });
   387‚Üí                window.location.reload();
   388‚Üí              }}
   389‚Üí            />
   390‚Üí          ))}
   391‚Üí        </SortableContext>
   392‚Üí
   393‚Üí        {isAdding ? (
   394‚Üí          <InlineTaskForm availableTags={availableTags} onSave={onCreateTask} onCancel={onAddCancel} />
   395‚Üí        ) : (
   396‚Üí          <button
   397‚Üí            onClick={onAddStart}
   398‚Üí            style={styles.addTaskButton}
   399‚Üí            onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.addTaskButtonHover)}
   400‚Üí            onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#262626', color: '#737373', backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
   401‚Üí          >
   402‚Üí            <PlusIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
   403‚Üí            Add task
   404‚Üí          </button>
   405‚Üí        )}
   406‚Üí      </div>
   407‚Üí    </div>
   408‚Üí  );
   409‚Üí}
   410‚Üí
   411‚Üí// Inline Task Form Component
   412‚Üífunction InlineTaskForm({
   413‚Üí  availableTags,
   414‚Üí  onSave,
   415‚Üí  onCancel,
   416‚Üí}: {
   417‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   418‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   419‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   420‚Üí}) {
   421‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   422‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   423‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   424‚Üí
   425‚Üí  const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => {
   426‚Üí    e.preventDefault();
   427‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   428‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   429‚Üí    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: [] });
   430‚Üí  };
   431‚Üí
   432‚Üí  return (
   433‚Üí    <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={styles.inlineForm}>
   434‚Üí      <input
   435‚Üí        type="text"
   436‚Üí        value={title}
   437‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   438‚Üí        placeholder="Task title..."
   439‚Üí        style={styles.input}
   440‚Üí        autoFocus
   441‚Üí      />
   442‚Üí      <textarea
   443‚Üí        value={description}
   444‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   445‚Üí        placeholder="Description (optional)..."
   446‚Üí        style={styles.textarea}
   447‚Üí        rows={2}
   448‚Üí      />
   449‚Üí      <div style={styles.formActions}>
   450‚Üí        <button type="button" onClick={onCancel} style={styles.secondaryButton}>Cancel</button>
   451‚Üí        <button
   452‚Üí          type="submit"
   453‚Üí          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
   454‚Üí          style={{ ...styles.primaryButton, opacity: !title.trim() || isSubmitting ? 0.5 : 1 }}
   455‚Üí          onMouseEnter={(e) => !isSubmitting && title.trim() && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.primaryButtonHover)}
   456‚Üí          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.primaryButton)}
   457‚Üí        >
   458‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? "Adding..." : "Add"}
   459‚Üí        </button>
   460‚Üí      </div>
   461‚Üí    </form>
   462‚Üí  );
   463‚Üí}
   464‚Üí
   465‚Üí// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
   466‚Üífunction SortableTaskCard({
   467‚Üí  task,
   468‚Üí  availableTags,
   469‚Üí  onUpdate,

   471‚Üí}: {

   474‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   475‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   476‚Üí}) {
   477‚Üí  const {

   479‚Üí    listeners,
   480‚Üí    setNodeRef,
   481‚Üí    transform,

   483‚Üí    isDragging,

   486‚Üí  const style = {

   491‚Üí
   492‚Üí  return (
   493‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
   494‚Üí      <TaskCard task={task} availableTags={availableTags} onUpdate={onUpdate} onDelete={onDelete} dragAttributes={attributes} dragListeners={listeners} />
   495‚Üí    </div>
   496‚Üí  );

    borderRadius: '12px',
    padding: '16px',
    cursor: 'move',
    transition: 'all 0.2s',
    fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif'
  },
  cardHover: { boxShadow: '0 0 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.08)', transform: 'translateY(-4px)' },
  title: { fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: 600, color: '#ffffff', marginBottom: '8px' },
  description: { fontSize: '14px', color: '#a3a3a3', marginBottom: '12px', lineHeight: '1.5' },
  tag: {
    display: 'inline-block',
    padding: '2px 8px',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    fontSize: '12px',
    color: '#ffffff',
    marginRight: '6px',
    marginBottom: '4px'
  },
  editForm: {
    backgroundColor: '#0a0a0a',
    border: '1px solid #404040',
    borderRadius: '12px',
    padding: '16px'
  },
  input: {
    width: '100%',
    padding: '8px 12px',
    backgroundColor: '#000000',
    border: '1px solid #262626',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    color: '#e5e5e5',
    outline: 'none',
    marginBottom: '8px',
    fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif'
  },
  textarea: {
    width: '100%',
    padding: '8px 12px',
    backgroundColor: '#000000',
    border: '1px solid #262626',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    color: '#e5e5e5',
    outline: 'none',
    resize: 'vertical' as const,
    minHeight: '80px',
    marginBottom: '12px',
    fontFamily: 'Geist, -apple-system, sans-serif'
  },
  statusButton: {
    padding: '6px 12px',
    borderRadius: '6px',
    fontSize: '12px',
    fontWeight: 500,
    border: '1px solid #262626',
    backgroundColor: '#000000',
    color: '#e5e5e5',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    transition: 'all 0.2s',
    marginRight: '6px'
  },
  statusButtonActive: { backgroundColor: '#404040', color: '#ffffff' },
  buttonGroup: { display: 'flex', gap: '8px', marginTop: '12px' },
  primaryButton: {
    flex: 1,
    padding: '8px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#404040',
    color: '#ffffff',
    border: 'none',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    fontWeight: 500,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    gap: '6px'
  },
  secondaryButton: {
    padding: '8px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#000000',
    color: '#e5e5e5',
    border: '1px solid #262626',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    cursor: 'pointer'
  },
  dangerButton: {
    padding: '8px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#000000',
    color: '#ef4444',
    border: '1px solid #262626',
    borderRadius: '8px',
    fontSize: '14px',
    cursor: 'pointer'
  }
};

export default function TaskCard({ task, availableTags, onUpdate, onDelete, dragAttributes, dragListeners }: TaskCardProps) {
  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);

  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({
    id: task.id.toString(),
    data: { status: task.status },
    disabled: isEditing,
  });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  const handleSave = async () => {
    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
      setTitleError("Title is required");
      return;
    }
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    setTitleError("");
    await onUpdate(task.id, {
      title: editTitle.trim(),
      description: editDescription.trim(),
      status: editStatus,
      tags: [],
    });
    setIsEditing(false);
    setIsSubmitting(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    setEditTitle(task.title);
    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
    setEditStatus(task.status);
    setTitleError("");
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const confirmDelete = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
    setIsEditing(false);
    onDelete(task.id);
  };

  if (isEditing) {
    return (
      <div ref={setNodeRef} style={{ ...style, ...styles.editForm }}>
        {showDeleteConfirm ? (
          <div style={{ textAlign: 'center', padding: '20px 0' }}>
            <p style={{ color: '#e5e5e5', marginBottom: '16px' }}>Delete this task?</p>
            <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '12px', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
              <button onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(false)} style={styles.secondaryButton}>Cancel</button>
              <button onClick={confirmDelete} style={{ ...styles.dangerButton, backgroundColor: '#7f1d1d', color: '#ffffff' }}>Delete</button>
            </div>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <>
            <input
              type="text"
              value={editTitle}
              onChange={(e) => { setEditTitle(e.target.value); setTitleError(""); }}
              style={{ ...styles.input, borderColor: titleError ? '#ef4444' : '#262626' }}
              placeholder="Task title..."
              autoFocus
            />
            {titleError && <p style={{ color: '#ef4444', fontSize: '12px', marginTop: '-4px', marginBottom: '8px' }}>{titleError}</p>}

            <textarea
              value={editDescription}
              onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
              style={styles.textarea}
              placeholder="Add description..."
              rows={3}
            />

            <div style={{ marginBottom: '12px' }}>
              {STATUSES.map((s) => (
                <button
                  key={s.value}
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => setEditStatus(s.value)}
                  style={{
                    ...styles.statusButton,
                    ...(editStatus === s.value ? styles.statusButtonActive : {})
                  }}
                >
                  {s.label}
                </button>
              ))}
            </div>

            <div style={styles.buttonGroup}>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(true)}
                style={styles.dangerButton}
              >
                Delete
              </button>
              <div style={{ flex: 1 }} />
              <button type="button" onClick={handleCancel} style={styles.secondaryButton}>Cancel</button>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleSave}
                disabled={!editTitle.trim() || isSubmitting}
                style={{ ...styles.primaryButton, opacity: !editTitle.trim() || isSubmitting ? 0.5 : 1 }}
              >
                <CheckIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
                Save
              </button>
            </div>
          </>
        )}
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div
      ref={setNodeRef}
      style={{ ...style, ...styles.card }}
      {...(dragAttributes || {})}
      {...(dragListeners || {})}
      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
      onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.cardHover)}
      onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { boxShadow: 'none', transform: 'translateY(0)' })}
    >
      <h3 style={styles.title}>{task.title}</h3>
      {task.description && <p style={styles.description}>{task.description}</p>}

      {task.tags.length > 0 && (
        <div>
          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
            <span key={tag.id} style={{ ...styles.tag, backgroundColor: tag.color }}>
              {tag.name}
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

"use client";

import { useState } from "react";
import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
import Link from "next/link";
import { toast } from "sonner";

export default function SignUpPage() {
  const router = useRouter();
  const [email, setEmail] = useState("");
  const [password, setPassword] = useState("");
  const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState("");
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false);

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();

    if (password !== confirmPassword) {
      toast.error("Passwords do not match");
      return;
    }

    if (password.length < 6) {
      toast.error("Password must be at least 6 characters");
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const response = await fetch("/api/auth/signup", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ email, password }),
      });

      const data = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        toast.error(data.error || "Something went wrong");
        return;
      }

      toast.success("Account created! Please sign in");
      router.push("/auth/signin");

    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);

    // Check body styles
    const body = document.body;
    const bodyStyle = window.getComputedStyle(body);
    
    return {
      bodyVisible: bodyStyle.display !== 'none',
      bodyColor: bodyStyle.color,
      bodyBg: bodyStyle.backgroundColor,
      bodyOpacity: bodyStyle.opacity,
      visibleTextCount: visibleText.length,
      sampleText: visibleText.slice(0, 10)
    };
  });
  
  console.log('VISIBILITY CHECK:', JSON.stringify(visibilityCheck, null, 2));
  
  // Screenshot for visual verification
  await page.screenshot({ path: 'diagnose-screenshot.png' });
  console.log('Screenshot saved: diagnose-screenshot.png');
  
  // Check computed styles of key elements
  const computedStyles = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const h1 = document.querySelector('h1');
    const input = document.querySelector('input[type="email"]');
    const button = document.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
    
    return {
      h1: h1 ? {
        display: window.getComputedStyle(h1).display,
        color: window.getComputedStyle(h1).color,
        backgroundColor: window.getComputedStyle(h1).backgroundColor,
        fontSize: window.getComputedStyle(h1).fontSize,
        opacity: window.getComputedStyle(h1).opacity,
        text: h1.textContent
      } : null,
      input: input ? {
        display: window.getComputedStyle(input).display,
        color: window.getComputedStyle(input).color,
        backgroundColor: window.getComputedStyle(input).backgroundColor
      } : null,
      button: button ? {
        display: window.getComputedStyle(button).display,
        color: window.getComputedStyle(button).color
      } : null
    };
  });
  
  console.log('COMPUTED STYLES:', JSON.stringify(computedStyles, null, 2));
  
  await browser.close();
})();

/* Import fonts FIRST - must be at the very top */
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700;800;900&display=swap');

@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

/* Force styles - no CSS variables dependency for critical visibility */
@layer base {
  * {
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  html {
    font-family: 'Inter', system-ui, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
  }

  body {
    background-color: #000000 !important;
    color: #e5e5e5 !important;
    font-family: 'Inter', system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif !important;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  }

  /* Force all text elements to be visible */
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
    color: #ffffff !important;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  p, span, div, label, button, a, input, textarea {
    color: #e5e5e5 !important;
  }

  /* Force input visibility */
  input, textarea {
    background-color: #000000 !important;
    color: #e5e5e5 !important;
    border: 1px solid #404040 !important;
  }

  input::placeholder, textarea::placeholder {
    color: #737373 !important;
  }

  /* Button styles */
  button {
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.2s ease;
  }

  button:disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;

}
