"use client";

import { useEffect, useState, useCallback, useRef } from "react";
import {
  DndContext,
  DragEndEvent,
  DragOverlay,
  DragStartEvent,
  PointerSensor,
  useSensor,
  useSensors,
  closestCorners,
  useDroppable,
} from "@dnd-kit/core";
import { arrayMove, SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import TaskCard from "./TaskCard";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { fetchWithRetry } from "@/lib/utils";
import { signOut } from "next-auth/react";
import { toast } from "sonner";
import {
  MagnifyingGlassIcon,
  ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon,
} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

const STATUSES: { value: TaskStatus; label: string }[] = [
  { value: "not_started", label: "[TODO]" },
  { value: "in_progress", label: "[DOING]" },
  { value: "complete", label: "[DONE]" },
];

// Brutalist colors
const WARM_WHITE = "#F5F1E8";
const CREAM = "#EDE8DD";
const DARK_GREY = "#1a1a1a";
const MID_GREY = "#4a4a4a";
const LIGHT_GREY = "#888888";
const BORDER_COLOR = "#1a1a1a";

const styles = {
  page: { minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace' },
  header: { position: 'sticky' as const, top: 0, zIndex: 40, backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE, borderBottom: `4px solid ${BORDER_COLOR}`, padding: '20px 32px' },
  headerContent: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', gap: '16px' },
  title: { fontSize: '32px', fontWeight: 900, color: DARK_GREY, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '-0.05em' },
  searchBox: { position: 'relative' as const, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' },
  searchInput: { width: '280px', paddingLeft: '40px', paddingRight: '12px', padding: '12px 12px 12px 40px', backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE, border: `3px solid ${BORDER_COLOR}`, fontSize: '16px', color: DARK_GREY, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace', fontWeight: 700 },
  button: { padding: '12px 20px', backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE, border: `3px solid ${BORDER_COLOR}`, color: DARK_GREY, fontSize: '14px', fontWeight: 700, cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.15s', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '8px', fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace', textTransform: 'uppercase' },
  main: { padding: '32px', maxWidth: '1600px', margin: '0 auto' },
  boardGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(320px, 1fr))', gap: '32px' },
  column: { backgroundColor: CREAM, border: `4px solid ${BORDER_COLOR}`, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' as const, minHeight: '500px' },
  columnHeader: { padding: '20px', borderBottom: `4px solid ${BORDER_COLOR}`, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE },
  columnTitle: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: 900, color: DARK_GREY, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '-0.03em' },
  taskCount: { fontSize: '14px', padding: '6px 12px', backgroundColor: DARK_GREY, color: WARM_WHITE, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace', fontWeight: 700, minWidth: '32px', textAlign: 'center' },
  columnContent: { padding: '16px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' as const, gap: '12px' },
  addTaskInline: { padding: '16px', border: `3px dashed ${LIGHT_GREY}`, backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE },
  loading: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace' },
};

export default function Board() {
  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([]);
  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>>([]);
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("");
  const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [addingToColumn, setAddingToColumn] = useState<TaskStatus | null>(null);
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);

  const sensors = useSensors(
    useSensor(PointerSensor, { activationConstraint: { distance: 8 } })
  );

  const fetchTasks = useCallback(async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks");
      if (response.ok) setTasks(await response.json());
    } catch {
      toast.error("FAILED TO LOAD TASKS");
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  }, []);

  const fetchTags = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tags");
      if (response.ok) setTags(await response.json());
    } catch {}
  };

  useEffect(() => { fetchTasks(); fetchTags(); }, [fetchTasks]);

  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(t =>
    t.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
    (t.description && t.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()))
  );

  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {
    not_started: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "not_started"),
    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "in_progress"),
    complete: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "complete"),
  };

  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => setActiveId(parseInt(event.active.id as string));
  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
    setActiveId(null);
    const { active, over } = event;
    if (!over) return;

    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
    const activeTask = tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId);
    if (!activeTask) return;

    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;
    const newStatus = overStatus || activeTask.status;

    const updatedTasks = tasks.map(t => t.id === activeId ? { ...t, status: newStatus } : t);
    setTasks(updatedTasks);

    try {
      await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${activeId}`, {
        method: "PATCH",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...activeTask, status: newStatus, title: activeTask.title, description: activeTask.description || "", tags: activeTask.tags.map(t => t.name) }),
      });
    } catch {
      toast.error("FAILED TO MOVE TASK");
      fetchTasks();
    }
  };

  const handleCreateTask = async (status: TaskStatus, data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...data, status }),
      });
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create");
      const newTask = await response.json();
      setTasks(prev => [...prev, newTask]);
      toast.success("TASK CREATED");
      setAddingToColumn(null);
    } catch {
      toast.error("FAILED TO CREATE TASK");
    }
  };

  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId) : null;

  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      <div style={styles.loading}>
        <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '8px' }}>
          <span style={{ fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: 900, color: DARK_GREY, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace' }}>TICTAC</span>
          <span style={{ fontSize: '24px', color: LIGHT_GREY, fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace' }}>[LOADING]</span>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div style={styles.page}>
      <header style={styles.header}>
        <div style={styles.headerContent}>
          <h1 style={styles.title}>TICTAC</h1>
          <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '16px', alignItems: 'center' }}>
            <div style={styles.searchBox}>
              <MagnifyingGlassIcon style={{ position: 'absolute', left: '12px', color: LIGHT_GREY, width: '18px', height: '18px' }} />
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="SEARCH..."
                value={searchQuery}
                onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                style={styles.searchInput}
              />
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
              style={styles.button}
              onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: CREAM })}
              onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE })}
            >
              <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
              EXIT
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </header>

      <main style={styles.main}>
        <DndContext sensors={sensors} collisionDetection={closestCorners} onDragStart={handleDragStart} onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}>
          <div style={styles.boardGrid}>
            {STATUSES.map((status) => (
              <Column
                key={status.value}
                status={status.value}
                label={status.label}
                tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
                availableTags={tags}
                isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
                onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
                onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
                onCreateTask={(data) => handleCreateTask(status.value, data)}
              />
            ))}
          </div>

          <DragOverlay>
            {activeTask && (
              <div style={{ opacity: 0.9, transform: 'rotate(2deg)', width: '288px' }}>
                <TaskCard task={activeTask} availableTags={tags} onUpdate={() => {}} onDelete={() => {}} />
              </div>
            )}
          </DragOverlay>
        </DndContext>
      </main>
    </div>
  );
}

// Column Component with Literal Inline Task Creation
function Column({
  status,
  label,
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  isAdding,
  onAddStart,
  onAddCancel,
  onCreateTask,
}: {
  status: TaskStatus;
  label: string;
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  isAdding: boolean;
  onAddStart: () => void;
  onAddCancel: () => void;
  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
}) {
  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({ id: status, data: { status } });
  const taskIds = tasks.map(t => t.id.toString());

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={styles.column}>
      <div style={styles.columnHeader}>
        <span style={styles.columnTitle}>{label}</span>
        <span style={styles.taskCount}>{tasks.length}</span>
      </div>

      <div style={styles.columnContent}>
        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
          {tasks.map(task => (
            <SortableTaskCard
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              availableTags={availableTags}
              onUpdate={async (id, data) => {
                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
                  method: "PATCH",
                  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
                  body: JSON.stringify(data),
                });
              }}
              onDelete={async (id) => {
                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" });
                window.location.reload();
              }}
            />
          ))}
        </SortableContext>

        {isAdding ? (
          <InlineTaskCreate availableTags={availableTags} onSave={onCreateTask} onCancel={onAddCancel} />
        ) : (
          <button
            onClick={onAddStart}
            style={{
              width: '100%',
              padding: '16px',
              border: '3px dashed #888888',
              backgroundColor: 'transparent',
              color: '#888888',
              fontSize: '14px',
              fontWeight: 700,
              cursor: 'pointer',
              fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
              textTransform: 'uppercase',
              transition: 'all 0.15s',
            }}
            onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a', backgroundColor: '#EDE8DD' })}
            onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888', backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
          >
            + NEW TASK
          </button>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Literal Inline Task Creation - starts with editable placeholder
function InlineTaskCreate({
  availableTags,
  onSave,
  onCancel,
}: {
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
}) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
  const inputRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    inputRef.current?.focus();
  }, []);

  const handleSubmit = () => {
    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: [] });
  };

  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleSubmit();
    } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
      onCancel();
    }
  };

  return (
    <div style={styles.addTaskInline}>
      <input
        ref={inputRef}
        type="text"
        value={title}
        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="[TASK TITLE]"
        style={{
          width: '100%',
          padding: '8px 0',
          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
          border: 'none',
          borderBottom: '2px solid #888888',
          fontSize: '16px',
          color: '#1a1a1a',
          fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
          fontWeight: 700,
          outline: 'none',
          marginBottom: '8px',
        }}
        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
      />
      <input
        type="text"
        value={description}
        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="[description...]"
        style={{
          width: '100%',
          padding: '8px 0',
          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
          border: 'none',
          borderBottom: '2px solid #cccccc',
          fontSize: '14px',
          color: '#333333',
          fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
          outline: 'none',
          marginBottom: '12px',
        }}
        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
      />
      <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '8px' }}>
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={onCancel}
          style={{
            padding: '8px 16px',
            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
            color: '#888888',
            border: '2px solid #888888',
            fontSize: '12px',
            fontWeight: 700,
            cursor: 'pointer',
            fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
            textTransform: 'uppercase',
          }}
          onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a' })}
          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888' })}
        >
          CANCEL
        </button>
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={handleSubmit}
          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
          style={{
            padding: '8px 16px',
            backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
            color: '#F5F1E8',
            border: '2px solid #1a1a1a',
            fontSize: '12px',
            fontWeight: 700,
            cursor: 'pointer',
            fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
            textTransform: 'uppercase',
            opacity: (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) ? 0.5 : 1,
          }}
          onMouseEnter={(e) => (!title.trim() && !isSubmitting) && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#4a4a4a' })}
          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a' })}
        >
          {isSubmitting ? "[SAVING]" : "[SAVE]"}
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
function SortableTaskCard({
  task,
  availableTags,
  onUpdate,
  onDelete,
}: {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({ id: task.id.toString(), data: { status: task.status } });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
      <TaskCard task={task} availableTags={availableTags} onUpdate={onUpdate} onDelete={onDelete} dragAttributes={attributes} dragListeners={listeners} />
    </div>
  );
}

   221‚Üí// Column Component with Literal Inline Task Creation
   222‚Üífunction Column({
   223‚Üí  status,
   224‚Üí  label,
   225‚Üí  tasks,
   226‚Üí  availableTags,
   227‚Üí  isAdding,
   228‚Üí  onAddStart,
   229‚Üí  onAddCancel,
   230‚Üí  onCreateTask,
   231‚Üí}: {
   232‚Üí  status: TaskStatus;
   233‚Üí  label: string;
   234‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   235‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   236‚Üí  isAdding: boolean;
   237‚Üí  onAddStart: () => void;
   238‚Üí  onAddCancel: () => void;
   239‚Üí  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   240‚Üí}) {
   241‚Üí  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({ id: status, data: { status } });
   242‚Üí  const taskIds = tasks.map(t => t.id.toString());
   243‚Üí
   244‚Üí  return (
   245‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={styles.column}>
   246‚Üí      <div style={styles.columnHeader}>
   247‚Üí        <span style={styles.columnTitle}>{label}</span>
   248‚Üí        <span style={styles.taskCount}>{tasks.length}</span>
   249‚Üí      </div>
   250‚Üí
   251‚Üí      <div style={styles.columnContent}>
   252‚Üí        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
   253‚Üí          {tasks.map(task => (
   254‚Üí            <SortableTaskCard
   255‚Üí              key={task.id}
   256‚Üí              task={task}
   257‚Üí              availableTags={availableTags}
   258‚Üí              onUpdate={async (id, data) => {
   259‚Üí                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   260‚Üí                  method: "PATCH",
   261‚Üí                  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   262‚Üí                  body: JSON.stringify(data),
   263‚Üí                });
   264‚Üí              }}
   265‚Üí              onDelete={async (id) => {
   266‚Üí                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" });
   267‚Üí                window.location.reload();
   268‚Üí              }}
   269‚Üí            />
   270‚Üí          ))}
   271‚Üí        </SortableContext>
   272‚Üí
   273‚Üí        {isAdding ? (
   274‚Üí          <InlineTaskCreate availableTags={availableTags} onSave={onCreateTask} onCancel={onAddCancel} />
   275‚Üí        ) : (
   276‚Üí          <button
   277‚Üí            onClick={onAddStart}
   278‚Üí            style={{
   279‚Üí              width: '100%',
   280‚Üí              padding: '16px',
   281‚Üí              border: '3px dashed #888888',
   282‚Üí              backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   283‚Üí              color: '#888888',
   284‚Üí              fontSize: '14px',
   285‚Üí              fontWeight: 700,
   286‚Üí              cursor: 'pointer',
   287‚Üí              fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
   288‚Üí              textTransform: 'uppercase',
   289‚Üí              transition: 'all 0.15s',
   290‚Üí            }}
   291‚Üí            onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a', backgroundColor: '#EDE8DD' })}
   292‚Üí            onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888', backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
   293‚Üí          >
   294‚Üí            + NEW TASK
   295‚Üí          </button>
   296‚Üí        )}
   297‚Üí      </div>
   298‚Üí    </div>
   299‚Üí  );
   300‚Üí}

   302‚Üí// Literal Inline Task Creation - starts with editable placeholder
   303‚Üífunction InlineTaskCreate({
   304‚Üí  availableTags,
   305‚Üí  onSave,
   306‚Üí  onCancel,
   307‚Üí}: {
   308‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   309‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   310‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   311‚Üí}) {
   312‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   313‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   314‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   315‚Üí  const inputRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);
   316‚Üí
   317‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   318‚Üí    inputRef.current?.focus();
   319‚Üí  }, []);
   320‚Üí
   321‚Üí  const handleSubmit = () => {
   322‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   323‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   324‚Üí    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: [] });
   325‚Üí  };
   326‚Üí
   327‚Üí  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
   328‚Üí    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
   329‚Üí      e.preventDefault();
   330‚Üí      handleSubmit();
   331‚Üí    } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
   332‚Üí      onCancel();
   333‚Üí    }
   334‚Üí  };
   335‚Üí
   336‚Üí  return (
   337‚Üí    <div style={styles.addTaskInline}>
   338‚Üí      <input
   339‚Üí        ref={inputRef}
   340‚Üí        type="text"
   341‚Üí        value={title}
   342‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   343‚Üí        placeholder="[TASK TITLE]"
   344‚Üí        style={{
   345‚Üí          width: '100%',
   346‚Üí          padding: '8px 0',
   347‚Üí          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   348‚Üí          border: 'none',
   349‚Üí          borderBottom: '2px solid #888888',
   350‚Üí          fontSize: '16px',
   351‚Üí          color: '#1a1a1a',
   352‚Üí          fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
   353‚Üí          fontWeight: 700,
   354‚Üí          outline: 'none',
   355‚Üí          marginBottom: '8px',
   356‚Üí        }}
   357‚Üí        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
   358‚Üí      />
   359‚Üí      <input
   360‚Üí        type="text"
   361‚Üí        value={description}
   362‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   363‚Üí        placeholder="[description...]"
   364‚Üí        style={{
   365‚Üí          width: '100%',
   366‚Üí          padding: '8px 0',
   367‚Üí          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   368‚Üí          border: 'none',
   369‚Üí          borderBottom: '2px solid #cccccc',
   370‚Üí          fontSize: '14px',
   371‚Üí          color: '#333333',
   372‚Üí          fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
   373‚Üí          outline: 'none',
   374‚Üí          marginBottom: '12px',
   375‚Üí        }}
   376‚Üí        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
   377‚Üí      />
   378‚Üí      <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '8px' }}>
   379‚Üí        <button
   380‚Üí          type="button"
   381‚Üí          onClick={onCancel}
   382‚Üí          style={{
   383‚Üí            padding: '8px 16px',
   384‚Üí            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   385‚Üí            color: '#888888',
   386‚Üí            border: '2px solid #888888',
   387‚Üí            fontSize: '12px',
   388‚Üí            fontWeight: 700,
   389‚Üí            cursor: 'pointer',
   390‚Üí            fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
   391‚Üí            textTransform: 'uppercase',
   392‚Üí          }}
   393‚Üí          onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a' })}
   394‚Üí          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888' })}
   395‚Üí        >
   396‚Üí          CANCEL
   397‚Üí        </button>
   398‚Üí        <button
   399‚Üí          type="button"
   400‚Üí          onClick={handleSubmit}
   401‚Üí          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
   402‚Üí          style={{
   403‚Üí            padding: '8px 16px',
   404‚Üí            backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
   405‚Üí            color: '#F5F1E8',
   406‚Üí            border: '2px solid #1a1a1a',
   407‚Üí            fontSize: '12px',
   408‚Üí            fontWeight: 700,
   409‚Üí            cursor: 'pointer',
   410‚Üí            fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
   411‚Üí            textTransform: 'uppercase',
   412‚Üí            opacity: (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) ? 0.5 : 1,
   413‚Üí          }}
   414‚Üí          onMouseEnter={(e) => (!title.trim() && !isSubmitting) && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#4a4a4a' })}
   415‚Üí          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a' })}
   416‚Üí        >
   417‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? "[SAVING]" : "[SAVE]"}
   418‚Üí        </button>
   419‚Üí      </div>
   420‚Üí    </div>
   421‚Üí  );
   422‚Üí}
   423‚Üí
   424‚Üí// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
   425‚Üífunction SortableTaskCard({
   426‚Üí  task,
   427‚Üí  availableTags,
   428‚Üí  onUpdate,
   429‚Üí  onDelete,
   430‚Üí}: {
   431‚Üí  task: Task;
   432‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   433‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   434‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   435‚Üí}) {
   436‚Üí  const {
   437‚Üí    attributes,
   438‚Üí    listeners,
   439‚Üí    setNodeRef,
   440‚Üí    transform,
   441‚Üí    transition,
   442‚Üí    isDragging,
   443‚Üí  } = useSortable({ id: task.id.toString(), data: { status: task.status } });
   444‚Üí
   445‚Üí  const style = {
   446‚Üí    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
   447‚Üí    transition,
   448‚Üí    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
   449‚Üí  };
   450‚Üí
   451‚Üí  return (
   452‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
   453‚Üí      <TaskCard task={task} availableTags={availableTags} onUpdate={onUpdate} onDelete={onDelete} dragAttributes={attributes} dragListeners={listeners} />
   454‚Üí    </div>
   455‚Üí  );
   456‚Üí}

    lineHeight: '1.4',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
  },
  tag: {
    display: 'inline-block',
    padding: '2px 8px',
    border: '2px solid #1a1a1a',
    fontSize: '11px',
    color: '#1a1a1a',
    marginRight: '6px',
    marginBottom: '4px',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    fontWeight: 600,
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
  },
  editContainer: {
    backgroundColor: WARM_WHITE,
    border: '3px solid #1a1a1a',
    padding: '16px',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    boxShadow: '4px 4px 0 #1a1a1a',
  },
  inlineInput: {
    width: '100%',
    padding: '8px 0',
    backgroundColor: 'transparent',
    border: 'none',
    borderBottom: '2px solid #888888',
    fontSize: '16px',
    color: '#1a1a1a',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    fontWeight: 700,
    outline: 'none',
    marginBottom: '8px',
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
  },
  inlineTextarea: {
    width: '100%',
    padding: '8px 0',
    backgroundColor: 'transparent',
    border: 'none',
    borderBottom: '2px solid #cccccc',
    fontSize: '14px',
    color: '#333333',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    outline: 'none',
    resize: 'vertical' as const,
    minHeight: '60px',
    marginBottom: '12px',
  },
  statusButton: {
    padding: '6px 12px',
    border: '2px solid #1a1a1a',
    fontSize: '11px',
    fontWeight: 700,
    backgroundColor: 'transparent',
    color: '#888888',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    transition: 'all 0.15s',
    marginRight: '6px',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
  },
  statusButtonActive: {
    backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
    color: '#F5F1E8',
  },
  buttonGroup: {
    display: 'flex',
    gap: '8px',
    marginTop: '12px',
  },
  primaryButton: {
    flex: 1,
    padding: '10px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
    color: '#F5F1E8',
    border: '2px solid #1a1a1a',
    fontSize: '12px',
    fontWeight: 700,
    cursor: 'pointer',
    display: 'flex',
    alignItems: 'center',
    justifyContent: 'center',
    gap: '6px',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
  },
  secondaryButton: {
    padding: '10px 16px',
    backgroundColor: 'transparent',
    color: '#888888',
    border: '2px solid #888888',

  },

    backgroundColor: 'transparent',
    color: '#888888',

  },
  confirmDeleteButton: {
    padding: '10px 16px',
    backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a',
    color: '#F5F1E8',
    border: '2px solid #1a1a1a',
    fontSize: '12px',
    cursor: 'pointer',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
    fontWeight: 700,
  },
  errorText: {
    color: '#1a1a1a',
    fontSize: '11px',
    marginTop: '-4px',
    marginBottom: '8px',
    fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace',
    fontWeight: 700,
    textTransform: 'uppercase',
  },
};

export default function TaskCard({ task, availableTags, onUpdate, onDelete, dragAttributes, dragListeners }: TaskCardProps) {
  const [isEditing, setIsEditing] = useState(false);
  const [editTitle, setEditTitle] = useState(task.title);
  const [editDescription, setEditDescription] = useState(task.description || "");
  const [editStatus, setEditStatus] = useState<TaskStatus>(task.status);
  const [showDeleteConfirm, setShowDeleteConfirm] = useState(false);
  const [titleError, setTitleError] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
  const titleInputRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    if (isEditing) {
      titleInputRef.current?.focus();
      titleInputRef.current?.select();
    }
  }, [isEditing]);

  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({
    id: task.id.toString(),
    data: { status: task.status },
    disabled: isEditing,
  });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  const handleSave = async () => {
    if (!editTitle.trim()) {
      setTitleError("TITLE REQUIRED");
      return;
    }
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    setTitleError("");
    await onUpdate(task.id, {
      title: editTitle.trim(),
      description: editDescription.trim(),
      status: editStatus,
      tags: [],
    });
    setIsEditing(false);
    setIsSubmitting(false);
  };

  const handleCancel = () => {
    setEditTitle(task.title);
    setEditDescription(task.description || "");
    setEditStatus(task.status);
    setTitleError("");
    setIsEditing(false);
  };

  const confirmDelete = () => {
    setShowDeleteConfirm(false);
    setIsEditing(false);
    onDelete(task.id);
  };

  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleSave();
    } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
      handleCancel();
    }
  };

  if (isEditing) {
    return (
      <div ref={setNodeRef} style={{ ...style, ...styles.editContainer }}>
        {showDeleteConfirm ? (
          <div style={{ textAlign: 'center', padding: '20px 0' }}>
            <p style={{ color: '#1a1a1a', marginBottom: '16px', fontSize: '14px', fontFamily: 'Courier New, Courier, monospace', fontWeight: 700 }}>
              DELETE THIS TASK?
            </p>
            <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '12px', justifyContent: 'center' }}>
              <button
                onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(false)}
                style={styles.secondaryButton}
                onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a' })}
                onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888' })}
              >
                [CANCEL]
              </button>
              <button
                onClick={confirmDelete}
                style={styles.confirmDeleteButton}
                onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#4a4a4a' })}
                onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a' })}
              >
                [DELETE]
              </button>
            </div>
          </div>
        ) : (
          <>
            <input
              ref={titleInputRef}
              type="text"
              value={editTitle}
              onChange={(e) => { setEditTitle(e.target.value); setTitleError(""); }}
              style={{ ...styles.inlineInput, borderBottom: titleError ? '2px solid #1a1a1a' : '2px solid #888888' }}
              placeholder="[TASK TITLE]"
              onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
            />
            {titleError && <p style={styles.errorText}>! {titleError}</p>}

            <textarea
              value={editDescription}
              onChange={(e) => setEditDescription(e.target.value)}
              style={styles.inlineTextarea}
              placeholder="[description...]"
              rows={2}
            />

            <div style={{ marginBottom: '12px' }}>
              {STATUSES.map((s) => (
                <button
                  key={s.value}
                  type="button"
                  onClick={() => setEditStatus(s.value)}
                  style={{
                    ...styles.statusButton,
                    ...(editStatus === s.value ? styles.statusButtonActive : {})
                  }}
                  onMouseEnter={(e) => editStatus !== s.value && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#4a4a4a', color: '#4a4a4a' })}
                  onMouseLeave={(e) => editStatus !== s.value && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#888888' })}
                >
                  {s.label}
                </button>
              ))}
            </div>

            <div style={styles.buttonGroup}>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={() => setShowDeleteConfirm(true)}
                style={styles.dangerButton}
                onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a' })}
                onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888' })}
              >
                [DELETE]
              </button>
              <div style={{ flex: 1 }} />
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleCancel}
                style={styles.secondaryButton}
                onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#1a1a1a', color: '#1a1a1a' })}
                onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: '#888888', color: '#888888' })}
              >
                [CANCEL]
              </button>
              <button
                type="button"
                onClick={handleSave}
                disabled={!editTitle.trim() || isSubmitting}
                style={{
                  ...styles.primaryButton,
                  opacity: (!editTitle.trim() || isSubmitting) ? 0.5 : 1,
                }}
                onMouseEnter={(e) => (editTitle.trim() && !isSubmitting) && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#4a4a4a' })}
                onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#1a1a1a' })}
              >
                <CheckIcon style={{ width: '14px', height: '14px' }} />
                {isSubmitting ? "[SAVING]" : "[SAVE]"}
              </button>
            </div>
          </>
        )}
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div
      ref={setNodeRef}
      style={{ ...style, ...styles.card }}
      {...(dragAttributes || {})}
      {...(dragListeners || {})}
      onClick={() => setIsEditing(true)}
      onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.cardHover)}
      onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { transform: 'translate(0, 0)', boxShadow: '4px 4px 0 #1a1a1a' })}
    >
      <h3 style={styles.title}>{task.title}</h3>
      {task.description && <p style={styles.description}>{task.description}</p>}

      {task.tags.length > 0 && (
        <div>
          {task.tags.map((tag) => (
            <span key={tag.id} style={{ ...styles.tag, backgroundColor: tag.color }}>
              {tag.name}
            </span>
          ))}
        </div>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}

"use client";

import { useState } from "react";
import { signIn } from "next-auth/react";
import { useRouter } from "next/navigation";
import Link from "next/link";
import { toast } from "sonner";

export default function SignInPage() {

    e.preventDefault();
    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const result = await signIn("credentials", {
        email,
        password,
        redirect: false,
      });

      if (result?.error) {
        toast.error("[INVALID CREDENTIALS]");
      } else {
        toast.success("[SIGNED IN]");
        router.push("/");
        router.refresh();
      }

      setIsLoading(false);

          }}>

          </p>

          <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} style={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', gap: '24px' }}>
            <div>

                marginBottom: '8px',

}

export default function SignUpPage() {
  const router = useRouter();

  const [password, setPassword] = useState("");

  const handleSubmit = async (e: React.FormEvent) => {
    e.preventDefault();

    if (password !== confirmPassword) {
      toast.error("[PASSWORDS DO NOT MATCH]");
      return;

    if (password.length < 6) {
      toast.error("[PASSWORD TOO SHORT]");
      return;
    }

    setIsLoading(true);

    try {
      const response = await fetch("/api/auth/signup", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ email, password }),
      });

      const data = await response.json();

      if (!response.ok) {
        toast.error(data.error || "[ERROR]");
        return;
      }

      toast.success("[ACCOUNT CREATED]");
      router.push("/auth/signin");
    } catch {
      toast.error("[ERROR]");
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);

Verify TicTac brutalist design with Playwright

```bash
cat > /tmp/verify-tictac.js << 'EOF'
const { chromium } = require('playwright');

(async () => {
  const browser = await chromium.launch();
  const page = await browser.newPage();
  
  console.log('=== TicTac Brutalist Design Verification ===\n');
  
  // Check sign-in page
  await page.goto('http://localhost:3000/auth/signin');
  await page.waitForLoadState('networkidle');
  
  // Get title
  const title = await page.title();
  console.log('Page Title:', title);
  
  // Check main heading
  const h1Text = await page.locator('h1').first().textContent();
  console.log('Main Heading:', h1Text);
  
  // Check background color of body
  const bgColor = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const body = document.body;
    const styles = window.getComputedStyle(body);
    return styles.backgroundColor;
  });
  console.log('Background Color:', bgColor);
  
  // Check font family
  const fontFamily = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const body = document.body;
    const styles = window.getComputedStyle(body);
    return styles.fontFamily;
  });
  console.log('Font Family:', fontFamily);
  
  // Check if there are heavy borders (brutalist style)
  const borderWidth = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const card = document.querySelector('div[style*="border"]');
    if (!card) return 'not found';
    const style = window.getComputedStyle(card);
    return style.borderWidth;
  });
  console.log('Border Width:', borderWidth);
  
  // Check box shadow (brutalist offset shadow)
  const boxShadow = await page.evaluate(() => {
    const card = document.querySelector('div[style*="boxShadow"]');
    if (!card) return 'not found';
    return card.style.boxShadow || 'not inline';
  });
  console.log('Box Shadow:', boxShadow);
  
  // Take a screenshot
  await page.screenshot({ path: '/tmp/tictac-signin.png', fullPage: true });
  console.log('\nScreenshot saved to: /tmp/tictac-signin.png');
  
  await browser.close();
  
  console.log('\n=== Verification Summary ===');
  console.log('‚úì App Name:', title === 'TicTac' ? 'TicTac' : 'FAILED');
  console.log('‚úì Warm White BG:', bgColor === 'rgb(245, 241, 232)' ? '#F5F1E8' : 'FAILED - got ' + bgColor);
  console.log('‚úì Brutalist Font:', fontFamily.includes('Courier New') ? 'Courier New' : 'FAILED');
  console.log('‚úì Heavy Borders:', borderWidth !== 'not found' ? 'Yes' : 'FAILED');
  console.log('‚úì Box Shadow:', boxShadow !== 'not inline' ? 'Yes (' + boxShadow + ')' : 'Not found inline');
})();
EOF

To cancel the Ralph loop:

1. Check if `.claude/ralph-loop.local.md` exists using Bash: `test -f .claude/ralph-loop.local.md && echo "EXISTS" || echo "NOT_FOUND"`

   - Read `.claude/ralph-loop.local.md` to get the current iteration number from the `iteration:` field

   - Report: "Cancelled Ralph loop (was at iteration N)" where N is the iteration value

import type { Metadata } from "next";
import "./globals.css";
import { SessionProvider } from "next-auth/react";

export const metadata: Metadata = {
  title: "TicTac",
  description: "Task management",
};

// Clean theme colors
const CLEAN_STYLES = `
  /* CLEAN THEME CRITICAL STYLES */
  *, *::before, *::after {
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

  html {
    font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', 'Roboto', 'Oxygen', 'Ubuntu', 'Cantarell', 'Fira Sans', 'Droid Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif;
  }

  body {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #ffffff !important;
    color: #1a1a1a !important;
    font-size: 15px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  }

  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
    color: #111111 !important;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin: 0;
  }

  p, span, div, label, a {
    color: #374151 !important;
  }

  /* Subtle borders */
  input, textarea, select {
    font-family: inherit;
    background-color: #ffffff !important;
    color: #1a1a1a !important;
    border: 1px solid #e5e7eb !important;
    border-radius: 6px !important;
  }

  input:focus, textarea:focus, select:focus {
    outline: none !important;
    border-color: #3b82f6 !important;
    box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1) !important;
  }

  input::placeholder, textarea::placeholder {
    color: #9ca3af !important;
  }

  /* Clean buttons */
  button {
    font-family: inherit;
    cursor: pointer;
    border-radius: 6px !important;
    transition: all 0.15s ease;
  }

  button:disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
    cursor: not-allowed;
  }

  /* Link styles */
  a {
    color: #3b82f6 !important;
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
`;

export default function RootLayout({
  children,
}: Readonly<{
  children: React.ReactNode;
}>) {
  return (
    <html lang="en">
      <head>
        <style dangerouslySetInnerHTML={{ __html: CLEAN_STYLES }} />
      </head>
      <body>
        <SessionProvider>{children}</SessionProvider>
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}

```

"use client";

import { useEffect, useState, useCallback, useRef } from "react";
import {
  DndContext,
  DragEndEvent,
  DragOverlay,
  DragStartEvent,
  PointerSensor,
  useSensor,
  useSensors,
  closestCorners,
  useDroppable,
} from "@dnd-kit/core";
import { arrayMove, SortableContext, verticalListSortingStrategy, useSortable } from "@dnd-kit/sortable";
import { CSS } from "@dnd-kit/utilities";
import TaskCard from "./TaskCard";
import { Task, TaskStatus } from "@/lib/types";
import { fetchWithRetry } from "@/lib/utils";
import { signOut } from "next-auth/react";
import {
  MagnifyingGlassIcon,
  ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon,
} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline";

const STATUSES: { value: TaskStatus; label: string }[] = [
  { value: "not_started", label: "To Do" },
  { value: "in_progress", label: "In Progress" },
  { value: "complete", label: "Done" },
];

// Clean theme colors
const WHITE = "#ffffff";
const GRAY_50 = "#f9fafb";
const GRAY_100 = "#f3f4f6";
const GRAY_200 = "#e5e7eb";
const GRAY_300 = "#d1d5db";
const GRAY_400 = "#9ca3af";
const GRAY_500 = "#6b7280";
const GRAY_600 = "#4b5563";
const GRAY_700 = "#374151";
const GRAY_800 = "#1f2937";
const GRAY_900 = "#111827";
const BLUE_500 = "#3b82f6";
const BLUE_50 = "#eff6ff";
const BLUE_100 = "#dbeafe";
const GREEN_500 = "#22c55e";
const GREEN_50 = "#f0fdf4";
const RED_500 = "#ef4444";
const RED_50 = "#fef2f2";

const styles = {
  page: { minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: WHITE, fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif' },
  header: { position: 'sticky' as const, top: 0, zIndex: 40, backgroundColor: WHITE, borderBottom: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`, padding: '16px 24px' },
  headerContent: { display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center', gap: '16px' },
  title: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: 600, color: GRAY_900, fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif' },
  searchBox: { position: 'relative' as const, display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center' },
  searchInput: { width: '240px', paddingLeft: '36px', paddingRight: '12px', padding: '8px 12px 8px 36px', backgroundColor: WHITE, border: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`, borderRadius: '8px', fontSize: '14px', color: GRAY_700, fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif' },
  searchIcon: { position: 'absolute', left: '12px', color: GRAY_400, width: '16px', height: '16px', pointerEvents: 'none' },
  button: { padding: '8px 14px', backgroundColor: WHITE, border: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`, color: GRAY_700, fontSize: '14px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.15s', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '6px', fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif', borderRadius: '8px' },
  buttonHover: { backgroundColor: GRAY_50, borderColor: GRAY_300 },
  main: { padding: '24px', maxWidth: '1400px', margin: '0 auto' },
  boardGrid: { display: 'grid', gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(auto-fit, minmax(300px, 1fr))', gap: '24px' },
  column: { backgroundColor: GRAY_50, border: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`, borderRadius: '12px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' as const, minHeight: '400px' },
  columnHeader: { padding: '16px', borderBottom: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between', alignItems: 'center' },
  columnTitle: { fontSize: '15px', fontWeight: 600, color: GRAY_700, fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif' },
  taskCount: { fontSize: '13px', padding: '2px 8px', backgroundColor: GRAY_200, color: GRAY_600, fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif', fontWeight: 500, borderRadius: '12px' },
  columnContent: { padding: '12px', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' as const, gap: '8px' },
  addTaskInline: { padding: '12px', border: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`, borderRadius: '8px', backgroundColor: WHITE },
  loading: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', minHeight: '100vh', backgroundColor: WHITE, fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif' },
};

export default function Board() {
  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([]);
  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>>([]);
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("");
  const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState<number | null>(null);
  const [addingToColumn, setAddingToColumn] = useState<TaskStatus | null>(null);
  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);

  const sensors = useSensors(
    useSensor(PointerSensor, { activationConstraint: { distance: 8 } })
  );

  const fetchTasks = useCallback(async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks");
      if (response.ok) setTasks(await response.json());
    } finally {
      setIsLoading(false);
    }
  }, []);

  const fetchTags = async () => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tags");
      if (response.ok) setTags(await response.json());
    } catch {}
  };

  useEffect(() => { fetchTasks(); fetchTags(); }, [fetchTasks]);

  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(t =>
    t.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
    (t.description && t.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()))
  );

  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {
    not_started: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "not_started"),
    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "in_progress"),
    complete: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "complete"),
  };

  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => setActiveId(parseInt(event.active.id as string));
  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
    setActiveId(null);
    const { active, over } = event;
    if (!over) return;

    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
    const activeTask = tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId);
    if (!activeTask) return;

    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;
    const newStatus = overStatus || activeTask.status;

    const updatedTasks = tasks.map(t => t.id === activeId ? { ...t, status: newStatus } : t);
    setTasks(updatedTasks);

    try {
      await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${activeId}`, {
        method: "PATCH",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...activeTask, status: newStatus, title: activeTask.title, description: activeTask.description || "", tags: activeTask.tags.map(t => t.name) }),
      });
    } catch {
      fetchTasks();
    }
  };

  const handleCreateTask = async (status: TaskStatus, data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => {
    try {
      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
        method: "POST",
        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
        body: JSON.stringify({ ...data, status }),
      });
      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create");
      const newTask = await response.json();
      setTasks(prev => [...prev, newTask]);
      setAddingToColumn(null);
    } catch {
      // Silent error handling
    }
  };

  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId) : null;

  if (isLoading) {
    return (
      <div style={styles.loading}>
        <div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '12px' }}>
          <div style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px', border: '2px solid #e5e7eb', borderTopColor: '#3b82f6', borderRadius: '50%', animation: 'spin 0.8s linear infinite' }}></div>
          <span style={{ color: GRAY_500, fontSize: '14px' }}>Loading...</span>
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div style={styles.page}>
      <header style={styles.header}>
        <div style={styles.headerContent}>
          <h1 style={styles.title}>TicTac</h1>
          <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '12px', alignItems: 'center' }}>
            <div style={styles.searchBox}>
              <MagnifyingGlassIcon style={styles.searchIcon} />
              <input
                type="text"
                placeholder="Search..."
                value={searchQuery}
                onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
                style={styles.searchInput}
              />
            </div>
            <button
              onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
              style={styles.button}
              onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.buttonHover)}
              onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: WHITE, borderColor: GRAY_200 })}
            >
              <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
              Sign out
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </header>

      <main style={styles.main}>
        <DndContext sensors={sensors} collisionDetection={closestCorners} onDragStart={handleDragStart} onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}>
          <div style={styles.boardGrid}>
            {STATUSES.map((status) => (
              <Column
                key={status.value}
                status={status.value}
                label={status.label}
                tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
                availableTags={tags}
                isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
                onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
                onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
                onCreateTask={(data) => handleCreateTask(status.value, data)}
              />
            ))}
          </div>

          <DragOverlay>
            {activeTask && (
              <div style={{ opacity: 0.8, transform: 'rotate(1deg)', width: '284px' }}>
                <TaskCard task={activeTask} availableTags={tags} onUpdate={() => {}} onDelete={() => {}} />
              </div>
            )}
          </DragOverlay>
        </DndContext>
      </main>

      <style>{`
        @keyframes spin {
          to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
        }
      `}</style>
    </div>
  );
}

// Column Component with Clean Inline Task Creation
function Column({
  status,
  label,
  tasks,
  availableTags,
  isAdding,
  onAddStart,
  onAddCancel,
  onCreateTask,
}: {
  status: TaskStatus;
  label: string;
  tasks: Task[];
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  isAdding: boolean;
  onAddStart: () => void;
  onAddCancel: () => void;
  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
}) {
  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({ id: status, data: { status } });
  const taskIds = tasks.map(t => t.id.toString());

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={styles.column}>
      <div style={styles.columnHeader}>
        <span style={styles.columnTitle}>{label}</span>
        <span style={styles.taskCount}>{tasks.length}</span>
      </div>

      <div style={styles.columnContent}>
        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
          {tasks.map(task => (
            <SortableTaskCard
              key={task.id}
              task={task}
              availableTags={availableTags}
              onUpdate={async (id, data) => {
                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
                  method: "PATCH",
                  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
                  body: JSON.stringify(data),
                });
              }}
              onDelete={async (id) => {
                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" });
                window.location.reload();
              }}
            />
          ))}
        </SortableContext>

        {isAdding ? (
          <InlineTaskCreate availableTags={availableTags} onSave={onCreateTask} onCancel={onAddCancel} />
        ) : (
          <button
            onClick={onAddStart}
            style={{
              width: '100%',
              padding: '10px',
              border: `1px dashed ${GRAY_300}`,
              backgroundColor: 'transparent',
              color: GRAY_400,
              fontSize: '13px',
              cursor: 'pointer',
              fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
              borderRadius: '8px',
              transition: 'all 0.15s',
            }}
            onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: GRAY_400, color: GRAY_600, backgroundColor: GRAY_50 })}
            onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: GRAY_300, color: GRAY_400, backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
          >
            + New task
          </button>
        )}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Clean Inline Task Creation
function InlineTaskCreate({
  availableTags,
  onSave,
  onCancel,
}: {
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onCancel: () => void;
}) {
  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
  const inputRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);

  useEffect(() => {
    inputRef.current?.focus();
  }, []);

  const handleSubmit = () => {
    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
    setIsSubmitting(true);
    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: [] });
  };

  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
      e.preventDefault();
      handleSubmit();
    } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
      onCancel();
    }
  };

  return (
    <div style={styles.addTaskInline}>
      <input
        ref={inputRef}
        type="text"
        value={title}
        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Task title"
        style={{
          width: '100%',
          padding: '8px 10px',
          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
          border: 'none',
          borderBottom: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`,
          fontSize: '14px',
          color: GRAY_900,
          fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
          outline: 'none',
          marginBottom: '8px',
        }}
        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
      />
      <input
        type="text"
        value={description}
        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
        placeholder="Add a description..."
        style={{
          width: '100%',
          padding: '8px 0',
          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
          border: 'none',
          borderBottom: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`,
          fontSize: '13px',
          color: GRAY_600,
          fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
          outline: 'none',
          marginBottom: '12px',
        }}
        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
      />
      <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '6px' }}>
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={onCancel}
          style={{
            padding: '6px 12px',
            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
            color: GRAY_500,
            border: 'none',
            fontSize: '13px',
            cursor: 'pointer',
            fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
            borderRadius: '6px',
          }}
          onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { color: GRAY_700, backgroundColor: GRAY_100 })}
          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { color: GRAY_500, backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
        >
          Cancel
        </button>
        <button
          type="button"
          onClick={handleSubmit}
          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
          style={{
            padding: '6px 12px',
            backgroundColor: BLUE_500,
            color: WHITE,
            border: 'none',
            fontSize: '13px',
            fontWeight: 500,
            cursor: 'pointer',
            fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
            borderRadius: '6px',
            opacity: (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) ? 0.5 : 1,
          }}
          onMouseEnter={(e) => (title.trim() && !isSubmitting) && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#2563eb' })}
          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: BLUE_500 })}
        >
          {isSubmitting ? "Adding..." : "Add"}
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
function SortableTaskCard({
  task,
  availableTags,
  onUpdate,
  onDelete,
}: {
  task: Task;
  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
}) {
  const {
    attributes,
    listeners,
    setNodeRef,
    transform,
    transition,
    isDragging,
  } = useSortable({ id: task.id.toString(), data: { status: task.status } });

  const style = {
    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
    transition,
    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
  };

  return (
    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
      <TaskCard task={task} availableTags={availableTags} onUpdate={onUpdate} onDelete={onDelete} dragAttributes={attributes} dragListeners={listeners} />
    </div>
  );
}

    73‚Üíexport default function Board() {
    74‚Üí  const [tasks, setTasks] = useState<Task[]>([]);
    75‚Üí  const [tags, setTags] = useState<Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>>([]);
    76‚Üí  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState("");
    77‚Üí  const [activeId, setActiveId] = useState<number | null>(null);

    79‚Üí  const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true);
    80‚Üí
    81‚Üí  const sensors = useSensors(
    82‚Üí    useSensor(PointerSensor, { activationConstraint: { distance: 8 } })
    83‚Üí  );
    84‚Üí
    85‚Üí  const fetchTasks = useCallback(async () => {
    86‚Üí    try {

    88‚Üí      if (response.ok) setTasks(await response.json());
    89‚Üí    } finally {
    90‚Üí      setIsLoading(false);
    91‚Üí    }
    92‚Üí  }, []);
    93‚Üí
    94‚Üí  const fetchTags = async () => {
    95‚Üí    try {
    96‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tags");
    97‚Üí      if (response.ok) setTags(await response.json());
    98‚Üí    } catch {}
    99‚Üí  };
   100‚Üí
   101‚Üí  useEffect(() => { fetchTasks(); fetchTags(); }, [fetchTasks]);
   102‚Üí
   103‚Üí  const filteredTasks = tasks.filter(t =>
   104‚Üí    t.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ||
   105‚Üí    (t.description && t.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()))
   106‚Üí  );
   107‚Üí
   108‚Üí  const tasksByStatus: Record<TaskStatus, Task[]> = {
   109‚Üí    not_started: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "not_started"),
   110‚Üí    in_progress: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "in_progress"),
   111‚Üí    complete: filteredTasks.filter(t => t.status === "complete"),
   112‚Üí  };
   113‚Üí
   114‚Üí  const handleDragStart = (event: DragStartEvent) => setActiveId(parseInt(event.active.id as string));
   115‚Üí  const handleDragEnd = async (event: DragEndEvent) => {
   116‚Üí    setActiveId(null);
   117‚Üí    const { active, over } = event;
   118‚Üí    if (!over) return;
   119‚Üí
   120‚Üí    const activeId = parseInt(active.id as string);
   121‚Üí    const activeTask = tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId);
   122‚Üí    if (!activeTask) return;
   123‚Üí
   124‚Üí    const overStatus = over?.data?.current?.status as TaskStatus | undefined;
   125‚Üí    const newStatus = overStatus || activeTask.status;
   126‚Üí
   127‚Üí    const updatedTasks = tasks.map(t => t.id === activeId ? { ...t, status: newStatus } : t);
   128‚Üí    setTasks(updatedTasks);
   129‚Üí
   130‚Üí    try {
   131‚Üí      await fetchWithRetry(`/api/tasks/${activeId}`, {
   132‚Üí        method: "PATCH",
   133‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   134‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ ...activeTask, status: newStatus, title: activeTask.title, description: activeTask.description || "", tags: activeTask.tags.map(t => t.name) }),
   135‚Üí      });
   136‚Üí    } catch {
   137‚Üí      fetchTasks();
   138‚Üí    }
   139‚Üí  };
   140‚Üí
   141‚Üí  const handleCreateTask = async (status: TaskStatus, data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => {
   142‚Üí    try {
   143‚Üí      const response = await fetchWithRetry("/api/tasks", {
   144‚Üí        method: "POST",
   145‚Üí        headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   146‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ ...data, status }),
   147‚Üí      });
   148‚Üí      if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to create");
   149‚Üí      const newTask = await response.json();
   150‚Üí      setTasks(prev => [...prev, newTask]);
   151‚Üí      setAddingToColumn(null);
   152‚Üí    } catch {
   153‚Üí      // Silent error handling
   154‚Üí    }
   155‚Üí  };
   156‚Üí
   157‚Üí  const activeTask = activeId ? tasks.find(t => t.id === activeId) : null;
   158‚Üí
   159‚Üí  if (isLoading) {
   160‚Üí    return (
   161‚Üí      <div style={styles.loading}>
   162‚Üí        <div style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '12px' }}>
   163‚Üí          <div style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px', border: '2px solid #e5e7eb', borderTopColor: '#3b82f6', borderRadius: '50%', animation: 'spin 0.8s linear infinite' }}></div>
   164‚Üí          <span style={{ color: GRAY_500, fontSize: '14px' }}>Loading...</span>
   165‚Üí        </div>
   166‚Üí      </div>
   167‚Üí    );
   168‚Üí  }
   169‚Üí
   170‚Üí  return (
   171‚Üí    <div style={styles.page}>
   172‚Üí      <header style={styles.header}>
   173‚Üí        <div style={styles.headerContent}>
   174‚Üí          <h1 style={styles.title}>TicTac</h1>
   175‚Üí          <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '12px', alignItems: 'center' }}>
   176‚Üí            <div style={styles.searchBox}>
   177‚Üí              <MagnifyingGlassIcon style={styles.searchIcon} />
   178‚Üí              <input
   179‚Üí                type="text"
   180‚Üí                placeholder="Search..."
   181‚Üí                value={searchQuery}
   182‚Üí                onChange={(e) => setSearchQuery(e.target.value)}
   183‚Üí                style={styles.searchInput}
   184‚Üí              />
   185‚Üí            </div>
   186‚Üí            <button
   187‚Üí              onClick={() => signOut({ callbackUrl: "/auth/signin" })}
   188‚Üí              style={styles.button}
   189‚Üí              onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, styles.buttonHover)}
   190‚Üí              onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: WHITE, borderColor: GRAY_200 })}
   191‚Üí            >
   192‚Üí              <ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon style={{ width: '16px', height: '16px' }} />
   193‚Üí              Sign out
   194‚Üí            </button>
   195‚Üí          </div>
   196‚Üí        </div>
   197‚Üí      </header>
   198‚Üí
   199‚Üí      <main style={styles.main}>
   200‚Üí        <DndContext sensors={sensors} collisionDetection={closestCorners} onDragStart={handleDragStart} onDragEnd={handleDragEnd}>
   201‚Üí          <div style={styles.boardGrid}>
   202‚Üí            {STATUSES.map((status) => (
   203‚Üí              <Column
   204‚Üí                key={status.value}
   205‚Üí                status={status.value}
   206‚Üí                label={status.label}
   207‚Üí                tasks={tasksByStatus[status.value]}
   208‚Üí                availableTags={tags}
   209‚Üí                isAdding={addingToColumn === status.value}
   210‚Üí                onAddStart={() => setAddingToColumn(status.value)}
   211‚Üí                onAddCancel={() => setAddingToColumn(null)}
   212‚Üí                onCreateTask={(data) => handleCreateTask(status.value, data)}
   213‚Üí              />
   214‚Üí            ))}
   215‚Üí          </div>
   216‚Üí
   217‚Üí          <DragOverlay>
   218‚Üí            {activeTask && (
   219‚Üí              <div style={{ opacity: 0.8, transform: 'rotate(1deg)', width: '284px' }}>
   220‚Üí                <TaskCard task={activeTask} availableTags={tags} onUpdate={() => {}} onDelete={() => {}} />
   221‚Üí              </div>
   222‚Üí            )}
   223‚Üí          </DragOverlay>
   224‚Üí        </DndContext>
   225‚Üí      </main>
   226‚Üí
   227‚Üí      <style>{`
   228‚Üí        @keyframes spin {
   229‚Üí          to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
   230‚Üí        }
   231‚Üí      `}</style>
   232‚Üí    </div>
   233‚Üí  );
   234‚Üí}

   236‚Üí// Column Component with Clean Inline Task Creation
   237‚Üífunction Column({
   238‚Üí  status,
   239‚Üí  label,
   240‚Üí  tasks,
   241‚Üí  availableTags,
   242‚Üí  isAdding,
   243‚Üí  onAddStart,
   244‚Üí  onAddCancel,
   245‚Üí  onCreateTask,
   246‚Üí}: {
   247‚Üí  status: TaskStatus;
   248‚Üí  label: string;
   249‚Üí  tasks: Task[];
   250‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   251‚Üí  isAdding: boolean;
   252‚Üí  onAddStart: () => void;
   253‚Üí  onAddCancel: () => void;
   254‚Üí  onCreateTask: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   255‚Üí}) {
   256‚Üí  const { setNodeRef } = useDroppable({ id: status, data: { status } });
   257‚Üí  const taskIds = tasks.map(t => t.id.toString());
   258‚Üí
   259‚Üí  return (
   260‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={styles.column}>
   261‚Üí      <div style={styles.columnHeader}>
   262‚Üí        <span style={styles.columnTitle}>{label}</span>
   263‚Üí        <span style={styles.taskCount}>{tasks.length}</span>
   264‚Üí      </div>
   265‚Üí
   266‚Üí      <div style={styles.columnContent}>
   267‚Üí        <SortableContext items={taskIds} strategy={verticalListSortingStrategy}>
   268‚Üí          {tasks.map(task => (
   269‚Üí            <SortableTaskCard
   270‚Üí              key={task.id}
   271‚Üí              task={task}
   272‚Üí              availableTags={availableTags}
   273‚Üí              onUpdate={async (id, data) => {
   274‚Üí                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, {
   275‚Üí                  method: "PATCH",
   276‚Üí                  headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" },
   277‚Üí                  body: JSON.stringify(data),
   278‚Üí                });
   279‚Üí              }}
   280‚Üí              onDelete={async (id) => {
   281‚Üí                await fetch(`/api/tasks/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" });
   282‚Üí                window.location.reload();
   283‚Üí              }}
   284‚Üí            />
   285‚Üí          ))}
   286‚Üí        </SortableContext>
   287‚Üí
   288‚Üí        {isAdding ? (
   289‚Üí          <InlineTaskCreate availableTags={availableTags} onSave={onCreateTask} onCancel={onAddCancel} />
   290‚Üí        ) : (
   291‚Üí          <button
   292‚Üí            onClick={onAddStart}
   293‚Üí            style={{
   294‚Üí              width: '100%',
   295‚Üí              padding: '10px',
   296‚Üí              border: `1px dashed ${GRAY_300}`,
   297‚Üí              backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   298‚Üí              color: GRAY_400,
   299‚Üí              fontSize: '13px',
   300‚Üí              cursor: 'pointer',
   301‚Üí              fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
   302‚Üí              borderRadius: '8px',
   303‚Üí              transition: 'all 0.15s',
   304‚Üí            }}
   305‚Üí            onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: GRAY_400, color: GRAY_600, backgroundColor: GRAY_50 })}
   306‚Üí            onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { borderColor: GRAY_300, color: GRAY_400, backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
   307‚Üí          >
   308‚Üí            + New task
   309‚Üí          </button>
   310‚Üí        )}
   311‚Üí      </div>
   312‚Üí    </div>
   313‚Üí  );
   314‚Üí}
   315‚Üí
   316‚Üí// Clean Inline Task Creation
   317‚Üífunction InlineTaskCreate({
   318‚Üí  availableTags,
   319‚Üí  onSave,
   320‚Üí  onCancel,
   321‚Üí}: {
   322‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   323‚Üí  onSave: (data: { title: string; description: string; tags: string[] }) => void;
   324‚Üí  onCancel: () => void;
   325‚Üí}) {
   326‚Üí  const [title, setTitle] = useState("");
   327‚Üí  const [description, setDescription] = useState("");
   328‚Üí  const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false);
   329‚Üí  const inputRef = useRef<HTMLInputElement>(null);
   330‚Üí
   331‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   332‚Üí    inputRef.current?.focus();
   333‚Üí  }, []);
   334‚Üí
   335‚Üí  const handleSubmit = () => {
   336‚Üí    if (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) return;
   337‚Üí    setIsSubmitting(true);
   338‚Üí    onSave({ title: title.trim(), description: description.trim(), tags: [] });
   339‚Üí  };
   340‚Üí
   341‚Üí  const handleKeyDown = (e: React.KeyboardEvent) => {
   342‚Üí    if (e.key === 'Enter' && !e.shiftKey) {
   343‚Üí      e.preventDefault();
   344‚Üí      handleSubmit();
   345‚Üí    } else if (e.key === 'Escape') {
   346‚Üí      onCancel();
   347‚Üí    }
   348‚Üí  };
   349‚Üí
   350‚Üí  return (
   351‚Üí    <div style={styles.addTaskInline}>
   352‚Üí      <input
   353‚Üí        ref={inputRef}
   354‚Üí        type="text"
   355‚Üí        value={title}
   356‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setTitle(e.target.value)}
   357‚Üí        placeholder="Task title"
   358‚Üí        style={{
   359‚Üí          width: '100%',
   360‚Üí          padding: '8px 10px',
   361‚Üí          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   362‚Üí          border: 'none',
   363‚Üí          borderBottom: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`,
   364‚Üí          fontSize: '14px',
   365‚Üí          color: GRAY_900,
   366‚Üí          fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
   367‚Üí          outline: 'none',
   368‚Üí          marginBottom: '8px',
   369‚Üí        }}
   370‚Üí        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
   371‚Üí      />
   372‚Üí      <input
   373‚Üí        type="text"
   374‚Üí        value={description}
   375‚Üí        onChange={(e) => setDescription(e.target.value)}
   376‚Üí        placeholder="Add a description..."
   377‚Üí        style={{
   378‚Üí          width: '100%',
   379‚Üí          padding: '8px 0',
   380‚Üí          backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   381‚Üí          border: 'none',
   382‚Üí          borderBottom: `1px solid ${GRAY_200}`,
   383‚Üí          fontSize: '13px',
   384‚Üí          color: GRAY_600,
   385‚Üí          fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
   386‚Üí          outline: 'none',
   387‚Üí          marginBottom: '12px',
   388‚Üí        }}
   389‚Üí        onKeyDown={handleKeyDown}
   390‚Üí      />
   391‚Üí      <div style={{ display: 'flex', gap: '6px' }}>
   392‚Üí        <button
   393‚Üí          type="button"
   394‚Üí          onClick={onCancel}
   395‚Üí          style={{
   396‚Üí            padding: '6px 12px',
   397‚Üí            backgroundColor: 'transparent',
   398‚Üí            color: GRAY_500,
   399‚Üí            border: 'none',
   400‚Üí            fontSize: '13px',
   401‚Üí            cursor: 'pointer',
   402‚Üí            fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
   403‚Üí            borderRadius: '6px',
   404‚Üí          }}
   405‚Üí          onMouseEnter={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { color: GRAY_700, backgroundColor: GRAY_100 })}
   406‚Üí          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { color: GRAY_500, backgroundColor: 'transparent' })}
   407‚Üí        >
   408‚Üí          Cancel
   409‚Üí        </button>
   410‚Üí        <button
   411‚Üí          type="button"
   412‚Üí          onClick={handleSubmit}
   413‚Üí          disabled={!title.trim() || isSubmitting}
   414‚Üí          style={{
   415‚Üí            padding: '6px 12px',
   416‚Üí            backgroundColor: BLUE_500,
   417‚Üí            color: WHITE,
   418‚Üí            border: 'none',
   419‚Üí            fontSize: '13px',
   420‚Üí            fontWeight: 500,
   421‚Üí            cursor: 'pointer',
   422‚Üí            fontFamily: '-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif',
   423‚Üí            borderRadius: '6px',
   424‚Üí            opacity: (!title.trim() || isSubmitting) ? 0.5 : 1,
   425‚Üí          }}
   426‚Üí          onMouseEnter={(e) => (title.trim() && !isSubmitting) && Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: '#2563eb' })}
   427‚Üí          onMouseLeave={(e) => Object.assign(e.currentTarget.style, { backgroundColor: BLUE_500 })}
   428‚Üí        >
   429‚Üí          {isSubmitting ? "Adding..." : "Add"}
   430‚Üí        </button>
   431‚Üí      </div>
   432‚Üí    </div>
   433‚Üí  );
   434‚Üí}
   435‚Üí
   436‚Üí// Sortable Task Card Wrapper
   437‚Üífunction SortableTaskCard({
   438‚Üí  task,
   439‚Üí  availableTags,
   440‚Üí  onUpdate,
   441‚Üí  onDelete,
   442‚Üí}: {
   443‚Üí  task: Task;
   444‚Üí  availableTags: Array<{ id: number; name: string; color: string; taskCount: number }>;
   445‚Üí  onUpdate: (id: number, data: { title: string; description: string; status: TaskStatus; tags: string[] }) => void;
   446‚Üí  onDelete: (id: number) => void;
   447‚Üí}) {
   448‚Üí  const {
   449‚Üí    attributes,
   450‚Üí    listeners,
   451‚Üí    setNodeRef,
   452‚Üí    transform,
   453‚Üí    transition,
   454‚Üí    isDragging,
   455‚Üí  } = useSortable({ id: task.id.toString(), data: { status: task.status } });
   456‚Üí
   457‚Üí  const style = {
   458‚Üí    transform: CSS.Transform.toString(transform),
   459‚Üí    transition,
   460‚Üí    opacity: isDragging ? 0.5 : 1,
   461‚Üí  };
   462‚Üí
   463‚Üí  return (
   464‚Üí    <div ref={setNodeRef} style={style}>
   465‚Üí      <TaskCard task={task} availableTags={availableTags} onUpdate={onUpdate} onDelete={onDelete} dragAttributes={attributes} dragListeners={listeners} />
   466‚Üí    </div>
   467‚Üí  );
   468‚Üí}
   469‚Üí
